Summary Heading: Clean, modern hotel with spacious rooms.
Summary: We had to move out of our house for a couple of days while our house was being fumigated for termites. We chose this hotel because it was close to our home. This Ayers property was new, clean and modern, tastefully decorated with dark woods, teal and tan/brown color scheme with Asian accents. We had a room with a king bed that was more spacious than most hotel rooms we’ve stayed in. We were met with excellent, friendly and professional staff.  The desk clerk upon recognizing that we were local residents of the city offered a generous discount, which was greatly appreciated. The hotel offered daily maid service which we haven’t seen for a long time!  The breakfast room doubles as a Spoons restaurant and bar, and was very nice. The back wall is all windows which made the room

We love this hotel and stay every time now we come to visit family in Huntington Beach! It is very nicely appointed and very clean. The staff is always super friendly and helpful. The room amenities are luxurious and very thoughtfully designed. I joined the Ayres Rewards program and got pricing that blows away any Marriott offer at comparable properties. Kudos Ayres! I would stay at your properties more often if they were available outside of CA!

Summary Heading: Modern and clean property with low shower water pressure and lumpy mattress
Summary: Stayed here the other night and it was a decent experience. Booked indirect and my room was ready upon arrival. The check-in was quick and easy. The property is modern, clean, and bright.  Parking is complimentary and the check-in agent provided a receipt as a parking pass to leave on the dashboard. Hallway had super thick premium carpet which made the property feel like a more upscale property.  The suite was spacious with a mini fridge along with a microwave. Rooms featured dual double-pane windows making it for a quieter experience although noise from the street was still heard. The window hvac unit was quiet and was controlled via the controller on the wall.  Challenges with the property included the extremely weak water pressure in the shower which was a bummer. In

The workers are very nice and cares for our privacy and health throughout our stay. It's clean unlike most and everyone here is respectful and always welcoming. Everything is clean and organized. Would recommend staying here.

Summary Heading: Lived up to the many positive reviews
Summary: The hotel was very clean and the staff was friendly and helpful. There was ample free parking.  Overall, this hotel was excellent value for the price. We will definitely stay here again the next time we're in SoCal.

good location, not far from the area with a lot of Vietnamese grocery stores and food. Very quiet and safe area. Room is spacious and new. We stayed here visiting huntington beach and reptile zoo during thanksgiving holiday.

Summary Heading: Fantastic stay for business or leisure, I'll be back with my family!
Summary: 11/15-11/16 stay: The hotel restaurant had great food. I enjoyed the steak dinner and my colleague a chicken avocado sandwich. Both meals were served hot and had great flavor. The staff were a team of two and the waitress was attentive and kind, the chef was timely and make quality food. The hotel front desk staff were warm and welcoming, ensure that I had some none feather pillows to my room after we ate dinner even though the housekeeping was no shift when we checked in on the evening of 11/15. The free hot breakfast was amazing and made with quality and care. I will be back with my family for a leisure trip soon!

The bed was not comfortable at all. The pillows were flat and not comfortable. The bathroom shower head was too small for the shower and there was no option to have a detachable shower head. I absolutely hated having to leave a key in the wall to keep the lights on that feature should be removed asap. Also there should have been ann easier way to get into the pool area when the restaurant was closed. You had to go outside in the parking area to enter the pool area if the restaurant was close. The floor in the lobby in front of the snacks and drinks was super sticky both days. The eggs at the breakfast in the morning were not good, they were so powdery. If you are going to supply a continental breakfast please provide eggs that are edible and the texture is right. And there was
Manager Response: Dear Billy A,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your stay! I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you encountered regarding the comfort of our guest rooms, complimentary breakfast, and the overall configuration of our hotel. We strive to provide the most exceptional experiences for our valued guests, and we are disappointed that we did not successfully do that for you this time. Your feedback is appreciated as we can use it to improve for future guests. If you are ever in the area again, we hope to have the chance to welcome you back for a 5-star visit.   Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This was my first time staying at an Ayres Hotel. I will absolutely use them again!! The rooms were very spacious and clean. The location was great and the amenities were just what we needed for our stay.

We had a wonderful and stress free stay and the main reason was John Mathews the Manager of this hotel. Our room was spacious and the beds are the best we have slept in. The convenience of having a restaurant in the hotel was a plus. Management, office staff and maintenance staff are true professionals.

Beautiful accommodations. The hotel was clean. Service was excellent. Friendly staff and fantastic amenities; pool, patio, and fitness room. Great breakfast. Comfy beds and quiet. Great stay! Highly recommend.

I booked a two-night (weekend) stay at Ayers in Fountain Valley, California and am so glad I did!  The front desk staff members were very helpful and friendly, and the hotel asthetics were quite pleasing.  The room was spacious and clean; quite relaxing.  Additionally, the in-house restaurant staff were attentive; helping me out immediately with smiles.  The food is very good, too!  I look forward to my next stay!

The hotel is spotlessly clean, staff are polite, helpful and knowledgeable. The service from all areas is exemplary. The rooms are comfortable, clean and well serviced. I would recommend Ayres Hotel, Fountain Valley very highly. Location right on the 405 Freeway makes freeway access easy.

The Ayers in Fountain City was a great place to stay. Easy to get to airports. Great breakfast. Fun bar though it closes at 10. Pool was relaxing. Rooms were energy efficient and clean. Comfy beds and pillows.

The AYRES Hotel in Fountain Valley is my favorite place to stay in Orange Co. The price is very reasonable and it’s a family chain. It’s very clean, and is convenient to PCH and just off the freeway in a very safe location. Parking is free.  The rooms are spacious and have all you need.  Free breakfast and a nice outdoor area with sitting area, fire pit, pool and spa. The restaurant food is very good. The best part is the friendly staff. I found the staff very polite, friendly, and very helpful.  I recommend this AYRES Joel location if you are staying for the beaches.  Gay

Summary Heading: Still a great and reliable hotel!
Summary: The hotel is super clean and this is nothing new!  I've been coming to this same hotel for almost 10 years now.  The manager there (John) is the old fashioned manager, making sure everything is always top notch.  The staff there, ALWAYS friendly and the rooms are spotless.  They also have a breakfast included too and  the service there is always very good and friendly.  I go there for business, but I will sometimes drive an hour away just to stay at this same hotel rather than risk being disappointed somewhere else.  I usually write a review when I am unhappy, but not this time!

Bed is too soft.  No USB ports in the room for recharging phones and other electronic devices.  Adjustable thermostat was really appreciated.  Pool and jacuzzi were wonderful.  Nice variety for breakfast for guests.

I really liked our room at this hotel. The room and bathroom is big. The tub is big, the bed and pillows are nice and comfy. The hotel is clean with laundry rooms and gym. The pool is nice and big with a hot tub and a shower BUT we didn’t get to use the pool area because there was a kids softball team staying at the hotel so they took over the pool area every day and night till about 11pm. 2 nights in a row I couldn’t find parking. The free breakfast they serve is terrible so don’t waste your time. I probably won’t stay at this hotel again just because I feel like it’s a team hotel but overall not a bad hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Mary Jany,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay! We are pleased to see you were satisfied with the spaciousness and cleanliness of our guest rooms. Although we wish you had an exceptional experience, we appreciate your feedback on our complimentary breakfast, parking, and pool. Our goal is to provide stellar experiences, and we appreciate your feedback as we can use it as a tool to improve. If you are ever in the area again, we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a 5-star visit.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We had a great week stay at this hotel. It was very clean, the bed was comfortable, the breakfast was adequate. The staff were helpful and quick. The patio with the fire pit and pool were a nice place to sit in the evenings. It is close to many restaurants and parks. Not far from the beach.

The hotel is very, very well kept and clean! You are greeted as you walk in everytime. Everyone is very friendly and courteous. You constantly see workers cleaning. The room was very spacious and so was the restroom! Spacious and super clean! The breakfast was good with a good variety. They had to go in to our room to check if there was a leak and they gave us a call to let us know. When we arrived there was a personal written note from the manager along with a bag of goddies apologizing. I can not tell you enough how clean the entire hotel was and how spacious the rooms and restrooms were! It had been a while I had seen such a clean hotel! Great location also! Excellent!

We enjoyed our trip so much!!! We call the Ayres Fountain Valley, our California home. Everyone is so nice and friendly. John Matthews takes such good care of us and makes our visits so fun and stress free.  Our family looks forward to seeing him every time we visit. Thank You So Much!!!

The room was very spacious and clean.  The staff was very friendly and always tending to their duties.  They were constantly cleaning the facility.  The free breakfast was exceptional.  You will enjoy staying here.

We stayed at Ayres hotel and loved it, great price clean and very nice staff. Very close to the beach and to Disney Land over all a very great experience. The rooms are very well kept. Breakfast is free so that’s always great.

Was given an early check-in and a banquet room to finish wedding details of an upcoming wedding at a separate venue! Staff was so accommodating with late room housekeeping due to bridal party getting ready

Rooms are spacious, clean, and well appointed. Beds are very comfortable. Good, hot buffet breakfast every morning. Staff is very pleasant and responsive. Had trouble with the TV remote and maintenance was up within 5 minutes to fix the problem.

Friendly and efficient staff, great breakfast.  Very comfortable beds, lots of hot water for a great shower. Expensive bar/restaurant.  Good location, right off of I-405, even though there was lots of construction going on at our exit.

We stayed one night here, came in late and it was great to come into a clean, decent sized room for a good night's sleep. The hotel itself (lobby, etc) is really nice! The free breakfast was great - much better than most places, with several attentive and friendly staff! Would stay again.

Tried to have arrange a special stay for my wife and daughter for Mothers Day & daughter first business trip, but it didn't work out that way.   To begin with, I called days before their arrival to ask if they could stay in same room even thought they were booked separately (daughter booked with a City CC as she was attending class and I booked wife's room with my card).  The person I spoke to said "sure, no problem" as I heard him typing away on computer.  NOT SO, upon checking in,  they were told they had no record of my request and they would have to come down to front desk and recheck in.  Then they tried to have a nice dinner at Spoons but there was a baby shower going on with little kids running all through restaurant, tables were messy and it was very loud!  Fortunately,

We stayed with out teenage girls soccer team and their families. It was very clean and the outdoor area was great place to hang out even for big group. All staff was welcoming and professional. We would definitely stay hear again.

Excellent choice of hotel to stay, every aspect of our stay exceeded our expectations. Friendly staff  - always greet you with a smile, breakfast was wonderful - wide selection of food, room and hallways are spotless - immaculate. Definitely recommend this place.

I can't find anything to complain about. The hotel is beautiful, clean inside and out. Bed and pillows were comfortable, breakfast was great. Hot tub and pool were nice. Everything was great. I would stay again and again. Shares the parking lot with police station which makes it more secure I suppose.

This Hotel is really great. Everything in the entire hotel was well kept, clean and pleasant. All of the staff were friendly and accommodating. The only issue I had were the pillows were too soft. Everything else was fine. Conveniently located in a nice area. I would definitely stay there again.

First time stay at Ayers Hotel in Fountain Valley.  Excellent Customer Service.  Front desk David was professional and quick with the check in process. SUMMER, the Hotel Manager was Profecient and Friendly with helping with every request my Family made.  We had 5 rooms and stayed from 2 to 4 nights.  The hotel was clean,  updated,  spacious rooms with a Frig, Microwave and Coffee maker.  In-house restaurant was good food. Lived the Free hot breakfast and the Staff that prepared it. The outside patio had lots of different seating accommodations including a fireplace, smoking area and lounge couches. Weather was great to sit outside and eat and drink.  I will definitely return.  Competitively priced. Worth the value.

Summary Heading: The Ayers is a five star quality hotel at an affordable price.
Summary: The Ayers is a well maintained property with all the features you want.  It has an accommodating and friendly staff,  a well appointed room with comfortable bedding and quality linens enabling a good night's sleep. A cafe with good food. I highly recommend it.

The Ayres Fountain Valley location is a great team.  Convenient location, great team always willing to help, facilities are in great shape. I recommend this hotel whole heartedly! My business team uses their meeting facilities regularly and its very productive.

The room was clean. This is the only good point. I asked for a crib, and I found it in my room, but not assembled!!! The breakfast was poor.  The restaurant inside the hotel is closed on Sunday. The room was old fashioned, I did not like it. Not a good value for my money.
Manager Response: Dear Deliano M.,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay! I would like to extend my sincere apology for any inconvenience you encountered in regards to the cribs we have available and our complimentary breakfast. We strive to provide the most exceptional experiences and are disappointed to see that we did not successfully do that for you this time around. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to have the opportunity to welcome you back for the 5-star experience you most deserve.   Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We booked 2 rooms with king bed with double sofa bed (around $190/night). Rooms were clean, comfy. Enjoyed the bath tub. The sofa bed was little uncomfortable but usable. We were on 3rd floor but can hear voices from outside at night (didn't sound like from other rooms). Hotel is close to Asian places and 405 freeway. Hotel is next to apartment and police station. Free parking. Free American style breakfast (egg, fries, bagel, small sausage). There's pool (look little dirty), jacuzzi?, and gym. One negative is windows curtain can't be closed completely.

My wife and I have stayed at the Ayres hotels in Orange and Costa Mesa and have always had an excellent experience so we thought that this time would be no different. From the very beginning we were proven wrong.  First, we checked in at around 10:30pm on a Friday night after a long drive. We were driving a plug in hybrid so I asked about their EV facilities. I had noticed that on one side of the facility that they had three Tesla chargers but only one non-Tesla (J1772) charger and was wondering if they might have some others somewhere else (the Costa Mesa facility has EV chargers on both sides of the building). I was surprised when the receptionist reacted with an attitude of "Why would you be driving something other than a Tesla." and was very snappy. She did mention that if

First time staying at an Ayres property. I came away impressed. Very clean, updated and it was clear the staff took pride in the quality of their property.   The staff was pleasant and was very impressed with the breakfast staff who worked hard at keeping the buffet operating smoothly and efficiently. More than enough food choices to come away satisfied. (Don’t forget to tip, they deserve it)  Room had a king bed, microwave, fridge and safe. The quality of the furnishings was on the higher end of the scale.   Lots of parking and good access to highways.   The area had lots of restaurants and shopping.   Too bad there aren’t more locations throughout North America because they’d be my first choice.

The hotel was very clean and the staff went above and beyond to make our stay enjoyable.  The free breakfast was a plus.  Could not say enough great things about the staff.  I would highly recommend the hotel.

This hotel is very clean and the staff goes above and beyond to make your stay enjoyable. Some additional extras free breakfast, and parking. Also, we love the location close to a lot of restaurants and about a twenty minute drive to Disneyland theme park.

Summary Heading: Pre Catalina stay at Aryes Fountain Valley.
Summary: My wife and two children wanted to stay closer to Newport Beach to make sure we would make our ferry's 9 AM departure time. We live in Riverside and did not want to take a chance on bad traffic or accidents. The Aryes is only 20 minutes from the launch dock. The hotel is very well maintained, clean, and has a Spoon's restaurant that offers a full menu and bar. Our room was spotless. A tasty made-to-order complimentary breakfast started our day off nicely and parking was free.

Great hotel. All areas of the hotel were very clean. Excellent staff making sure our stay was great.  The room was very quiet, did not here any noise from the next rooms. Nice area to sit outside. Enjoyed having breakfast there. Good location.

John and the rest of the staff always take care of me in any way possible. I’ve never really been a hotel type of person but having such a pleasant experience here has changed my mind and I would come back any day. I wasn’t aware of the rewards program and they made sure I got all my points for future reservations. House keeping is also amazing and they are very friendly. Overall this was an amazing experience and I'm always looking forward to coming back.

I have to say I was quite impressed with this place. I was coming in for my sons hockey tournament so I was expecting a shoddy motel. I have never heard of this chain before. But it was super nice! Everything was upgraded and modern, our rooms were spacious and had all the amenities I needed (except for a real glass. I can live with plastic cups but it’s just my preference not to). Refrigerator and microwave included which makes it great for kids to heat up a quick snack when they need it. They have a restaurant and bar on premise which is always appreciated! Loved having complimentary breakfast each morning so we can get out the door without a wait. And great protein choices too with eggs and sausage! The pool and hot tub were amazing and a great temperature (I went at night so

The room was fine; the breakfast is the absolute worst. Oh, also, the breakfast is the absolute worst breakfast in the history of mankind.  Oh, and management is fully aware of the problem and management absolutely refuses to do anything at all about improving the breakfast and making the breakfast anything approaching normal and acceptable.  The normal breakfast for Ayers Fountain Valley customers is the one to be had at Mimi's Cafe just down the street.
Manager Response: Dear John D,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay! Although we wished you had an exceptional experience with us, your feedback is appreciated as we are always open to hearing ways in which we can better improve. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a 5-star visit.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Hotel was exceptionally clean and very nice accommodations, complimentary hot breakfast was excellent as well. Court yard was beautiful to relax and enjoy! Location was easy of and on to great and centrally located for all we were doing.  Definitely recomend

Summary Heading: An excellent expierince of staying at Ayres Hotel-Fountain Valley
Summary: I got a referral from a friend about this hotel so I decided to book it for all of my cousins trip to California this Jan. After the trip, my whole family loves this hotel and would definitely refer friends and family for the next trip. The room service is everyday compare to others we stayed which is every 2 or 3 days. The hotel decoration is nice. The rooms are clean and tidy. My nephews like the free breakfast every morning and the breakfast menu is different everyday. They also like the heating swimming pool and jacuzzi

I stayed here a few months during the pandemic early on working close by as a RN.  The hotel is on the newer side and was very nice.  The rooms were super clean, comfortable and large.  They offered microwave, refrigerator and coffee maker and everything was updated. They have a nice patio to sit on for breakfast or dinner with fire pits next to the pool which was in a gated area. The hot breakfast was very good, just being there for a few months I did grow tired of mostly the same things.  They served you so it was a bit impersonal in taking time to pick.  It is close to Mile Square park for lots of walking as well as many eateries in the area. My room on the 2rd floor was awesome facing away from the freeway as it was much quieter.  Would definitely come back if needed a place

Summary Heading: Wonderful staff, clean room, couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay
Summary: I had to travel unexpectedly from out of state for a family emergency. Booking was super easy on their website, and when I arrived the staff was lovely and welcoming. My room was very clean and bed was comfortable. Complimentary breakfast in the morning was great. I couldn’t have asked for a more comfortable stay. Thank you Ayres Hotel!

One of the best hotels we’ve stayed at. Staff are very friendly, courteous & helpful. Room is very clean & looked sanitized. Hot breakfast is a hit. Love, love the location. We will definitely stay there again & recommend it to family & friends.

The hotel is by a busy noisy highway. The patio is ugly and unattractive. The breakfast was not worth. They force you to order in a brisk of time and mostly miss one or two things each time. They did not let us check out a little bit longer. I had hard time to understand the entire staff. I just wanted to leave and not come back again. Truly disappointing.

Wonderful overall experience. Very comfortable & clean environment.  Kids enjoyed warm pool! Friendly m, professional and exceptional customer service with each employee we encountered. Thank you! Would highly recommend.

From the time we entered to the time we left, staff were friendly, pleasant, respectful and helpful!  The facility was always clean, balanced temperatures and has an inviting atmosphere.  Few hotels meet their standard!

We visit family in CA 2 or 3 times a year and always stay at the fountain Valley location. It’s always spotless, the staff is very professional and accommodating, and it’s in a location where we feel safe.  We won’t stay anywhere else while in CA.

This hotel was spotless and updated modern furniture.  The area around the hotel is nice and safe with a police station behind the hotel.  The breakfast was very nice and fresh. Air conditioning worked very well to keep room cold for sleeping

This hotel is conveniently located, super close to the freeway (although there is a lot of construction on the freeway right now, you don’t hear any of the noise in the rooms), the room is big, the desk chair and couch are comfortable and the bathroom is nice… the bed was comfortable too! The free breakfast was ok, not awesome, but the staff at this hotel are amazing!!! From the reception staff to the breakfast servers to the housekeeping staff, every single staff member I came into contact with were so friendly and helpful!   I highly recommend this hotel

The hotel was all well kept and clean, it seemed new even though it may not have been.  The staff was all very friendly and helpful.  All the amenities were nice and it had the best in hotel breakfast I've had since COVID started.  Freshly cooked and quickly ready.  And being able to eat outside on beautiful California mornings made it all just that much better.

The staff was amazing, very welcoming and friendly.   The  hotel was very nice and extremely clean.  The complimentary breakfast was good and the restaurant in the evening had some amazing food and service.  Although the hotel itself was very nice the staff placed my visit over the top. I had an amazing stay.

Summary Heading: Great service, and really good food!  very clean will stay again if in area
Summary: Good location, and really good foo, had my breakfast at pool area. With great service, spacious rooms and love walk in showers. Very clean hotel with nice lobby. Could use new cushions out side at pool area

Summary Heading: The staff are always so friendly and helpful. The hotel is always very clean.
Summary: We always enjoy staying at the Ayres Fountain Valley. Added bonus is free breakfast. The location is perfect for getting to the freeway, shopping or local restaurants. The room was perfect and clean. Dinner in

Stayed at this hotel for work, after staying at another hotel the week prior. Made the world of difference. This hotel is clean, accommodating, staff friendly, and has everything you need. Def recommend.

Great hotel! Right when you walk in everybody said welcome to the Aryes hotel. Staff was very friendly even riding in the elevator.   Our room was very clean….bed was comfy and I liked how the sink and bath tube/toilet were separate.   Would for sure stay hear again.

Can't think of anything to complain about. Room was nice, clean and the beds were so comfortable. The staff was friendly and helpful. I wish the parking lot was a little bigger but that didn't change my opinion on my stay.

Very happy we found this hotel.  It is in a great location.  Not in a very crowded area, safe neighborhood, restaurants close by and short drive to the beaches and shopping.  Parking was free.  Room was very clean.  We were not expecting our room to be cleaned until we checked out due to Covid but they did.  Appreciated the free hot breakfast.  Staff were courteous and friendly.  Will definitely stay in this hotel again next time we are in the area.

Very Nice place and affordable!  Clean and friendly staff.  Kids loved the restaurant in the lobby.  Great prices for dinner - also FREE Breakfast!  About 20 minutes from Newport Pier.  Clean pool and hot-tub.  Will totally stay here again.

This Ayres hotel Fountain Valley is clean, well maintained and the staff are all helpful and friendly. It is in a convenient location. The breakfast is a nice bonus. We enjoyed our stay and would stay here again.

Summary Heading: Great value foe the beach area.
Summary: Nice hotel, very clean, easy access to shopping, restaurants, local beaches and businesses.  The  complementary breakfast is a real plus.  Fast service and freshly made food. Nice pool and hot tub to top off the evening. We would stay here again when we’re back in town.

The room was large and very clean, the lobby is grand, and the pool/resting area is very nice. But what stuck out to me the most is how nice the Staff were. The manager John helped me find the right room as well as walked me through all available amenities. The front desk staff was always a phone call away and willing to help with anything I could ask for, including helping me get my devices connected to wifi ! Everyone was so kind, it really made my weekend stay more enjoyable.

Not worth the price at all. Rooms were just whatever. Could have been cleaner. The entrance of the hotel and Google pics will fool you. The pool was very disappointing. Looked like it was for toddlers. The breakfast was terrible. I don’t care if it’s 10 min away from the beach. I would have preferred to drive an extra 10 min, pay less and stay somewhere descent. I asked for a late check out and was immediately denied by the gal at the front desk “we are currently not granting late check outs”.

Summary Heading: Every staff person we encountered was pleasant. They accommodated our every request.
Summary: The room was large and tastefully appointed.  The grounds were immaculate.  Despite covid, they went out of their way to meet every request.    We met the general manager upon arriving and he called us by name the next six days we were there.  We saw him everywhere in the hotel, at times working alongside that department's personnel...depending on the need.  He was very personable.  The king size mattress seemed new and was very comfortable.  Breakfast was always on time and they served every person individually due to covid restrictions.  We have family in the area and will definitely stay with them again.

Friendly comfortable hotel experience.  Check-in fast.  Complimentary charging station for electric vehicles.  Rooms spacious with modern amenities.  Complimentary breakfast served with several offerings.   Check out just as timely and convenient.

Clean, comfortable and the friendliest staff that I have experienced at any hotel. John, the hotel manager, deeply cares that patrons have an enjoyable stay. During our stay, there was several 9-10 year old girls softball teams staying at the hotel. They were noisy with excitement in the lobby and dining area. Once we were in our room, nothing but quiet. Truly a pleasurable stay, this is our go to place every time we visit family here.

Summary Heading: Surgery at Orange Coast Medical Center
Summary: The room was impeccably, quiet, clean and beautiful.  All the things you're looking for when you're on vacation or recuperating from a day  surgery.   Really enjoyed the great decorated room the TV and very comfortable bed.  I would not hesitate to stay here again.

This was our third stay at Ayres in Fountain Valley.  We love this hotel! Service is awesome, breakfast is always delicious, and the rooms are clean and spacious.  The location is great for any Orange County activities.  Thanks Ayres for another great stay!

Amazing we give  this hotel 10 stars if we can  The cleanliness of the entire hotel is amazing the room are so immaculate, you won’t be afraid to touch any of the surfaces or use the tub. The staff is so friendly and accommodating, Gen Manager John is so down to earth very professional. We feel that we are at the Ritz walking on those hallway to our room. We definitely will recommend this place Ayres FV. 💯

Summary Heading: Excellent service! Very Clean and up to date!
Summary: We had a wonderful stay! The staff were all so very friendly and our accommodations were amazing. The hotel is very clean and up to date and not noisy. The room was spacious and also very clean. The bed and pillows were also very comfortable.  The daily breakfast was great with nice options. The onsite restaurant was very convenient and also had great food! I look forward to staying here again.

Summary Heading: This hotel is immaculate and the staff is excellent.
Summary: This hotel is immaculate. You could see Covid-19 precautions being observed everywhere. Surfaces were either spotless or being cleaned and polished in the moment. Housekeeping staff were thorough and attentive. The staff is friendly and helpful. I'd like to give a shout-out to Nguyen who was especially helpful and friendly. The rooms were well-appointed, clean, and comfortable. I looked forward to returning to my room each evening.

Friendly hotel staff, spotless and well-furnished rooms, awesome housekeeping work, air-conditioned rooms, in-hotel restaurant, complimentary breakfast with delicious hashbrowns. Will be booking again soon.
Manager Response: Dear Chris133133,   Thank you for your 5-star rating and review! We are delighted to see that you were satisfied with our accommodations and the service you received from our team. Our goal is to provide exceptional experiences and we are happy to see we have successfully done that for you. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in the area!  Sincerly,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Outstanding manager and staff, efficient, friendly and CLEAN and comfortable facility,
Summary: We travel for business a lot and find this hotel to be simply the best in all categories. We can see each time we stay how the  manager and staff work as a team to provide the best experience for guests - consistently.  They care!

Summary Heading: Very clean hotel with exceptional staff
Summary: We stayed here 3 nights. My only complaint was the noisy people above me. The hotel is giving me a discount for the noise. We were on the first floor near the entrance and the dining area. Great location unless you have heavy footed people walking or pacing the floor above you. Otherwise my stay was perfect. Good location off the freeway. The breakfast was good. One morning I was late to breakfast so the front desk clerk checked to see if there was any hot food left. She came back with food and drinks for me right away. The staff os very friendly and professional. When I asked for extra towels they were delivered right away. I highly recommend this hotel!

Summary Heading: Short notice, multiple adjustments, no problem
Summary: Had to take a short notice trip to Huntington Beach area and chose Ayers Hotel through the company travel website.  Had driven by the location many times before, it looked nice and a coworker had stayed there with high recommendations.  Reservations were easily acquired and throughout the stay my travel home was adjusted several times. Each time the staff was courteous, helpful, and was able to adjust my checkout date with no issues.  They were able to perform the task without having to gain permissions which means, to me at least, they are knowledgeable and management trusts them.  Ate at the restaurant a couple of times.  Food was good and they would bring it up to the room with no hassles.  Overall, the staff was very nice and the hotel itself was clean and very comfortable.

The rooms are spacious and nicely appointed. The bathrooms are also large and very clean.  The staff are all amazing, friendly and very responsive and helpful.  The Fountain Valley location is well located for reaching most places in Orange County.

I had a great experience. The hotel staff is welcoming, helpful,  and professional.  The hotel is clean and comfortable with a design that makes it a short distance to anywhere you need to go to, whether it be the pool, the parking area, the restaurant, and so on. I really enjoyed my stay here, even more than most luxury resorts I've stayed at. Thank you to the manager John Matthews, Luis, and Laura, and the rest of the staff for providing an exceptional experience during my stay at the Ayers in Fountain Valley.

I highly recommend this hotel!  Friendly staff, nice facilities, clean pool and hot tub, and compliant with covid health safeguards.  The Ayres would be my first choice of accommodations when traveling to Fountain Valley in the future.

The staff at this Ayres is the BEST!   They are very friendly and always go above and beyond to make you feel comfortable and welcome. I love this hotel and highly recommend it to anyone who is in the fountain valley area

This hotel was lovely!  It was very clean.  Room was spacious.  Bed was very comfy.  The bathroom was large, clean, and had an awesome soaking tub/shower!  The staff was super friendly, kind, and very helpful.   Despite COVID Rules,, they managed to provide a GREAT HOT BREAKFAST - Made to Order - that offered new items daily!!!!! I definitely recommend staying at this Ayers location.  You will not be disappointed.

Check in at the hotel was simple and quick. We booked the large King room and it was spacious and very clean.  The hotel was quiet and the beds were very comfortable which is always important to me. I would certainly stay here again.

I did not expect the level of quality for this price. Not only was the hotel clean, comfortable and quiet, the staff were so very kind and accommodating! Check out/in was a breeze and finding our room was quick and efficient. The room was spacious and clean, smelled great and was very comfortable. I had a great nights sleep on their king sized bed, and a wonderful bath in their huge tubs. Not only that, they have some snacks/refreshments in the lobby that we took advantage of late at night that were always available.   It also was ridiculously quiet, which is a nice change from some hotels I've stayed at! Even when people were on the patio/pool area I couldn't hear a word.  There were hand sanitizer stations everywhere and lots of signs reminded you to keep your mask on which I

A really great hotel. For the value it can not be beat. Only 10 minute drive to Huntington Beach. The pool and hot tub were a definite plus!  Spoons, the restaurant, was another added bonus as there food was good and pricing very reasonable. Overall the entire staff of Spoons and of the hotel were very friendly and top notch.  Hotel itself was very clean and comfortable. Unfortunately, I did not catch the name of the manager but he was also above and beyond with his hospitality and always had a smile on his face. As we are from NorCal we will make this our destination every time we make our way down to SoCal

Excellent staff, very friendly, accomodations were clean and well kept, location was central to our needs and high quality resteraunt with very good food and service.  Highest of recommendations for this location.  Great job, thank you.

Me, my wife, and my two daughter stayed here for a little vacation by the beach. The hotel was immaculate when it came to cleanliness. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was perfect for us. The beds were super comfortable, nice to have a partition between the beds. The breakfast, my gosh the breakfast. So delicious. They have it very well handled to be safe during Covid-19 concerns. The pool and hot tub were perfect. Great location, 10 minutes from the beach. Loved this hotel. We will definitely be staying here again.

It's a great location right off the freeway, but you don't hear anything from the freeway.  The salt water pool/hot tub were perfect after a day at the beach.  We were very happy they were still offering breakfast.  Two things we would've changed: (1) they could have put a sign up saying "Masks required" instead of the employees asking people to wear masks.  The employees were great, they just wouldn't need to tell everyone to wear masks if there were signs saying "Masks required".  Easy fix. (2) The black-out portion of the curtains was immovable... They obviously put screws in the rod so you can't move them, so we had to get creative.  I work graveyard shift, so I'm not used to having a light room at 6:30 in the morning -- And also because of that, I wish they served breakfast

We were extremely impressed with all aspects of the Ayres hotel in fountain Valley. It was welcoming, clean, excellent food, large rooms with comfortable beds. The manager, John Matthew, was first class in hospitality. He thought of everything that I might possibly need in a wheelchair and was very accommodating. We would stay at the Ayres in a heartbeat again.

Me, my wife, and my two sons stayed here for a little vacation by the beach. The hotel was immaculate when it came to cleanliness. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was perfect for us. The beds were super comfortable, nice to have a partition between the beds. The breakfast, my gosh the breakfast. So delicious. They have it very well handled to be safe during Covid-19 concerns. The pool and hot tub were perfect. Great location, 10 minutes from the beach. Loved this hotel. We will definitely be staying here again.

The hotel was clean and enjoyable the only thing that I did not like , is. that you can not really have a late check out . Most hotel will let you check out at 12 no question Ask . But this hotel you have to ask the maid service ! what time you can check out ,the latest was 11:30 Which. Was lame.

Very good place to stay, the staff was wonderful and the entire hotel was clean and well taken care of. Staff was very responsive on any request, my family and I were able to get checked in and out with no wait time. Great Job!!

Summary Heading: First time stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley
Summary: YOU WILL LOVE THIS HOTEL AND STAFF !!!  We were so lucky on finding this fantastic hotel!! We loved it !  We were met by their staff with the best attitudes while checking in as well as EVERY DAY . Our room was so clean and comfy! Everyday they had their restaurant set up for a complimentary Hot cooked breakfast..covid style safety! ..it had different choices each day.. and scrambled eggs and waffles were always offered. They took our order..everyone in masks ..staff and visitors.. and it was ready in minutes! They have our bellies filled!! They also have the restaurant opened for evening dining and you get a 10% coupon for each day you stay ! Anything we needed was handled professionally throughout our stay. We have now added Ayres Hotels to the top of our new BEST places to

Stayed at Ayres in July 2020 with my husband in a standard King Room. The hotel is great!! Free parking, free breakfast (0630-0930). They also have a hot tub and heated pool with a cute patio area out back with fire pits. The hotel is about 20-30 mins away from Huntington, Laguna, Balboa and Newport Beach. We went to all 4 during our stay! I felt very safe at the hotel and it seemed very clean during COVID-19. I would definitely stay here again. Easy to drive to the hotel and close enough to all the locations we wanted to visit.  A couple shopping centers and gas stations nearby to stock up on snacks for the beach.

The hotel was nice and clean. Only complaint was that there were charges to my account for alcohol from the restaurant that were not made by me. I was the only person on account. Also finding out staff were drinking on my dime. I find it very unprofessional and wrong for this to happen. I called the location and was told there is no manager to handle this. I will not be staying here again because fraudulent use of my banking information.

The rooms are very clean and spacious. The hotel overall looks really clean and it smells good! The only downfall is that the complimentary breakfast wasn’t good, which earned the hotel 4 stars for me.

It’s lovely. It’s clean. It’s comfortable. The staff is absolutely wonderful. Great location. Reasonable rates.  I honestly can’t say enough about this hotel.  Totally upscale, at a great deal.  Book it. Book it. Book it.

I don't normally leave reviews but I was beyond happy at Ayres!!! From check in to check out the service was outstanding. We were greeted as we walked thru the door given water and cookies were given to the kids. The actual check in process was quick. The hotel is clean, we'll taken care of, and very modern. The restaurant in the hotel is nice. And service is quick. Hit breakfast in the morning included scrambled eggs, potatoes, waffles, sausage, juice, coffee, fruit etc.  Check out is anytime before noon which was nice change to the norm. And we did not have one single knock on the door with the typical annoying "room service" opening your door before we were even awake like other places. We were able to sleep till 10, get ready and check out by noon without one single bother.

The hotel was beautiful. The pillows were amazing! The staff was great and very friendly. Breakfast had a great selection and the coffee was great. We will definitely be staying here again on our next visit!

My boyfriend and I were extremely impressed with this hotel. Everything was beautifully decorated! The rooms were sparkling clean and the bed and pillows were soft and comfortable. All the staff were helpful, polite and welcoming. We will absolutely come back!

Great stay !!! Nice place  Friendly staff Very clean Quiet Fairly new hotel Great location by the freeway  Free parking Free breakfast Large rooms  I would highly recommend and will be returning next week for sure!!!!

I stayed at the Ayres in Fountain Valley last week to visit my son (Westminster/Irvine) and friends (Huntington Beach).  The hotel is right on 405 near 55 so it is about 20 minutes away from everything.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.   Parking was good, safe and free. They are doing a great job running a hotel during this COVID mess.  6 foot distancing, staff wore masks, etc.  We had the usual great breakfast.  My only compliant would be that our room smelled like an old man had lived there and I haven't experienced that before with Ayres.  I think because they don't clean the room everyday and people can only bring in takeout food to eat people are eating in their rooms and its staying there?  Maybe the pillows need to be exchanged.  I don't know but everything else

I needed a room for the afternoon and evening. I had stayed at Ayres Hotel in Fountain Valley/Huntington Beach previously, and had a positive experience.  The King Bed Suite was comfortable, clean and spacious.  All of the employees were wearing masks, there was a distance between the front desk and where guests stand while checking in and out.  They are definitely practicing social distancing.  I also noticed an employee spraying down all the doors and knobs with a disinfectant and/protectant of some kind.  The soaps and shampoo were wrapped in a plastic bag.  If you need a hotel to stay, I recommend the Ayres Hotel in Fountain Valley (OC).

Room was clean and the price was reasonable.  The staff was friendly and they offer a free breakfast every morning.  Room was exceptionally quiet!  Location was easy to get to and ample parking was available.

I stayed a couple weeks for work. Very clean hotel with wonderful customer service. Everyone I came in contact with was very pleasant and took care of any of my needs that arose during my stay. Highly recommend this hotel for business or pleasure.

Location is so convenient to access to area around like shopping, foods, etc. Room is clean, big with fridge & microwave also a plus.   Staffs are friendly.   Would stay again if coming back to Santa Anna in future.

Very nice hotel.  Large rooms,  Clean and airy.   The bathroom was large and bright.  Comes with microwave and refrigerator.   Friendly staff with easy check in and check out.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone needing a nice, clean and quiet place to stay.

Summary Heading: Staff is very attentive to our needs
Summary: Our company often chooses Ayres Fountain Valley for workshops. It’s central, great quality, and they are very accommodating. Their conference room is very convenient which allows us to get more done. We will be back.

This was my first time staying at an Ayres property. I was on a business trip attending an Expo at the Anaheim Convention Center. I decided to attend the Expo at the last minute, so all of the decent hotels close to the convention center were booked. I was very happy with both the Ayres property and distance from the convention center. It was about a 15 minute drive and you don't have to get on the interstate so traffic wasn't bad. The room was clean and comfortable. I am very particular about the cleanliness of the bathrooms when I travel, and the Ayres did not disappoint. The hotel has a restaurant on site, and I appreciated being able to just go back to the hotel and eat there at the end of a long day. The restaurant food was great, also. (At least the pasta that I had.) The

This was my first stay at an Ayres facility, and I was impressed. Room was excellent and well appointed. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Definitely recommend it and will stay again next time I go down to the area.

This is a attractive hotel with very friendly and helpful staff.  The rooms are large and spacious as is the bathroom.  However, the first night we didn't sleep at all due to street noises on Brookhurst/Slater Road.  It was way more than normal car noises, it sounded like drag racing and gunning motors ALL night long. We were able to change our room to the other side of the hotel over looking an apartment/condo complex so it was much quieter.  We still heard road noise but it was so much better.  Also, this hotel offers a 20% discount when staying more than . 2 nights. The free breakfast was standard.

This was my first time staying at an Ayres property and we will definitely stay at another one again.  The location was convenient off the highway.  The front desk lady checking us in was very friendly.  The rooms were immaculate - it’s definitely the cleanest bathroom in a hotel I’ve ever seen- not even a spot of dust in the corners!  The rooms were spacious and the beds were comfortable.  We enjoyed having the outdoor hot tub to use.  Breakfast in the morning had plenty of choices and was good.  Prices were good for the area and we really appreciated not having to pay for parking.

Very nice experience at this property! Check in and out very friendly and efficient. Clean bathroom with plenty of hot water and good pressure. One of the most comfortable king beds encountered on our international travels! Strong wifi. Breakfast was included with our room and had good selection. The Huntington Beach Pier is about a ten minute drive. A police station is right around the corner!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are glad we were able to accommodate you during your stay. I appreciate you taking the time to share your review, and it was a pleasure to welcome you to Fountain Valley! We hope to welcome you again soon.   Sincerely,  John Mathews  General Manager

Summary Heading: Room was so clean, staff was very friendly
Summary: I stayed there for 3 nights.  Room was very clean, big bathtub.  Staff was very friendly.  Very convenient place, it is near highway and close to all the places that we wanted to go.  I will definitely stay there again
Manager Response: Dear sont666,   Thank you for your wonderful review and compliments to our accommodations and team! We are so happy to know that you appreciated our beautiful accommodations and convenient locations. We hope to welcome you back for another stay.   Sincerely,  John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: This is our 2nd year staying in this Hotel. It’s beautiful love the Front Desk Agent Melody very helpful.This time we got room 132 beautiful room. At 9:45pm the guest above us were making lots of noises stumping all over like if they were horses back and fourth. I couldn’t go to sleep so I called the Front Desk told them the situation, she was not concern she advice to go and tell the guest. I got kind of scared ... How I’m I going to comfort the guest. I actually responded to the lady on the phone . She told she was going to go . I think she never did, woke up it was 12:45 am and the noise continue. I couldn’t sleep at all. I woke very early the guest above were already stumping ... really!!! I called the front a guy answer I went again and told my situation and all he said I’m

Summary Heading: Nice, clean new hotel in Fountain Valley
Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Hotel in Fountain Valley, California while visiting family nearby. The new hotel is clean, bright and located at a convenient location. The hotel staff was professional and pleasant. Highly recommended.

The Ayres Hotel is modern, clean, and has all the amenities that we need. It is centrally located and within a short driving distance to Disneyland, Irvine, Anaheim, and Huntington Beach.  There are daily complimentary breakfast and free parking which typically would be an add on cost at other places.  We feel that we have the best bag for our buck with the Ayres Fountain Valley.  This is our second time staying here.  We highly recommend this hotel and will come back again in the future.

Summary Heading: Thank you for a great stay!
Summary: My wife and I drove down from Carson City, NV on a Friday. Hotel Reception was very helpful and timely in getting two tired travelers into a pleasant, clean room. Luggage carts were readily available for our use. Our primary purpose for the trip was a relative’s wedding on Saturday. Housekeeping did a great job servicing our room, accommodating our schedule, so we could also find time to visit with our three children and their families. The complimentary breakfast was above par, with well-prepared food and helpful service. Our 5am checkout was smooth. Indeed, the service was uniformly pleasant and helpful. Our thanks to the entire hotel staff!

We have been long time repeating guests here at Ayers Fountain Valley.  We use Ayers as the comparison to other hotels and can not find a better stay than here.  Our visit revolves around the granddaughters and we find ourselves coming frequently.  The staff is always helpful, always with a smile and can resolve the simplest requests.  Of course, the free breakfast is always yummy to the tummy.  I would highly recommend your next visit to include Ayers Fountain Valley.

Summary Heading: No late check out for jet lagged family of 3
Summary: I contemplated many hotels in the area. I chose Ayers because it had the best reviews even though I was a Marriott member I decided to stay at a non Marriott hotel because the reviews were that great. Big mistake. I checked in late and requested for late check out. They told me I’d have to call at 7a in the morning. I set my alarm and called at 7a in the morning and was told they’d call me back after housekeeping gets in. Didn’t hear back. I called again at 11a and was told they tried to call me 3x in the room. They must’ve called the wrong room cause I did not hear the phone ring nor did my husband and son that was in the room with me. Because they said I didn’t pick up the call, they had already given out their “max” amount of late check out for the day. When I checked in,

I had a wonderful and pleasant experience. It was a last minute booking due to the an unexpected Thanksgiving day storm. Excellent service at the front desk, they had a baby crib ready in the room (we didn't even have to remind them). The front desk receptionist person was kind, professional, and well-trained. Wi-Fi and parking were included. Breakfast also included with a lot of varieties to select from on your average breakfast. The room was clean and maintained (nothing broken, lose or about to). I also appreciated the quality of the materials in the room, nice tiles, nice countertops, the shower is elegant and neat looking. There is plenty of room for a family of 4. I will definetly stay here again if needed in the future. And I prefer this hotel to the marriotts or hiltons.

Summary Heading: Love this hotel but issues with checking in
Summary: Booed 5 months ago with requests of room style and specifics, when I checked in this is not what I received. Checkin staff did not know what an interconnecting room was, I was not given the room I booked and paid for. No contact from management when requested. This was disappointing as I love this hotel, it’s clean and fresh and beautiful.

I have stayed in a lot of hotels but this one was just really good service and absolutely no problem, bed was comfy, room was cozy, good showers and toiletry. We had the right size room with enough room & storage. Free breakfast, Wi-Fi & parking, although the front parking always looked full there was lots of spots in the back of the hotel with side entrance.The hotel has easy access to the highway which was very convenient. I think this is the best hotel for handicap people who need wheelchair access or have mobility issues. They have lots of rooms and even their swimming pool & Jacuzzi have a lift for people with mobility issues. They made the hotel thinking about everyone’s comfort. Hotel manager (during our stay from Oct 12 to 21) I forgot his name was really helpful. I saw

First time staying here and it was awesome. my little family of four got a king bed eith pullout bed and the space waa perfect. family going on trips would like to save as much as well and this hotel having a microwave and fridge helps with  saving money on some meals. In addition, complimentary breakfast is top notch awesome!!!! so much variety. Definitely would stay again at this hotel, especially if people are planning to spend time in Anaheim or Huntington beach, about 20 minutes drive.

We recently stayed at this beautiful Ayres hotel and it did not disappoint. The rooms were outstanding and so clean. House keeping cleaned our room every day and supplied us with fresh towels and fresh bedding if we wanted that. The free breakfast was delicious and so much choice- all freshly cooked on site by the chef which you can see when eating breakfast. The decor of the hotel and outdoor area with pool was beautiful. Beautiful sun lounges and pool and hot tub. We will be back- 100% recommended this hotel for family’s couples, and business workers. Free parking also. Thank you for making our 4 day stay truly amazing.

My son and I stayed here for the weekend because we were in town for a baseball tournament. We were so happy the moment we walked in. The hotel and the rooms are clean, modern, spacious and just all around nice! We felt completely safe (we don’t usually travel without my husband and were a little nervous, until we got there). My son wanted to stay longer simply because he enjoyed the hotel. We will definitely look for Ayres hotels from now on whenever we have to travel! The staff was so kind as well, the food was really good. It was literally an all around wonderful stay!!!

We booked this hotel after seeing other reviews on TA; in fact, we cancelled our reservation at The Courtyard based on those reviews. We definitely were not disappointed! The property is new, clean, modern yet elegant. The rooms are large, the beds comfortable, the bathrooms have everything you could possibly need, and the staff couldn't have been more friendly or efficient. The buffet-style breakfast was good, and the dinner in the restaurant was lovely. Value for money was excellent and I would definitely recommend to anyone staying in the area.

Visited for a long weekend, and could not have been more pleased.  Stayed in a corner room on the second floor in the back of the hotel, away from Brookhurst, which has heavy traffic.  If you're a light sleeper, you want to be away from Brookhurst.  The room was spacious and spotless, plenty of closet and drawer space and very comfortable bed.  Sink outside bath area was well-lighted.  The staff, from front desk to housekeeping to the restaurant, was friendly and professional.  Breakfast buffet was excellent and included french toast, scrambled eggs, bacon, sausages, bagels, danish, yogurt, fresh fruit and more.  Dining area was spotless as well.  No complaints whatsoever, and would definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a rating and review. We are pleased to see that you enjoyed our clean and spacious accommodations. We are proud to have a friendly team as well as our delicious full American breakfast. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: The stay was very nice. All the employees there are very polite and willing to make your stay a comfortable one. The housekeeping maids were very nice and professional too. Did not require maintenance (as everything worked fine) so I can't comment on that. Rooms were clean, beds were comfortable, refrigerator & microwave came in very handy and plenty of room in shower. We were also impressed with the "Green" environmental attitude of the hotel. Good for Ayers hotels. Next time we are in California, we will stay at an Ayers Hotel. Congratulations on a nice hotel chain. Keep up the good work.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We are pleased to see that we were able to accommodate you during your recent stay! Thank you for your fantastic review, we look forward to welcoming you back!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Second stay as good as first
Summary: Stayed a couple years ago as convenient to visit family in the area. Hotel is about 5 years old and rooms are nice sized, clean and in good condition.  There is a small refrigerator, coffee maker and in room safe.  WiFi is included and worked well.  Free parking.  Breakfast is also included and plenty of options.  Staff is helpful and friendly.  Good value for area and will return next time I’m in area.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a rating and review. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed our premium amenities. Thank you for your wonderful compliments to our friendly team and full American breakfast. We hope to continue to have you as our guest in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We again chose Ayres for its beautiful furnishings and excellent service, plus a free breakfast!.  We love the Spoons cafe being in the hotel.  We came in late and exhausted from a party and the nice lady at the cafe fixed us two enchiladas that we could bring to our room.  They were delicious.  We love staying at Ayres hotels but this one is our favorite.

This is a really nice place to stay.  The rooms are very clean.  The beds are amazingly comfortable.  The breakfast is the best I ve had in a hotel like this.  I will definitely stay here again.  Its close to all the beach areas for half the cost.

Summary Heading: One of my best hotel stays so far
Summary: The reception staff were superb. Special shout-out to Luis, Laura and Mizael. The breakfast was lovely and none of the MRE-like stuff usually served by hotels. The neighborhood appeared safe too as I could walk around late in the evenings to get dinner at a nearby Thai restaurant.

We stayed there for 3 nights. The room was clean , bed is comfy. Specious room. Breakfast was good. Parking free. Location is convenient. The staffs very nice, all smiles on their faces. Only thing is stepping noise from the upstairs on the last day of our stay. Will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your wonderful review and compliments to our accommodations and team! We are delighted to see that you enjoyed our full American breakfast as well as our spacious accommodations. I would like to sincerely apologize for any noise that disturbed your rest. We appreciate you visiting and hope that your travels bring you back to us soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We didn't do much here to write about our experiences. Stayed for 2 nights. Small facility, but nice and friendly staff. Breakfast was also good. Plenty of parking. Didn't have any issues.   There was a fan next to the sofa bed blowing. Would have preferred central vents or quieter options.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your kind review and rating! We are proud to have a friendly and welcoming team, as well as our complimentary full American breakfast. We hope to continue to have you as our guest again soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: A fantastic mini vacation centrally located in Orange County, CA.
Summary: We enjoyed the AYRES hotel because of their friendly and outstanding service, free parking for both cars, comfortable two queen size beds, a refrigerator and microwave and a good coffee maker.  A large screen TV on one side of the room and a third floor window looked down on their heated outdoor pool and spa.  Let me just add that we had our grandkids join us for that extra family fun.  Every morning we had our free breakfast buffet which included pastries, fruits, yogurts, hot oatmeal, cereals, toasts, bagels, scrambled eggs,  make your own waffles, sausages, orange juice and good coffee.  We were loving it for 3 1/2 days of sunshine and swimming all day long.  We also had a relaxing dining experience at the hotel onsite SPOONS restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review regarding your recent stay. We are delighted to see that you enjoyed all the great amenities we have to offer within the room and throughout the hotel. We know that there are many factors that go into creating a lovely visit and we are beyond thrilled to know that you appreciated our well-appointed accommodations, comfortable beds, delicious breakfast options, and onsite Spoons Restaurant. We look forward to welcoming you back to ours or to any of our sister properties throughout southern California soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: The front desk staff was very kind, professional and helpful.  The hotel is appealing to the eye.  Very clean.  Very fresh and current looking.  Considering the hotel was booked solid, it was very active yet very quiet.  I never heard any commotion or doors banging... kids running up and down the halls... nothing!  The bed was super comfortable and the shower was the highlight of the room in my opinion.  Very nice!

Overall great experience. I had surgery on 8/9/19 in New Port and decided to stay the night before heading back home to San Diego. In all my commotion, I did not get the gentleman's name that helped us so much but believe it was Mr. John Mathews whom went out of his way to accommodate us once we arrived back at the hotel after having the surgery. He was very helpful attending to our needs and doing whatever he could to speed up the process to get us in our room. Thank you again for your professional and kind service to Mr. Mathews and his staff!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for visiting Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! We’re happy to have been able to accommodate you during your stay with us. Guest satisfaction is extremely important to us and we are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Some hotels these days are very intuitive and have everything you need from random gift shop stuff to a late snack to room service. This hotel is none of that. Not complaining as the place was clean modern spacious and comfy. Highly recommend for a business trip or needing just a place to sleep.
Manager Response: Dear James L.,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are happy to confirm that we do have a gift shop located in our lobby, adjacent to the front desk. It is delightful to know that you appreciated our modern and comfortable accommodations and we look forward to welcoming you back next time your travels bring you to Fountain Valley!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: It has a comfortable and large room and bathroom, but with an old cooling system. The staff is very polite and there is enough parking spots for everyone. I found the breakfast not so good, but is honest.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your nice compliments regarding our accommodations and team. We look forward to welcoming you as our guest again soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: If I Ever Win the Lottery, I Am Hiring Away the General Manager, Mr. John Mathews
Summary: Too many superlatives to relate. Bottom Line - Superb!! I am an old Soldier, so look at the leadership and management of organizations as a key indicator of morale, professionalism, care for mission and employees, as "the key indicator" of its state.  Mr. Mathews took care of my love and me - his staff, also. I felt at home, respected, and a true priority.  If folks want a place of value - and quality they need to look no further than this location and Mr. Mathews' team.  Go and relax, enjoy and hit the beach!!  Dr. John Harrison, Washington, DC

I was visiting a friend at the Fountain Valley Regional Hospital for a few days and stayed at the Ayres Hotel. Very pleasantly surprised to see the restaurant inside the hotel and open after a long day. The free breakfast was the best I've ever had at a hotel. The staff was very pleasant and my room was immaculate! Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We are glad to see that we were able to accommodate you during your recent stay! Thank you for your wonderful review and compliments to our accommodations, breakfast, restaurant, and team! We hope to welcome you back here or to any of our sister properties throughout California.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: The Best hotel among the Best
Summary: The room is clean, big, nice. The location is near the restaurants. I like the car park. It is a pleasant stay in this hotel. I am sure you will love it. No doubt. The breakfast is good too. It has a little TV at every table so you can watch and have breakfast. This is awesome.

Summary Heading: Definitely our go-to place for Fountain Valley visits
Summary: The Ayres staff is always welcoming and efficient. Check-ins are quick. I am especially pleased with the level of cleanliness throughout the facility. The breakfast includes fresh fruit, cereals, oatmeal, breakfast meat, scrambled eggs, yogurt, and a myriad of toasts, pastries, and muffins to choose from. There are waffles, too. The pool is outside, and there is a very nice outdoor seating area with a fire pit. Location is convenient to shops and restaurants, though there is also a restaurant inside as well as room service options.

I had a great stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley, nice hotel, friendly staff, good location, decent gym and they have room service which is always nice.  I will definitely be staying here on my next trip.

Summary Heading: The Best At everything, nobody is better
Summary: Just to be clear, we have faithfully stayed at the Ayers Fountain Valley because of their detail to all the details. We are on a first name basis with most of the staff. They have all surpassed all of our expectations and I know they will continue to do so. you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra M.,  Thank you for taking the time to share such a kind review of your stay with us. We are beyond thrilled to see that we exceeded your expectations! Thank you for continuing to be a guest with Ayres Hotels. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We stayed here three nights.  The rooms are large, with all amenities.  The room was quiet. A little pricey, but you pay for what you get. Their shuttle took us to the tournament venue once (2 miles away,)  The breakfast is GREAT.  We also had other meals at Spoons (restaurant) and they were  very good as well.  Service at Spoons was terrific.  Paula was very personable and always helpful, with our 9 year old grandson.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for sharing your thoughtful review with us! We are pleased to see that we were able to accommodate you during your recent stay and we are happy to know that you had the opportunity to enjoy our complimentary breakfast and restaurant onsite. Paula is an incredible asset to our team, and I'm proud to read that she made your stay that much more memorable. We hope to welcome you back for another stay soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I love the Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. It has the customer service and warmth of a family-run business with that quality control, cleanliness, and predictability that a seasoned traveler comes to expect when on the road. I wish I could stay in this hotel everywhere I go.

Very accommodating. Arrived at 1030 after a long flight and they were able to find us a room.   Very clean and nice breakfast.  Rooms are nice sized and nicely furnished. Remember to ask cook for bacon at breakfast it is included.
Manager Response: Dear Chris R.,  We are delighted to see that we were able to accommodate you during your recent visit to Orange County! I am pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay and had the opportunity to enjoy our delicious full American breakfast. We look forward to having you as our guest again!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Ayres Hotel with my 4 year old for 10 days in June. I chose the Ayres as I was visiting a friend down the street in Fountain Valley. Great location, with access to the 405, made for a good home base to get around SoCal.   I booked my room through Expedia and accidentally booked an accessible room that I didn't need. After the first night, the front desk was kind enough to move us to a regular room. Our room was spacious, with high ceilings and a great sofa bed for the little one. The room was immaculate. I've stayed in alot of hotels around the world and this is probably the cleanest one I've been in. I loved the soaker tub and will miss it the most! Front desk staff were amazing and the breakfast was great. We used the pool just once and enjoyed it. Not too hot
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your wonderful review and compliments to our accommodations and amenities! We know that there are many factors that go into creating a lovely visit and we are so happy to know that you appreciated our accommodations, comfortable beds, delicious breakfast options, and convenient locations. We hope to welcome you back soon so you can enjoy our spacious tub again!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in all respects!
Summary: We stayed two nights - in town for grand daughter's high school graduation.  We were on the ground floor in a large room with great lighting, very low noise and perfect temperature control.  The bathroom was large, especially the shower.  Great bed!  Staff was friendly and informative.  This hotel features a full breakfast, well staffed.  Easy in and easy out.  One of our best hotel experiences!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for visiting Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! I'm glad you found our team to be friendly and informative. We greatly appreciate your thoughtful feedback regarding our accommodations and full American breakfast. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Always a pleasent experience at Ayres Fountain Valley
Summary: I've stayed at this hotel for business travel at least 20 times during the past 2 years. The front desk staff is amazing and are always willing to provide you with great customer service and attend to your special needs/request. Manager John is always available to greet guest and very accessible if you have additional needs/concerns. The rooms are comfortable, clean, and spacious. Free parking inside the hotel property. The hotel features a local restaurant called Spoons where Paula & Enrique will take good care of you! It's the best place to stay in Fountain Valley.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  I'm so glad that your business travels bring you to the Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! We are pleased to see that you enjoyed the exceptional service from our friendly team. We are delighted to see that you enjoyed our clean, comfortable, and spacious accommodations as well as our delicious restaurant. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Safe travels!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: The Arye's Hotel was great to us, friendly staff. the rooms were perfect.the food was great,loved the pool great pool hours.The front desk is kind and were so helpful to us, they opened our wine bottles for us since I forgot our wine opener.Thank you for being great to our Family. This Hotel is awesome
Manager Response: Dear Belinda P.,  Thank you so much for sharing your thoughtful review with us! We are pleased to see that you enjoyed the exceptional service from our friendly team, as well as our complimentary full American breakfast. We hope to welcome you back for another wonderful experience soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I had a very pleasant stay. I was greeted with a smile and allowed to check in 3 hours early. The manager offered ideas of places to visit and things to do and gave me several $5 off coupons for their onsite restaurant.  This is not a fancy hotel, but nicer and cleaner than some of those fancy hotels. The food in the restaurant at dinner did not disappoint; although, they could have more staff at dinner time because there was sometimes a wait for simple needs with dinner. The food was good though. We are their 3 out of 5 nights.  The location was great. I could get to anywhere I needed very easily and plenty of other food options and shopping close by. My daughter was given a box of chocolates when we left and that made her very happy. I found the bed to be very comfortable in
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for visiting Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! I appreciate you taking the time to share your kind review and rating. It was a pleasure to welcome you to Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. We are delighted to see that you enjoyed our restaurant, breakfast, amenities, as well as our convenience to local shopping and restaurants. We hope to welcome you back to Fountain Valley or any of our sister properties throughout Southern California.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Great service, excellent breakfast, immaculate condition
Summary: We've stayed here several times and are never disappointed.  The service and cleanliness are second to none.  The rooms are comfortable and spacious.  The full breakfast is diverse and tasty.  I will definitely stay here anytime I am in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for visiting the Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley and for rating and reviewing your stay with us. I appreciate you taking the time to share your review with us. It was a pleasure to welcome you with our signature friendly service and tidy accommodations.
