We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Needed a quick place to stay as there was a power outage in my neighborhood. Ayres was just right around the corner from my work. Had no trouble getting a last minute reservation. Hotel nice and clean and quiet. For travelers, it's easy to find as it right off the 405 Freeway in Fountain Valley.
Manager Response: Dear Leigh L.,  Thank you for your kind feedback! We are pleased to see that we were able to accommodate you during your unexpected stay. We hope to continue to have you as our guest in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We visited a family member in Huntington Beach for almost a week.  This hotel was an excellent value and one we will certainly visit again.  Check in  went very smoothly, our room was spacious, clean, and updated. Breakfast was good; better than most complimentary complimentary breakfast offerings.  We were a little concerned about the time it would take to get from this hotel to Huntington, but most times it was only about 13 minutes or so.  Will stay there again - hands down!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review. We are pleased to see that we were able to accommodate you during your recent stay. It is a delight to know that you also had the opportunity to enjoy our delicious complimentary  breakfast and found our accommodations to be spacious and clean. We look forward to having you as our guest again!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I am always surprised at how much I enjoy this hotel. The staff treat you like family and the place is always spotless. Rooms are big and comfortable, and very quite. The manager, John has helped me out several times and goes out of his way to treat guests with a great attitude and sense of service. Breakfast is always fresh and changes regularly, with lots of choices. I will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Mitcheti,  Thank you for your kind feedback! I'm pleased to see that you enjoyed your time at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. We are delighted to know that that our team has made your visits memorable and we appreciate your thoughtful compliments. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We have stayed several times at this hotel.  This time we were especially impressed with their willingness to go out of their way to prepare our room for an early check-in.  I had called a day ahead of time asking if we could store our suitcases there until check-in.  Instead, they offered to have our room ready at 11 a.m.  When we arrived all was ready and we were able to get right in.  The rooms are always clean and spacious and the breakfast plentiful.  Another really pleasant stay!
Manager Response: Dear Alicia S,  Thank you for your kind feedback and wonderful rating! I am glad to see that you enjoyed your stay and that our team has made your recent visit extra memorable. Thank you for continuing to be a guest with Ayres Hotels and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We stayed here to attend a concert in Huntington Beach. Check in was a breeze and the room was super spacious and clean. It was only about a 20 minute Uber ride to the Huntington Beach pier. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for visiting our Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! We appreciate your thoughtful feedback regarding our accommodations. We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back the next time that your travels bring you to Fountain Valley!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This hotel is amazing. We had an insurance issue and had to stay here for 4 weeks.  That gives plenty of time to see EVERYTHING. I can’t Say enough good stuff.  It’s super clean. The staff is beyond helpful so nice.  Everyone seems to love their job. The manager John was extremely awesome.  They have a pool an out door hang it area a gym. And my favorite Spoons   The on location restaurant  with happy hour M-F. The main server/ bartender Paula was so awesome. Stay here.  You’ll be happy you did.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for visiting Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! I appreciate you taking the time to share your kind review with us. It was a pleasure to welcome you to Ayres Hotels. I am very proud to see that you found our team to be helpful. We truly do have a great team here and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel.  Large, clean rooms.   Staff are incredibly helpful.  Restaurant on-site and others within walking distance.   Very nice complimentary breakfast. Very good value for you money.  Both a gym and pool are available.
Manager Response: Dear Steven M.,  Thank you for your wonderful review and compliments to our amenities, restaurant, accommodations and team! It was a pleasure having you and we hope to welcome you back for another stay soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Amazing hotel. Amazing staff. Went above and beyond for me after I booked the wrong month. I will be going back in October.  Highly recommend this hotel. General Manager was AMAZING!  Thank you.  Mary R.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for visiting! I appreciate you taking the time to share your kind rating and review following your stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. It was an absolute pleasure to welcome you recently and we look forward to serving you the next time your travels bring you to Fountain Valley!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We had the BEST stay at the Ayres Hotel in Fountain Valley this week.  There were four girlfriends - we had adjoining rooms that were cozy, comfortable and very spacious.  The beds and pillows were the best I've ever had in a hotel.  The breakfast was amazing -- anything you could ever want including made-to-order omelets.  The rooms/bathrooms were spotless and the staff helpful and courteous.  Can't wait to stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Penny B.,  Thank you for visiting our hotel! I'm pleased to read that you found our team to be helpful and we appreciate your thoughtful feedback regarding our world-class accommodations and complimentary breakfast. We hope to welcome you back for another relaxing getaway soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: My family and I had a wonderful stay at your hotel. Your service was above all other hotels that we've stayed. The staff are so friendly and served us always with a smile. The ambiance in our room was so relaxing, furnitures are sophisticated yet comfortable but moreover it was spotless. We also enjoyed eating dinner at the restaurant inside your hotel. The food was excellent too!  Your hotel will be the only hotel that well stay the next time that we'll be in Fountain Valley.

We stayed at the Ayres Hotel for 8 nights. Such an absolutely great hotel. Rooms are huge, comfortable, and clean. Nice big bathroom with a big tub. Wished the water pressure was maybe a bit harder but no complaints. The free breakfast was so wonderful. Hot food items, fresh fruit, and waffles. We were so very pleased with our stay. The service was absolutely wonderful. I can’t recommend this hotel enough!

My husband and I have booked many rooms with Hotwire - where you don't get to see which hotel you are booking. It's a surprise. We needed a room for one night close to Long Beach. The Ayers Hotel in Fountain Valley is right off the 405. It is big and tastefully decorated; Nice art and carpet in the hallways. Our room had a big king bed and a couch bed. It also has a very large bathtub. The breakfast was very nice (eggs, french toast, make your own waffles, etc) There is a pool and jacuzzi and BONUS, a restaurant/Bar that stays open until 10PM. inside the hotel. For the money, it's a great deal! The hotel is right off the freeway and very close to either South Coast Plaza or Bella Terra - lots of restaurants and movie theaters. The only downfall is that it's not by anything
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your kind feedback! We are pleased to see that you enjoyed your accommodations as well as our delicious full American breakfast. We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again the whenever your travels bring you back to Fountain Valley.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Hotel lobby and room were extremely clean and nicely decorated. Staff was very friendly and helpful. All in all a very pleasant and comfortable experience. Late lunch at the Spoons restaurant was very good, reasonably priced, with good service from a very friendly waitress.
Manager Response: Dear Iris C.,  Thank you for visiting! I appreciate you taking the time to share your kind rating and review. It was a pleasure to welcome you to Ayres Hotels. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you again the next time that your travels bring you to Fountain Valley.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Needed a spot to conduct interviews
Summary: I had requested early check in ......I was checked in early and actually the very gracious warm GM was there to greet me!  My room was ready! I was able to comfortably meet a few candidates for my job postings in the lobby during the day.   The restaurant served delicious happy hour specials (chicken wings and quesadillas) and great drinks for an amazing price, The beds, pillows and rooms are so comfortable and everything has been top notch.  I will stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Angie B.,  Thank you for your fantastic review and rating! I am pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay and the friendly service we strive to provide each and every guest we encounter. Your compliments to Spoons Grill & Bar is truly appreciate and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: As we never heard of the Ayres Hotel chain, we were very pleased with our accommodations.  All was nice and clean.  Decor was updated.  Althought located right off the freeway, atmosphere did not reflect the hustle, bustle and noise of the traffic.  The complementary breakfast was great ..... many options.  The only reccommendation that my husband and I have is the need for grab bars to be installed in the shower/tub area. A safety item that could be of help to guests and reduce hotel liability.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We are glad to see that we were able to accommodate you during your recent visit! I recommend booking an ADA room for any stays in the future which will have grab bars available in the shower for added ease in and out of the shower. Thank you for your fantastic rating and kind review, I am pleased to know you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to having you as our guest again.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: The room was very clean and the bed was so comfortable. Beyond what I expected! The staff was nice and greeted you every morning. The breakfast was delicious every morning! Definitely will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Victoria C.,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are pleased to see that we were able to accommodate you during your recent visit to Fountain Valley. It is a delight to know that you also had the opportunity to enjoy our delicious complimentary breakfast and found our team to be friendly and our rooms to be comfortable. We look forward to having you as our guest again.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This is a great hotel with all the amenities. Service is exemplary and the complimentary  breakfast is the best I've seen .  Rooms are spacious and clean. Every thing defiinitely 1st rate.  The bed is very comfortable and the sheets are luxurious.
Manager Response: Dear David C.,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your recent stay with us. I truly appreciate your kind compliments regarding our exceptional service, accommodations, amenities and overall comfort. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We were attending the NAMM show in Anaheim and chose to stay at this hotel because the prices were very reasonable in comparison to hotels new the Convention Centre and it was right off the highway with easy access to Anaheim and Huntington Beach.  The room was clean and the bed was comfortable.  The free breakfast was very good - they offered a lot of choices including eggs, bacon, fruit, oatmeal, cereal, etc. - something for everyone.  The staff was friendly.  The only reason we're not giving it a 5 out of 5 is because you need a car.  There aren't many restaurants or other amenities within the area.
Manager Response: Dear AnnieMavis,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. I am pleased to see that your stay was enjoyable, the room was clean and comfortable, and that our location was optimal. I was saddened to see that, while the location was optimal, you had trouble finding restaurants within walking distance. I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back in future for a more enjoyable stay!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We traveled recently to Ayres for business, and this was the suggested hotel.  Coming from the east coast and arriving very early in the day, we were able to check in early, which was nice.  The room was roomy, clean, comfortable and convenient to where we needed to go.  We used Uber around the area without problems.  The staff was friendly.  There is a restaurant on site, but we didn't dine there.  We enjoyed the back patio area and fire pit.  I'd stay here again without hesitation.
Manager Response: Dear Carolinesc7,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. I am pleased to see that your stay was enjoyable and hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: The minute we drove into the parking lot the hotel looked beautiful. Once we went in it looks beautiful and clean. There was only one front Desk Agent . We where the third one in line. We we where next in line she assisted my husband with professionalism. She explain every basic thing like how to use the key for the light and what time breakfast was served. We got there like at 12:45 noon.  She gave us s room with no hesitation. We got to the room and everything was clean and nice .we left our things and came back at 8:30 pm. I went to the Front Desk between 9:15 and 9:20 pm to get change for the laundry. There where 3 Oriental young lady’s on the back office talking and laughing and one was sitting on the desk with the door wide open. One of the the lady’s came to assist me .
Manager Response: Dear QueenRivas,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your recent experience at our hotel. While I am glad that you had a great check-in and that you found our accommodations tidy, I would like to apologize for any inconsistencies you faced during your time with us. We can assure you that these isolated incidents do not occur very often, however, we will absolutely utilize your insight as a training platform to better ensure this does not reoccur in the future. Thank you again for your kind insight, we hope to welcome you back for a more desirable experience in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: My new go-to hotel for stays in Fountain Valley!
Summary: This hotel was exceptional. The price was reasonable, every staff member we encountered was friendly and engaging, and the entire facility was fastidiously clean. It is very close to the freeway off-ramp, but our party had four rooms and no one experienced any freeway noise. We loved gathering in front of the lobby fireplace at night. The free breakfast includes all kinds of cold cereal, oatmeal, bread items, fruit, yogurt, a meat item, an egg dish, and potatoes.  I'm not a coffee drinker, but the other people in our group said the coffee in the rooms and in the lobby was delicious. Rooms had hair dryers, ironing boards, microwaves, coffee makers and refrigerators. I loved the outdoor patio area - lots of different sitting areas.

Summary Heading: The Best of All Hotels we have stayed
Summary: My wife and I have always stayed here at the Ayers, Fountain Valley, while coming to visit the granddaughters.  This is the most consistent with respect to room cleanliness, smiles on all of the staff, ease of making reservations, pricing in our budget.  Because we have been loyal customers for the last 3.5 years, we are recognized and warmly greeted each and every visit.  Our granddaughters are young enough that Disneyland is always part of our agenda and we still love going. Be sure to say Hi to John, the manager, and Summer and Paulo and all at the front desk.  We are well loved when we come and they are worth the stay.

Hotel was clean and everyone was friendly. Convenient location right next to the 405. Although there was some road noise it didn’t keep us awake. Like that breakfast is included. Also liked that there was no parking fee.  Room was roomy with microwave and refrigerator.
Manager Response: Dear 81Walterc,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. I am pleased to see that your stay was enjoyable and hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This was our first stay at Ayres in Fountain Valley. It’s right off the 405 so I was worried we might get a lot of freeway traffic. It was very quiet inside the hotel; we loved the water feature and fireplace in the lobby as well. The high ceilings make the rooms feel spacious. The beds were comfy and the tub was clean. I loved having a large fridge and microwave in the room for snacks and leftovers. I was really impressed with the complimentary buffet breakfast—complete with waffles, bacon, eggs, oatmeal and cereal stations as well. All around a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Kara S.,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. I am pleased to see that your stay was enjoyable and hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: It's hard to find peace and quiet next to a Ca freeway but this place offered it. Well run by a hands on manager who went out of his way to make our stay exceptional. Clean comfortable room with a good choice of foods at a breakfast buffet. The manager even asked about tea as I had made the comment about the tea selection as we are confirmed black tea drinkers. An added bonus is that it is located down the street from a square mile park so if you into walking or running you will find this a pleasant way to get your exercise.
Manager Response: Dear Donald D,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. I am pleased to see that your stay was enjoyable and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for one week during a business trip. The staff is always very friendly and helpful. The rooms are big and comfortable. I used their fitness room four times. They have several cardio machines and a room with tools for workout. The breakfast buffet is correct. We took dinner once in this hotel and it was perfect ( I took the salmon).  I recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Irotchka,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. I am pleased to see that your stay was enjoyable and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Staff was awesome and the hotel is spotless clean. Breakfast buffet was excellent and tasty with several selections. Great job! Ayres Hotel.👍👍👍👍  I am very satisfied and will book this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Sherpa47420764753,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. I am pleased to see that your stay was enjoyable and hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I spent a week here visiting my daughter.  The places nearer the beach can be pricey but this one was just right. It was about a 15 minute drive to Hungtington Beach.  Not bad at all and the location is also right for other attractions like Disneyland.  The place was very clean and the breakfast buffet was about the best I ever had. Beds were clean and comfy. AC was cold when needed. Highly recommend.

Summary Heading: Sophistication and luxury at a very affordable price
Summary: This hotel has everything thing you need, when it comes to comfort.  It has a gorgeous lobby, with the right amount of elegance.  The reservation desk is extremely warm, friendly and very accommodating. The hotel is white glove clean, the rooms are spacious and pristine.  The bathtub is so luxurious and inviting.  Location of this hotel is everything. You have complete access.  Kids adore staying here. Free breakfast buffet, parking and WiFi.  I will always stay here when traveling to the OC.💛

We visited California and stayed for five nights the end of September 2018.  We choose the Ayers Hotel after reading the Trip Advisor Reviews and watching the you tube videos.   We could have stayed right on Huntington Beach for about the same money but with less ammenties.  My wife really liked the fact that all the reviews stated how clean it was.  I liked the free breakfast, Wi-Fi and parking.   We got in late around 10:30 at night from an East coast flight.  No problem at check in except that they did not acknowledge that we were Expedia VIP guests.  More about that later in this review.   The room was nice and large.  The room was clean and smelled fresh.  After a good night's sleep we had a delicious breakfast.  Every morning we were able to mix up the breakfast choices
Manager Response: Dear Tfjm1,  Thank you for your excellent review and rating. We are delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us recently and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Stayed 2 nights with just me and my 5 month old on the first floor close to the entrance and eating area of the hotel.   PROS:  Clean, upscale all around. Very nice rooms, large, lots of space, high ceilings. Comfortable beds and pillows, huge tub, big bathroom. Extremely friendly and helpful staff. Parking is free and great, hotel conveniently located in city. Great little cantina of snacks next to the front desk.   Neutral: Pool is outside (it was too cold to use)   CONS: Smoking is allowed right outside the front entrance so if people are smoking you have to walk through their cloud to get inside; rude and gross.  Also since smoking is allowed so close to the building your AC unit if on, will suck that up and right into your room. So that was fun. Not sure if this was just
Manager Response: Dear Emperkinspro,  Thank you for your excellent review and rating. We are delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us recently and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Love staying at the Ayres Fountain Valley. You can't beat the location. Great easy access to Disneyland or the beach. Right off of the 405 and very quiet we did not hear any Highway noise. Very friendly staff clean wonderful Hotel. Breakfast on the patio is very nice as well. My only complaint which would be the reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that the doors slam every time they are closed. That makes a big problem for someone trying to sleep. If you try to close them quietly they still makes a slamming noise that is just how they close. Fortunately our first night we went to bed a bit late and got up a bit early and our second night most of the group that was their head checked out so it was very quiet.
Manager Response: Dear KymTracey,  Thank you for your excellent review and rating. We are delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I can't say enough good things about this hotel ---the front desk girls were beyond wonderful to us --the manager was great --concerned our stay was the best it could be ----we talked with the lady cleaning rooms ---very sweet & caring about everything . It was a great experience & the hotel is super clean & beautifully kept & the free breakfast was extra good & nice & a comfortable setting. We WILL be back & I highly recommend it to everyone.  And again a huge thank you to the front desk--- you are amazing .
Manager Response: Dear Virginia S.,  Thank you for your excellent review and rating of Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. We are delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you back verysoon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Very happy with our stay at Ayres hotel Fountain Valley! John the general manager made us feel welcome from the moment we walked in; he is awesome and was very accommodating! Our room was very clean and looks new, breakfast was delicious and all staff were friendly! Thank you John for your hospitality and we will return to your hotel in the future! We wish you the best :))
Manager Response: Dear Ammora2018,  Thank you for your excellent review and rating of Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! We are delighted to see that you enjoyed your time with us and hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you again soon. It is always a pleasure to go that extra mile for our wonderful guests!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: My wife and I had family business in Fountain Valley in mid-September 2018. Ayers Hotel was located perfectly for us. We arrived after 9pm, and had notified them of our delayed arrival, the staff greeted us warmly and we were in our room within minutes. The restaurant served us a late meal, Paula was extremely pleasant.  Breakfast for each of the following 2 days was clean, fresh, well organized and comfortable in the dining room. I recommend this hotel highly.  The only issue was the a/c unit was a bit noisy and made a bit colder then would cycle on when it was a bit warm. However, I will stay here again the next time I need to be in the area.

I have been staying here every week for several months. Loved it right away - as many others have mentioned, it is remarkably clean and the rooms are well appointed and tastefully decorated. I use the exercise room regularly - it has a couple treadmills, ellipticals, stationary bikes and a weight room with a exercise machine and free weights. More than sufficient for me. Never used the pool but I do see guests use it frequently.  The in house restaurant is a good option - as I’m vegetarian they fixed me some pasta that wasn’t on the menu. Breakfast is good with the usual options one would expect. There is a variety of restaurants in the area for those inclined to venture out - some very interesting Vietnamese places worth trying out.  The staff is friendly and unobtrusive. John

Hot breakfast open buffet is a PLUS with kids. Rooms are clean and nicely decorated.Staff is very friendly. Nice pool and hot tub and a lounge area outside by the pool to enjoy drinks or food. Will definitely go there again.

Giving them a plus for all the stuffs customer service. Specially the manager Mr John Mathews, he is special.  No problem is left unsolved if u ask at the front desk. Amazing! The food is delicious and fare price. Always feel am coming home when am back here.
Manager Response: Deat Bty M,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review informing others of your recent stay. I am thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay along with the top-notch service our team strives to provide each of our valued guests. Thank you so much for your feedback and the kind compliments you have shared. I look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Excellent on so many levels!  Wonderful staff and lovely hotel! Lovely outdoor space and plentiful breakfast, with lots of food options.  Thanks fo accommodating our family’s stay, particularly after a mix up that would have left us without a room for one night.
Manager Response: Dear Kim Y,  Thank you kindly for your candid review. I am thrilled to read about your experience and happy to know that you enjoyed your stay. Your compliments regarding our attentive team members and premium amenities are greatly appreciated. I hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Great value. Friendly service. Very convenient location
Summary: We wanted to be close to our favorite Huntington Beach go-to places, yet also be near our son in Garden Grove. Ayres was the answer. Very helpful and welcoming staff, nice-sized room, clean, good value for the price. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Venetia C,  Thank you so much for your kind review and rating! I am glad to see that you enjoyed your time at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. Thank you for your compliments regarding our attentive team members, optimal location, and the value our hotel offers. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We decide to try Ayres Fountain Valley instead of our go to hotel for Huntington Beach.  Very glad that we did. It is a gem. Clean and very convenient to beach, restaurants and shopping.  This is our new go to hotel.
Manager Response: Dear vegashomes,  Thank you so much for your candid review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your very first stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. Thank you for your great feedback and the kind compliments you have shared. I look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Very good service the entire visit. Helped out our mother nicely.
Summary: As usual, because we have been here before, the service was excellent, all very helpful. Rooms are very nice and a great location. Even found us a different location very close by, due to a full house, and delivered food as well. The staff Rox!
Manager Response: Dear f1nut57,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate the comments you have shared with us regarding our accommodations as well as the optimal location of our hotel. I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Very good overall but the pool was a bit dirty compared to other pools. I would suggest having it cleaned more often because there was some dirt at the bottom. Also I suggest to stop using plastic forks and knives etc at breakfast because it’s not environmentally sustainable and also food tastes better with real silverwear, but environmentally it’s a waste to use soooo much plastic. Lastly, it was too cold in the breakfast area with the aircon. Also, better gym workout area with machines instead of just free weights. Otherwise, good hotel and very nice and accommodating staff!!!
Manager Response: Dear EllandCla,  Thank you for your excellent rating and review of our hotel! I am happy to see that you enjoyed your overall experience and greatly appreciate the candid feedback you have provided. Rest assured that your concerns and suggestions will not go unnoticed and we will ensure our team utilizes your feedback to improve for our valued guests. Thank you again for the feedback and the compliments regarding our attentive team members.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This is the second time that I stayed at the Ayers  for a wedding in the area in the past two years. The staff is friendly and efficient and the rooms are lovely. The breakfast was hearty and had a very nice selection, I only wish they stayed open for a half an hour longer in the morning. Other than that it is an  excellent hotel to fit your needs when visiting the Fountain Head/Huntington Beach area.
Manager Response: Dear CHERYL M,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am glad that you enjoyed your stay as well as the service we strive to provide and the premium amenities we offer. Thank you again for your candid feedback. I look forward to welcoming back for the next wedding.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel, very clean and excellent service.  Location is perfect for beach and also for shopping. Parking free of charge. Boxes receive from Amazon or Ebay are free of charge. Very good breakfast
Manager Response: Dear CARLOS G,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay and we greatly appreciate the compliments you have shared regarding our attentive team members. We strive to provide excellent service and I am pleased we did just that during your stay. I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: First, neither me nor any of my family work for or have any affiliation with Ayres hotels. We found them by chance. They are our go to hotel. We travel to California 3-4 times a year. They are a little pricey. But, they are located in good areas of town. The beds are comfortable, have modern fixtures. Customer service is great. Parking has never been a problem. Be sure to check back for specials as prices do fluctuate. As I said we pay a little more, but we have never been disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Juan M,  Thank you kindly for your candid review. I am contented to see that you enjoyed your stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley and even more ecstatic to know that we are now your go-to hotel! Thank you for your compliments regarding our optimal location, attentive team members, and our comfortable accommodations. I look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I stayed here with my family last week for a few days. The good - the staff is very friendly and helpful, the location is great, easy to reach the beach.... The not so good - the room smelled like a locker room, every time we entered the room the smell hit us, airing was not possible since we could only open the window a few inches. The beds were awful - I shared the (queen) bed with my 70lbs son. Every time he moved even a bit it felt like a wave hit me. Since we were air traveling we didn't want to bother with shampoo and conditioner, I was surprised that the hotel only had 2 in1 shampoo/conditioner, it's been the first hotel in years I have been to which didn't have separate conditioner.  And than there was the breakfast. I was expecting more from a 3star hotel. It's

My wife and 18 month old stayed here for the weekend. We were there for her brothers wedding. This place was very clean and had a great atmosphere. There dining area was outside and inside. The outside felt like you were in Paris or France which was pretty cool with a fountain and statues. Great place overall just a couple improvements that I noticed.  #1. The elevators were slow #2. There wasn’t much help around #3. The rooms weren’t very sound proofed.
Manager Response: Dear daniel y,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am glad that you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate the feedback you have provided. Thank you for your compliments regarding our tidy accommodations, as well as the suggestion you have shared. I hope to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: It was very clean and the staff was very accommodating. Location was great. Breakfast was included which was convenient. Room was big and beds were very comfortable. I would definitely stay there again.

Summary Heading: Delightful surprise for a one-night stay
Summary: We (a family of 4) were travelling around southern California, and chose Ayres as just a place to sleep before our flight out of John Wayne Airport (SNA) the next morning. The hotel was beautiful; the front desk staff was very welcoming and friendly; the room (a 2 queen bed room) was huge, with a nice bathtub. We didn't swim in the pool, which was small but tidy. We did dip our feet in the outdoor hot tub - lovely, and they provide nice thick towels. We also had a drink at the Spoons restaurant/bar, sitting out on the patio around the lovely fire table. Very friendly and attentive bartender. The location was great, too -- less than a 15 minute drive to SNA. With AAA rate, it was a great value.

Very nice hotel-clean, spacious rooms, quiet and very accommodating! Had emergency at home and needed a room for the weekend. Staff was attentive to our needs and we were very comfortable.  Will seek out this chain in future travel sitipuations.
Manager Response: Dear Janet D,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel. I am happy to see that you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate the feedback you have provided. Your compliments regarding our clean accommodations and attentive team members are greatly appreciated. I look forward to your next stay.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Extremely friendly receptionist who help with all requests in a friendly and efficient manner. The rooms are large, comfortable and very clean. Breakfast is very good as is the food in the restaurant at night. Would love to stay again
Manager Response: Dear Geoff Y,  Thank you for your candid review. I am thrilled to read about your experience and glad you enjoyed your stay. Our team strives to provide exceptional services and it pleases me to see we did just that for you. Thank you for your compliments regarding our spacious accommodations, attentive team, and clean grounds. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This was our second stay at this location.    Pros:  location, breakfast, design, comfort, energy saving features in the room and friendly staff   Cons:  pool is awkward to get to, lobby is freezing  We recommend staying here!
Manager Response: Dear Kim D,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review letting others know about your recent experience. I truly appreciate the feedback you have provided as well as the recommendations of our hotel. I look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I stayed hear several years ago and the place has kept up with the times. It was very clean, with large rooms and the rooms were very quite. The breakfast was scrambled eggs, sausage and potatoes, with chorizo and eggs as an option. Cereal, pastries and waffles are also offered along with fruit and yogurt. Sometimes crowded, but always a place to sit. Spoons bar and grill was really nice. Paula and Kim were great, keeping up with the bar even during a 40 person party on the patio. The shrimp skewers were fantastic and the chips and salsa we very fresh and tasty.(House made). The grilled vegetables were excellent. They also make a good pizza. We will be going back to this place soon!
Manager Response: Dear Mitcheti,  Thank you kindly for your candid review. I am thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. The feedback you have shared regarding our breakfast and clean accommodations are greatly appreciated. I hope to welcome you back soon for your next stay.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I probably shouldn't give good grades here because you all will stay here and there won't be room for us.  But the truth is, this is the best hotel we have ever stayed at and use them to grade other hotels. The staff always has a smile and fun to tease.  The free breakfast is a plus and always can get a fried egg or even an omelet if the cook is asked.  The room was very comfortable with all of the amenities plus a memory foam mattress.  I give Ayers, Fountain Valley the highest of marks.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra M,  Thank you so much for your great review. Give us a call next time you're visiting the are and we will do our best to accommodate your stay. The feedback you provided is greatly appreciated, as well as the kind compliments regarding our team members. We strive to provide exceptional service and I am contented to see that we did just that. I look forward to welcoming you back in the future and providing the same exceptional level of service.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Our family stayed here for four days this month and could not have been happier!  The room was clean, bed incredibly comfortable and very quiet.  We were impressed with how spotless the room/bath were and how the staff went out of their way to accommodate our family of three which includes a lively two year old :) The manager, Mr. Williams, was kind and courteous.  He was gracious and jumped right into helping his staff with tasks and details that managers may not often include themselves in.  To see this was definitely impressive! The housekeeping staff was the same - gracious, kind and very helpful as were the front desk and restaurant staff.  Every staff we encountered had a genuine smile on their face - extremely professional and personable.  In short, if you are visiting
Manager Response: Dear gargantuan76,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review letting others know about your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. I am thrilled to see that you and your family enjoyed your stay and the spotless accommodations we offer. Thank you for your compliments regarding our attentive team members and comfortable accommodations. We strive to provide exceptional services and I am happy to see that we did just that during your stay. I look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Spacious and clean rooms in nice surroundings
Summary: We had a pleasant stay in a Double Queen room on the 3rd floor.  The entrance and lobby is very inviting.  The Front Desk was always cheerful.   Breakfast was sufficient, although it got busy around 8:30 am.  Then you had to stand around waiting for an open seat at the long counter or table. I love the proximity to Little Saigon with its massage parlors, pho restaurants, boba tea cafes, hair and nail salons.   It was centrally located near the freeway exit, and easy to navigate to other LA neighborhoods. Will definitely return for our next trip to LA.
Manager Response: Dear A L,  Thank you for the great review. I am thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. Your feedback regarding our comfortable accommodations, attentive team members, as well as our optimal location is greatly appreciated. Thank you again for your valued insight. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Had a great time staying at the Ayres while attending a conference in Costa Mesa. Friendly staff, and Matthew on front desk went out of his way to have a cheery welcome everyday.     The King Suite 314 had a full size sofa bed, ideal for our adult son to stay for a few nights. Even though hotel is close to the freeway it was very quiet.   Lovely foyer to meet guests and close to everything we needed.   Will stay again
Manager Response: Dear snckennedy,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley and for your insightful review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your five-night stay as well as the attentive service our team has provided. Your compliments regarding our accommodations are warmly welcomed. Thank you again for your feedback, we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Upon arrival both staff members were super friendly and helpful with dinner recommendations. The hotel was very clean and the room/bathrooms were nice and big. Didn’t make it to the pool and jacuzzi area but friends of ours did and said it was great, even had a fire pit! Overall really nice and comfortable stay and exactly what we were looking for.
Manager Response: Dear Katy O,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel. I am thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay and the service our attentive team provided. Thank you for your compliments regarding our clean and comfortable accommodations. I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Newer Hotel Close to Stores / Restraunts & Easy Drive to Beach
Summary: I had never stayed at this hotel or heard of the Ayres Brand, but I was very happy with my stay. The price was fair and the free parking, wifi and breakfast were great. The hotel looked modern, clean, quiet and the staff were friendly and helpful. There were a few things I would have liked to be different. The pool area and pool were very small and I wish there were central a/c rather than a window unit in the room and the hours of the Restaurant in the hotel did not include Lunch. But these things were relatively minor. I will no doubt stay here in the future.

This is my favorite hotel in SoCal. Extremely clean, well kept, large rooms, delicious breakfast each day, professional and courageous staff, close to highways, restaurants, and shopping.  Will stay here on next visit.

Stayed here with a group for a local Pastor Leaders Conference. Very comfortable and clean rooms that also felt safe. Delicious full breakfast (they had POG as a juice selection!). Easy parking. Will be looking at this hotel when we come back for this conference next year.

Summary Heading: Great Value compared to like hotels in this area
Summary: I shopped Huntington Beach, CA area for affordable hotel/motel with a hot breakfast and this did the job!  Rooms comfortable. Staff warm and accommodating.  They have a Spoons Restaurant inside Lobby area which was very convenient. Not too far from Huntington Beach pier area where we spent our day.  Very nice.
Manager Response: Dear LaughLouder,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent visit to Huntington Beach and Fountain Valley! I am pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay and that Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley provided the best value in the area. It is true that we are a great option for visitors to the Surf City area. Thank you for the great compliments regarding our team members and comfortable accommodations. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Loved this hotel! It is very clean, comfortable bed, good pillows, quiet room, nice walk in shower; bathroom area has good separation from sleeping area, and the hotel is close to everything! The breakfast was great too! Highy recommend this hotel!!
Manager Response: Dear AREDDICK12345,  Thank you kindly for the candid feedback. I am thrilled to see that you enjoyed your time at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. Your compliments regarding our clean accommodations and complimentary amenities are greatly appreciated, Thank you again for the feedback and for the recommendation of our hotel.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Favorite hotel near Huntington Beach CA
Summary: Our experience started with great customer service, then we discovered a beautiful room with tall ceilings, comfortable beds and very well laid out shower and bathroom facilities. The gym is perfect for a traveler wanting to keep up exercise routines and although we didn't use the pool, the outdoor area looked great. This will be our pick for future visits to the area.
Manager Response: Dear deethegypsy,  Thank you kindly for your candid review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed the exceptional service our team provided and the well-appointed rooms we offer. Thank you so much for your feedback and for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley as your future destination.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Nice clean room, comfortable beds, complimentary breakfast was great.  the outdoor pool and spa were amazing after tennis match.  Every one is super friendy and helpful.  Love the onsite café with beer and wine plus simple food and both outside and inside eating area,  The ladies who were working the night we were there were wonderful..Wish I could remember their names to give them a shout out.
Manager Response: Dear cmcnairn2018,  Thank you kindly for your great review and for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed the exceptional service our team provided as well as the well-appointed accommodations we offer. I hope you choose to stay with us the next you visit the area.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Everything is far beyond our expectation.  Recommended when you are in the area.  This is our home for every visit to CA
Summary: Clean with beautiful room, comfy bed, large bath and shower room.  Warm hospitality, great customer service, excellent complimentary breakfast....it is my FAVORITE HOTEL or my future home when I come to Orange county from now.  Lots of parking space, easy access.

This property is my favorite hotel in the Orange County area. It's impeccably clean. The staff is very professional and helpful. The breakfast food is better quality than the chain competition and it's very fresh and clean. The hotel is also very conveniently located as well. I have stayed at a few different Ayres. This one is my favorite.

Summary Heading: Outstanding service, very convenient location, friendly staff, great breakfast included.
Summary: My highest praise in all areas,  on arrival I was quickly checked in by Summer Duong, front office manager, and personally welcomed to the hotel by John Matthews G.M. The room was ready as promised, immaculate, fully stocked with toiletries and towels. A very comfortable bed made for a good night's rest, breakfast was a real treat, not a skimpy continental style breakfast-we are talkin' eggs-sausage -hash browns-fresh fruit-bagels & pastry-yogurt-cereal-tea & freshly brewed coffee-a choice of juice in a very clean, comfortable environment enjoyed over a complimentary copy of USA Today. In conclusion; if you relish ample free parking, a free strong Internet/Wi-Fi connection, cleanliness thru out, impeccable service and a place that feels like "home" . . . you've found it! Thank

Beautiful room with a comfy bed.  Complimentary breakfast included eggs scrambled several different ways with different ingredients, sausage patties and links, hash browns, breads, bagels, muffins, waffle mix, 3 or 4 selections of cold cereal, hot cereal, fresh fruit, coffee and juices.  The staff was wonderful, friendly and helpful.  In room ironing board and iron as well as a good hair dryer, refrigerator, free internet.  Close proximity to shopping and restaurants and direct routes to the beach.

The room was spacious.  I especially liked that there was a counter and storage across from the bathroom sink.  It enabled the bedroom to be clear of clutter.  Everything was well maintained.  The staff was very helpful and friendly.

My spouse and daughter stayed here 1 night, and it was wonderful! The staff was very friendly, the decor was beautiful and new, and the room was comfy and spacious.  We slept in and missed the breakfast time, so I can't speak to the food.  It's right off the 405, which was nice for getting to attractions and the beach.  The hotel was well worth the price (only paid $159 for a 2 queen room); I highly recommend this hotel for your next visit to Southern Cali.

The folks here are great and the food is pretty awesome as well.  Thanks for making it an incredible stay. The hotel is located in a nice area and has easy access to the highway.  The hotel was very clean and presentable.

I love this hotel ..room spotless and very spaced  Staff are super friendly and helpful  I already booked for my upcoming trip in may .. Location so convenient and it next to police station feel so safe to stay .

This is the perfect hotel. Close to every thing. Very clean. Great staff. A very good free breakfast and free parking. Nice outdoor area with pool and hot tub. Also a sitting area with gas fire pits. Really like this place and would definitely recommend it to anyone

Summary Heading: Clean room, beds very comfy and professional staff.
Summary: I truly enjoyed my stay at Ayres and would do stay there again if needed.  Staff was very courteous and respectful of your time plus the room were extremely clean.  Restaurants around the area that were good.

This is always a trustworthy hotel, John Mathews is a great manager, he kept the hotel on high level of cleanness.  The price is more affordable than other hotels.  1. Location right on 405 South & Brookhurst... close to most of the businesses. Cosco / Sam club around within 1 mile. Restaurants and shopping are not hard to find...South Coast plaza less than 15 miles. 2. Safety with free parking / Extra bonus with good items on breakfast / Fitness and Pool /  Free wifi (not great signal sometimes) 3. Always clean, clean, and very clean...  Room look great and smell like a clean air. No funny smell ! 4. Between $119 and up depend on when you book or compared to other bidding hotel sites. This is always a great choice!

I booked a room there based on other TripAdvisor recommendations and I was pleasantly surprised with everything. As well as being a great value, the interior of the hotel looked to be recently updated. It has a classy look and feel to it. The rooms were VERY quiet, beds extremely comfortable, and there was a nice continental breakfast. All in all, it was a very nice experience. I highly recommend it.

Ayers was the most accommodating, friendly hotel! We brought a group of 30 pre-teen & teenagers for a sports tournament 😲 and they welcomed us, served the group breakfast early, and even let us have a group gathering in the evening by the pool. Easy access to the freeway, airport & stores. The rooms were clean & well maintained. Would definitely recommend this hotel.

My husband and I stayed here with our 6 mo old daughter this past weekend. I booked this hotel because of all the positive reviews, great price, and prime location for the wedding we attended. Even before we arrived, I called to make sure we could get a crib reserved for our room. The employees were very helpful and noted it promptly. My husband also called beforehand to see if we could check in early bc of our infant, and the hotel was also accomodating (there was a room available for that). The room was clean, comfortable and had everything we needed, including a fridge and microwave. We did notice we could hear people walking upstairs, but it wasnt too bad. I would say the best perk was the wonderful breakfast in the morning- scrambled eggs, sausage, hash browns,

I booked a room for my mom after she traveled from Asia and arrived to LAX.  Booking was easy and efficient.  Check in was also quick.  My mom said the room was very clean, spacious and comfortable.  She was able to get a full nights rest here after traveling for 24+hours.  They offered her a complimentry breakfast that was straight forward.  There were eggs, fruit, bagels, tea/coffee.  She did not use the other amenties offered, but overall she had a relaxing experience.    Thank you to the team for helping take care of my mother!  I will book here without hesitation when ever needed!

Summary Heading: A quiet Escape - in the middle of the city
Summary: A really nice place. Very clean comfortable. Entire staff was pleasant and attentive.  From the main entrance to each room, I found  well maintained.  Hot breakfast everyday. With a slightly changing menu. I never got bored with the food.

Close to the expensive small beach towns with a reasonable price. Room was clean and there are good restaurants nearby.   Restaurant on site with yummy beer on tap, just a few steps from the room.   No complaints

Clean, friendly, blissfully quiet, easy to get to/from the SNA John Wayne Airport via Lyft, affordable snacks, full complimentary breakfast, sizable room for the price, felt safe and cozy, too cold for the pool but the fitness room was adequate, would recommend and stay again:)

This is a beautiful hotel, we unfortunately got in late and had to leave early to catch a flight so I wish we had a chance to use more of the amenities but the hotel staff was so warm and friendly, the beds we're large and comfortable and the rooms were clean and updated. The free parking and breakfast in the morning was also a great perk. The breakfast was actually really good as well with good variety of eggs, pastries, breakfast cereals, oatmeal, waffles, etc. It was not just donuts and hot chocolate packets like some "included breakfasts". Next time we are in the area I would definitely stay again!

Everything was just perfect.  I love the location, the staff and the amenities of the hotel.  There is a very good eating facility located in the hotel.  They offer a free breakfast buffet in the morning that is a step above your 2-star hotels.  It is a good value for the area.

The front desk staff was very friendly!  The room was very clean and had refrigerator. Breakfast is included and while it had the typical items the attendants were watching it to keep it full and clean. Way to go - would recommend this hotel and stay here again.

I’d come back, clean and nicely decorated.  Friendly staff.  Stayed for two days for business purposes.  I don have anything more to say but need to fill in more characters.  Like I said,  I would definitely stay there again.

Summary Heading: Great facility and staff!  Close to Orange County Airport.  Would definitely stay again
Summary: We picked this hotel for overnight prior to Orange County airport flight next morning.  The facility is impressive and spotless.  Check in agent was very friendly.  Room was spacious and well-appointed with high ceilings, spotless throughout, and with large HDTV.  Breakfast was a real treat, with excellent selection.  We found a great little Italian restaurant, Nick's Pizza D'Oro just down the road.  Would definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, good amenities for families.
Summary: This is a fairly new hotel that is well maintained and was well-suited for our family. The room was a good size, bathroom was big with a tub, and there was a microwave and mini fridge. Parking was included as well as continental breakfast. We were told it was served from 6-9am but the doors to the restaurant closed at 8:40am the mornings we were there. There is one washer/dryer that is coin operated, a pool and gym.  It is right off of the highway exit and about a 20-minute drive to Disneyland with light traffic. There are many restaurants and grocery stores within 5 minutes of driving. Although it says Fountain Valley/Huntington Beach, the hotel is in Fountain Valley and on the border of Huntington Beach. The actual beach is not within walking distance of the hotel but a 10-15

Usually, I write reviews when I am upset or disappointed about a property, but today decided to write about the Ayres in FV because I stay there all the time.  I come in from Arizona on business to SoCal all the time and I have been staying at this hotel for the past 4 years (about 5-10 times a year).  The rooms are always fresh and clean, spotless really.  The breakfast buffet is more than decent.  The standout for sure though is their staff.  They have this one young lady (I think she's from Thailand) her charm and personality makes staying at this hotel, a very added plus!  In fact, I find all their staff pretty good (professional).  The Thai lady remembers your name (first and last!) if you've stayed there before!  Amazing...extremely professional.

I have stayed here several times and it is alway clean and the staff are always friendly. There is a pool and Jacuzzi and a nice outdoor area. Free breakfast is nice and a great way to start the day. I also appreciated the free coffee in the check in area.

This is about the 8th time I've stayed here and they have yet to disappoint.  The management and staff at Ayres is top notch. Always friendly and helpful.  The rooms are spacious, clean and conveniently have a mini frig and microwave. Close to so many great places to eat and things to do.

The staff here are all courteous and wonderful to be around. The food was amazing and the drinks are cold.  Everyone on the staff made me feel welcome and at home.  I do think they should add the fresh asparagus and sea bass to their menus.  Tony is a great manager so he is only as good as his staff. Great job guys Thank you

The rooms are huge and very clean! Even the bathroom/tub/shower is spacious. I was very surprised and impressed. It was like a breath of fresh air staying here after a horrible stay we had at another hotel near Universal Studios in Hollywood. Free parking, free wi-fi. They were also very accommodating with my early check-in request. I highly recommend.

Well maintained property. Exceptional employees there to help you. Terrible restaurants! Excellent location. Very quiet. Front desk people were very helpful since I am a senior and had questions. Good price.

The property is well maintained and looks brand new. Rooms are very spacious and offer just about everything you could need. I appreciate that they have digital flat screen TV's and plenty of cable channels, it was nice to be able to watch what I normally would at home in the hotel.   Bathroom is large and the tub is oversized which was very nice. Bed was a little soft for my liking and the pillows kept falling through the headboard. Not a huge deal but it did make sleeping a little uncomfortable as we sunk into the bed. Not great for my husband who has a bad back but we managed.   Housekeeping staff were nice enough but they constantly left long hairs around the room. I didn't mind too much when it was just on the floor but was a little disturbed when I went to use a fresh

This Ayres Hotel in Fountain Valley is conveniently located off the 405, within 15 min of the beach, has a gas station near by, and is very nice on both the outside and inside. It is clean and elegant. Breakfast was warm and sufficient. The 2 queen bed room is spacious, and I especially liked the large tub/shower. I usually stay at a hotel with a lower price point, but this hotel did not disappoint.

Very clean and appealing lobby. The hallways were spacious.We sat outside by the nice and cozy fireplace. Pool  was heated for some night swimming very fun for the kids and spa was very nice and warm as well. Highly recommend this hotel wish there was more of them. We were there in Fountain Valley for a soccer tournament. We are looking into to see if there is one by Riverside we have another soccer tournament we want to stay at another one closer to Riverside.

Nice furnishings, quiet, friendly and love the free breakfast!   Great value.  The front desk people are friendly and accommodating.  Since we were there at Thanksgiving and at Christmas the decorations were beautiful.
Manager Response: Dear Carol H,  Thank you kindly for the great review. Your compliments regarding our decor, attentive team members and premium amenities are greatly appreciated. Thank you for the feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with good breakfast.  Restaurant needs to be a little bigger.  Rooms are nice and clean.
Summary: Great little hotel off the freeway.  Nice pool/jacuzzi and the rooms are updated and new.  Breakfast was decent and a little bit of variety day to day, but often the tables would be full and the buffet would run out on occasion due to how busy it was.  Access is the first right off the freeway or you have to circle around after the gas station and police station.

My 2 night stay was pleasant. The room was more than I expected and complimentary breakfast was excellent. The staff was pleasant and helpful. And best of all was that the AC actually worked and kept the room at the temperature I set it at.

Hotel staff is very friendly.  Hotel shares parking lot with police station, which is comforting safety-wise. Secure doors prevent those without room keys from entering.  The hotel was very quiet.  Room was clean and spacious.  The bed was SUPER comfy.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel- however booking.com markets rooms incorrectly
Summary: The hotel was very modern and quiet.  The rooms were a bit more spacious than other hotels.  The staff was extremely helpful.   BOOKING.COM marketed the queen suites as being able to sleep 4 people +1 making us assume there would be a couch or cot.  None the less, neither were available so we had to buy a second room.  The hotel discounted pricing but spending $340 more than anticipated was not fun.

We booked two rooms for our family. We loved it. Amazing hotel, rooms are huge, staff are wonderful, breakfast is fantastic.  I used the gym every morning, kids used the pool.   Great location and quiet. This is our second stay, and we'll be back in December.   HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

Loved the room I shared with a friend. The small refrigerator had room for our small lunch we brought for the weekend. And the restaurant had delicious food for the rest of our meals. We stay the weekend for an event that was at the hotel. We didn't have to leave anything which made it very convenient. Beds are clean and very very comfortable! I would definitely stay here again.

This hotel was beautiful, clean and most accommodating. The staff welcomed their guests almost like family and all my needs were met. The restaurant inside the hotel was really comfortable with kind and efficient staff. The chefs were eager to prepare my meal just the way I like it and it was great that it was right there instead of having to go out. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone, family or business, who is visiting this area. Close to everything and only a short drive to beaches.
Manager Response: Dear Jewell P,  Thank you so much for your candid review. Your compliments regarding our attentive team members, accommodations, and premium amenities are greatly appreciated. Thank you so much for your recommendations of our hotel.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Noisy noisy noisy. Otherwise clean and comfy.
Summary: I've stayed at many Ayers hotels over the years and have always been very satisfied. But this one was too noisy for my liking. Not only was it on a very busy and large street, the air conditioner was terribly loud. I noticed that when mine was off, I could hear my neighbor's A/C. I'm talking REALLY, REALLY LOUD.  I did report it to the front desk upon checkout but there really is nothing to be done other than replace the units.  The bathrooms and decor were updated but the bed was saggy. Still comfortable, though, and clean.  If it hadn't been for the A/C issue I would go back.
Manager Response: Dear LisaRitts,  Thank you for your review. In the future we kindly advice that you voice any and all concerns to a team members immediately so that we can address it and provide a resolution in a timely manner. Nevertheless, thank you for the insight you have provided.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: First we had a great deal on this hotel  and  I really felt relaxed there,  Good breakfast, clean spacious rooms It is fully renovated Nice bonfire in the evenings Would recommend this place totally Staff was great

My room was King Studio suite. It's spacious and clean. Bed is good. Good location. Though, it's not easy to see the white box to put the key card in to  turn on power. There must be some sign to make the box easy to see. Breakfast is good too. The staff is friendly. I had pleasant experience with this hotel. I'll be back again.

I was here for a weekend girl event. The room was nice and well appointed wit s microwave and refrigerator. The towels were lovely and the bed comfortable. The staff was quite nice and the people responsible got our meeting room brought ice regularly and made sure we were comfortable. Breakfast is included stints the in-house restaurant, Spoons. They close after breakfast until 3PM. The food was ok but not great. There is also a bar, gym, pool and business center.

Called several time for weeks to request early check in. They mentioned to call the day of, which i did and was told they would get a room ready and could possibly get me in at noon. I wasn’t able to check in until 2:45, a whopping 15 Min early. I’m sure it doesn’t take 3 hours to clean one room. They were sure quick to get us to check out on the day we were leaving though.

We stayed in the Ayres hotel while in California for a business trip. The rooms were large and spacious and the restaurant was delicious. I would stay here again if my travels bring me back to California.

One of the best hotels me and my family have ever stayed in.!! If we go back we will diffently stay here again.!! Very friendly service and excellent rooms. Place has everything u need when your away from home.

Freshly updated and modern. Beds are comfortable and shower was quite large. Breakfast is standard but very good. Spoons restaurant, with a bar, down in the lobby is nice for an easy meal. Entrance and exit is a little rough but it's due to the area. Main entrance is quick turn in just coming over the freeway on Brookhurst. Exit is only out by the police station on Slater. You can enter through this way, which is easier then driving past the entrance, back over the freeway and have to u-turn to come back. But it's quick on and off the freeway.

When I think of LA.I think of Ayris.Well,I find the hotel in the middle of no where.However,the fact that all hotel stuffs are very professional,friendly and exceptional will keep anyone caming.In addition,the hotel is not that much big.And the number of customers and employee is some how known.The hotel provides free break fast,free shuttle service when going in groups,there is out door swimming pool,the rooms are neat and the setting beautiful.I do not know if they have gym but there is park not so far from the hotel.They do not provide room service at night but you can buy some stuff like salad,sandwich from the reception.There are restaurants around the hotel an Irish restaurant is one of them,there is KFC walking distance from the hotel.I find my exprience at Ayris hotel

We stayed here for a few days while visiting Disneyland. It's a short drive to the Disney resorts, 15 to 20 minutes depending on traffic. Rooms are very nice - plenty of room, lots of bathroom vanity counter space. The room we had faced the parking lot/street, and we found there was a fair bit of noise from passing vehicles on Brookhurst road. We enjoyed the small pool and hot tub area.

For the rate I was charged I expected more amenities. The quality of the amenities was lacking anything to be desired.  The remote control did not operate properly during my stay.  I called down to tell them the remote was not working properly but no one every showed up. By the time anyone called me I said forget it.  When I requested a late check out I was told that they could not allow a late check out.  The best quality about the room was the bath tub and spacious room and large beds which I guess is the most important attribute but I would not choose to stay at Ayres again and prefer a Marriott that has much better customer service and amenities.

Summary Heading: Meets my travel needs just right
Summary: I really like just about every aspect of the hotel. Clean, nice beds, nice air, friendly staff, easy and roomy parking, good location.  Only did not like the "oatmeal" brand at breakfast--same as last year.

this is a quiet well appointed hotel especially for the price. customer service is tops. front desk even had some forks when we brought back a dessert from our evening restaurant. rooms are very comfortable and clean.

We stayed in the Ayres for 12 nights in September. The hotel is well located near the I405 allowing easy access to beaches, downtown Los Angeles and along the Pacific coast towards San Diego. The hotel was very clean, and the staff very friendly and helpful. The room was quite spacious and comfortable and was cleaned every day. On the one occasion we had to report an issue with the room, it was rectified straight away. Breakfast was available as a self-service in the on site restaurant. There was a good mixture of cereals, fruits, breads and some hot food, and eggs and some extras could be cooked to order. The pool area, although small, was quiet and relaxing. All in all a very good stay. The most accommodating hotel we have stayed at.

Great place to stay if looking for somewhere quiet. Be prepared to do some driving as there's nothing to do within walking distance. Didn't give full marks as housekeeping let the place down slightly by not replacing / cleaning certain things in the room. That said, I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear AmandaJayne9,  Thank you so much for your candid review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your experience. The insight you have provided is greatly appreciated. Rest assured that improvements will be made. I look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I stay here often. The pros are: Quiet even though it's right off Freeway 405 Free and ample parking Rooms are big and clean Beds are good size and comfy pillows Gym is fine, never crowded Free coffee all day Pool and jacuzzi are clean Check out is at noon Friendly staff Breakfast included (till 0900 and weekdays and 0930 on weekends). It's not fine dining but it's fine.
Manager Response: Dear tpham94,  Thank you kindly for your continued loyalty to our hotel. Your feedback is truly valuable as and your compliments are warmly welcomed. We look forward to hosting your next visit.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley is a Must Stay Hotel
Summary: A first class stay with a wonderful staff at the hotel.  Everything at this hotel is managed well, making you feel comfortable yet elegant.  They made our birthday trip memorable and we highly recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Dear rhawk645,  Thank you so much for your valued feedback. I am thrilled to read about your pleasant experience. Your compliments regarding our attentive team members and recommendations of our hotel are greatly appreciated and we look forward to hosting you again soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I visit this location for work fairly regularly.  The staff is exceptionally courteous.  Rooms are spacious & clean.  The staff must take extra care with regular repairs and touch-ups because it always looks fresh and new.

The hotel was clean, staff was friendly, but the bed was the worse! As soon as you lay down you get sandwich like a taco. However, I called in my reservation and the lady in the front gave me a discount.

Summary Heading: Nice family hotel, clean and fairly new!
Summary: For the price they charge, it is only fair to say that they came through very nicely.  The two queen size beds in the room was very comfortable and the bathroom shower/tub was very nice.  The bar isn't part of the hotel but the bartender was very friendly and accommodating.  The pool area is very friendly and we spent few hours there. The included breakfast was above average.  Overall, the hotel served our purpose and we will be back again next year.

This is a very nice hotel. The room is very spacious and well equipped. On the negative side is the musty brown carpet in the room. Why they choose carpet instead of hardwood in the room is beyond me.  The corridor has a nice light color carpet.  The room is clean and the service us great.  It is also nice to have a restaurant in the hotel which us not common in thus type of hotels.  The complimentary breakfast is very good.  Would have rated this a 10 if it was not forte carpet.

I like this hotel. It has a very ornate feel like a classical European chalet on the inside. The appearance of the hotel on the outside as you drive up is a bit disappointing. The room was nice, with classical decor as well, but kind of dusty and dark. The hotel has a nice outside sitting area and a pretty good restaurant. The Ayers is not far from the beach and there are a lot of places to eat near by. The parking situation is kind of a drag. I would recommend this hotel especially for the price.
Manager Response: Dear tysonroxy,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed our accommodations and the decor of our hotel. Thank you for your compliments regarding our optimal location and the recommendations of our hotel. I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Enjoyed the property everything was great. My only issue was that even with government rate it was a little too pricey
Summary: Again my only problem was the value was not there. The price was too much for what was received .  I like the hotel itself it is sufficient for our needs. The location is good. The breakfast was fine. But again it's a little bit overpriced for what it is

Summary Heading: Very Nice Hotel, Good Easy Location
Summary: I thought about staying at the Marriott which is across the street - but was more expensive and the AYRES was a little cheaper - and has a restaurant on the ground floor - which was surprisingly good!
Manager Response: Dear Wilane,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate the insight you have provided. I hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: The rooms at Ayres are the best in Fountain Valley that you will find. The hotel has an upscale feel for a reasonable price. There is a free breakfast every morning that is better than your typical hotel breakfast. The only reason I have for a four star as opposed to five star rating is that management wasn't really willing to work with me when it came to a late checkout. I explained my situation (working as a night shift nurse for the week) and requested a late as possible checkout time so I could catch up on my sleep during the day. At first they said they could not budge from the 1:00 pm checkout, then someone spoke with a supervisor and they agreed to let me checkout at 2:00 pm. I let them know that the Courtyard Marriott across the street had let me checkout at 4:00 pm so I

We loved staying in the Ayres Fountain Valley/Huntington Beach hotel. The room was very spacious, the pool was very nice, the breakfast was great and above all the staff members were all very friendly and helpful!
Manager Response: Dear 1177dees,  Thank you kindly for your review of the Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. We strive to provide a personalized guest experience and I am contented to see that we did just that during your stay. Your compliments regarding our accommodations, attentive team members, and complimentary amenities are greatly appreciated. I look forward to serving you again in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: The rooms are spacious and clean! The staff are friendly and very accommodating as well. The front desk staff always greets you nicely when you leave and when you come back. The office area and gym are also clean and well organized. It was nice staying at this hotel and we would definitely come back next time.
