Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am happy to see that you enjoyed your stay, as well as our well-appointed and spacious accommodations. Your compliments regarding our attentive team members are greatly appreciated and I look forward to welcoming you back.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Stayed 3 times. Every time is very satisfied with the room, staffs, breakfast... Location is very close to South Coast Plaza, Costco, beach... The room is very big, clean. The bed is very comfortable. It looks entirely new hotel.
Manager Response: Dear hotair1974,  Thank you for your loyalty and for taking the time to write a review informing others of your recent experience. Your compliments regarding our attentive team members, optimal location, and comfortable accommodations are greatly appreciated. Thank you again for your insight. I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: My family stayed for one night in a double queen room with a wall divider on the third floor (room 316). The room as well as the hotel was immaculately clean,with a fantastic attention to detail so good that you didn't have a need or anything missing from your stay. The restaurant and bar is also excellent,offering a happy hour and good prices on snacks/meals. There is a wonderful private pool area for a quick dip and also has a Jacuzzi.  Outside also is a relaxing sitting area with a fire pit. We enjoyed our evening meal in the restaurant,the complimentary breakfast was also a welcome treat. The hotel is apparantly 4 years old,but it still felt like new,and it's location is convenient for access to all roads. I would stay again here in a heartbeat and strongly recommend this
Manager Response: Dear davecbs,  Thank you so much for the great review of our hotel. I am thrilled to see that you and your family enjoyed your stay. Thank you kindly for your compliments regarding the cleanliness of our hotel, premium amenities, and our optimal location. Your insight and the recommendations of our hotel are greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Beautiful rooms, friendly staff, the waitress in the evening in particular. The gym is well equipped and breakfast very nice. It was a really nice change to have enough towels instead of the standard two.
Manager Response: Dear denise b,  Thank you kindly for the great feedback you have provided. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your experience as well as the attentive service our team members provided and the premium amenities we offer. Thank you again for the feedback, I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel - complimentary wifi, free parking & buffet breakfast
Summary: Stayed a few nights here during our road trip around California and was impressed with the size of our room, complimentary parking, wifi & buffet breakfast.   Not only were the staff efficient but they also were most warm & welcoming. We arrived late one evening to check in after a long car journey and were delighted to discover the pool was still open so we quickly unpacked and jumped straight in! We were lucky must have picked a good time as we managed to have the pool to ourselves.   Ample parking on site and if the spaces went at the front of the hotel there were always spaces down the side and back of the hotel where there were also access doors so sometimes worked out quicker to the lifts. Microwave & fridge in the room which was helpful when we didn't want to eat out.

I stayed here while in Southern California on Business, not having any prior experience with Ayres Hotels. It was a great experience. It was a nice, clean, and spacious room, reasonably priced, with a very friendly staff, and I liked the in-house restaurant, Spoons. I would definitely stay here again. It definitely exceeded my expectations.   My only complaint: The beds, while extremely comfortable, were not quite firm enough for someone with back problems.
Manager Response: Dear Ken N,  Thank you so much for your review and for choosing our hotel! I am pleased to read about your first experience at our hotel. Your compliments regarding our attentive team members, on-site restaurant, and spacious accommodations are greatly appreciated. Thank you again for the wonderful insight you have provided. I look forward to serving you again in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Staff was friendly throughout our stay. Rooms are up to date and clean. I would stay here again if I'm in the area, and try the other ayres locations. Pleasantly surprised. Breakfast is included but I did not get a chance to try it.
Manager Response: Dear Tawny O,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent stay. I am thrilled to see that you enjoyed the service our attentive team members provided as well as the accommodations we have to offer. Thank you again for the insight you have provided, I look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We travel to Huntington Beach to visit family and have stayed in other hotels in the area, the Ayers on Brookhurst St. is the best we have encountered. The rooms are spacious extremely clean and comfortable. I did not wake in pain from the beds being super hard which happens in most hotels. My handicap grandson shared my room and the wheelchair space and restroom facilities were wonderful. Easy to find with good parking and safe access to the streets. The complimentary breakfast was an actual breakfast with a good variety of food. Plan to stay next time we are visiting the family in Huntington Beach.

It's a nice place for people stay in Los Angels! We've got two rooms for 8 people to stay,the environment was nice and clean, people were nice too! Wonderful breakfast and service. I would definitely go there next time.

We all had a great time.  Cannot wait to go back! Staff is amazing.  Pool area is very relaxing.  Location is great! My cousin planned his wedding with everyone staying at this location which fit everyone's needs

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Activities in surrounding areas!!
Summary: Came to SoCal for my Daughters National Softball tourney in Huntington Beach. We were late in making reservations to the team hotel and stumbled upon Ayres Hotel online and buy am I glad we did!! Ayres was slightly more expensive than the team arranged price at another hotel however it far exceeded the extra expense in quality, comfort, cleanliness, overall staff, and food. there are many similar type hotels in the area but It would be hard to surpass what we experienced during our 8 night stay. they may be similar from the exterior but definitely an upscale Hotel for this level. The rooms were larger than most of the 2 queen suites as well as larger Bathrooms. the free breakfast was way better than hotels of this type. quality of food was much high quality than any other free
Manager Response: Dear josephcG6104WT,  I am thrilled to see that we exceeded your expectations! We strive to redefine hospitality and it seems we were able to do just that during your stay. The feedback you have provided, as well as the kind compliments you have shared, are truly valuable and greatly appreciated. I look forward to welcoming you back next year, if not sooner!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Just stay here. You'll be glad you did.
Summary: We stayed for just one night after a late arrival into LAX to visit family in Huntington Beach. The US Surfing Open meant all the local HB motels were booked or expensive, so the search expanded to Fountain Valley which is a 10 minute drive north of HB.  I was looking for quiet, clean, updated, free breakfast, wifi and parking and a pool and hot tub. Ayres had really good reviews and also had AAA pricing on the website. Considering the local event in town and that it's peak travel time, the price of $170/night was not outlandish.  We had a King bed room with a sleeper sofa. Great for our family of four. Check-in was smooth. The lobby of the hotel, including decor of the room, is very aesthetically pleasing. Plenty of parking even arriving at about 9:30pm.   They have an

Summary Heading: i loved the rooms how they had a privacy wall, never seen that in a hotel before.
Summary: Everything seemed new, the gym was nice a little small but good. the food was amazing the staff was great. It seemed very elegant and up kept. The four of us loved the privacy wall in the room and the location wasn't bad about 15 minutes away from Huntington beach. we will definitely be using Ayres hotel for any reason were in so-cal.

Summary Heading: Always a great stay with smiling faces
Summary: Given that this is our favorite hotel to stay at, I must say that we have never been disappointed with any of the employees nor services provided. This hotel is always busy and generally packed but with enough advance notice and reservations, we are always welcomed. I love the free breakfast.

This is a very clean and elegant hotel. I was very impressed by the room and everything on the property. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to my friends. It wasn't very far from the beach. I like the fact that there was a restaurant downstairs in the hotel.

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel for a short stay
Summary: The hotel is very new and comfortable and clean.  Rooms are of an excellent standard and very spacious.  The pool area is lovely too with very comfortable sun loungers.  Breakfast is good and the wifi worked well too.  The location is fine if you have a car as it's a few miles from Huntington Beach, but the price reflects this and it is well worth staying here rather than paying the expensive cost of hotels actually in the town centre.  There is not much to do in the immediate vicinity of the hotel - there is an Irish bar/restaurant across the road which is ok.  The food in the restaurant actually inside the hotel is excellent.

Summary Heading: The best in service and help
Summary: Of all the hotels my wife and I have stayed in, this one has the most friendly staff and always ready to help.  The free breakfast in the morning is a plus and now Spoons has taken over the restaurant which is also a plus in dining later on.

Great rooms, great staff and good location. Staff go above and beyond to please would definitely stay again! Nice pool and even a bar with very nice staff and great food. Breakfast was plentiful and lots of choices.

Surprised this is listed as a 3 star hotel which is why I've given it a 5 star rating.  Hotel is 3 years old & feels new.  Rooms are large and include a small refrigerator, microwave & coffee maker. There is not an in room safe.  Staff was friendly & helpful.  Free parking & wifi.  Good selection of food choices included in the free breakfast - it was quite busy both mornings.  We did not take advantage of their happy hour, however, prices seemed good.  This was my first stay at an Ayres Hotel & would not hesitate to stay again.

Summary Heading: Huge Rooms. Adorable Pool. Amazing Location
Summary: Recently stayed at the Fountain Valley Ayers Hotel and loved it. The front desk staff was very very welcoming and helpful and the hotel is immaculate. Our room was huge with a super soft comfy bed and loads of space. Very easy to get to and close to an In and Out which is clutch
Manager Response: Dear etpconnors,  Thank you so much for the candid review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your experience as well as the exceptional service our team strives to provide. Thank you so much for your compliments. I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This was our first stay at an Ayres hotel and it lived up to the many great reviews I read.  We will check for an Ayres hotel next time we are in So Cal!  The hotel feels upscale with the decor and cleanliness.  The staff is extremely courteous and helpful.  Every time we left or came back we were acknowledged by the front desk.  The pool area is clean and relaxing.  We loved the energy saving keycard light feature in the room.  Stay here and you will be delighted.
Manager Response: Dear Kim D,  Thank you so much for the great review of our hotel. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your very first stay at an Ayres Hotel! We strive to provide an exceptional guest experience and I am thrilled we were able to do just that during your stay. Your compliments regarding our accommodations and attentive team managers are greatly appreciated. I look forward to serving you again in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Rooms and staff are very nice. The free breakfast is always a hit and delicious. This is the second time we have stayed here for a baseball tournament and will continue to come here everytime we go to Huntington Beach for a tournament. Close to the beach as well.
Manager Response: Dear missybeebe,  Thank you so much for the feedback you have provided. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed the service that our attentive team provided as well as the premium amenities we offer. I appreciate the feedback you have provided and look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights at Ayres hotel, check in was easy, friendly front desk, the room large and spacious, small fridge and microwave come in handy, downside there no safe in the room, wifi very slow to load page, finally gave up and use my phone hotspot.  Hot breakfast included Hours 6:00 to 9:00 a.m. Food was good , overall our stay was pleasant.

Summary Heading: Always amazing service, super clean facility, quiet and convenient, great breakfast A+++++
Summary: Couldn't be any better!!  We live in Idaho and travel to southern CA 3-4 times per year.  We will never stay ANYWHERE other than an Ayres Hotel.  We've stayed at a few of them and they've all been awesome except for the one in Anaheim.  It's old and smells bad, rooms are not nice, old.   Ayres Fountain Valley is wonderful, Ayers Seal Beach is cream of the crop, the best.  Ayres Orange is absolutely amazing!  Stay at any of the Ayres I've mentioned, but avoid the one in Anaheim.

It was nice to have a 1st floor room  close to the breakfast room as we only stayed one nicht. Spacious room with high ceiling and huge comfy bed. Good breakfast that we had on the nice patio outside. Staff at check in could have been a little more friendly. Housekeeping we met in the corridor didn't even say hi!

Our experience at the hotel was delightful. We enjoyed the room, restaurant, patio, and jacuzzi. We didn't make time for the fitness Center even though it had lots of desirable equipment. The staff was the highlight of our stay. Everyone was so friendly.

Summary Heading: My stay at the Ayres Hotel
Summary: I had a short stay at the Ayres Hotel in april 2017. I choose for this hotel because I visit daily a sick friend, who was in theFountain Valley Regional Medical Center and this was the nearest hotel to his home. It was a nice and clean hotel with friendly service. The hotel wasn't cheap and the prices was different after I came to Holland. Beside of this I was very content about my stay.

I was very happy with this hotel.  The breakfast was great.  The pool and hot tub were perfect.  The room was clean, large, and new.  No hidden fees.    One might complain about the freeway, which is nearby, but you can't hear it from the rooms.

We had been wanting to stay here since we lived in the neighborhood many years ago and were not disappointed.  Very modern, clean, friendly staff, free and convenient parking, and a very good breakfast with freshly scrambled eggs, sausage, and mini waffles.  We were also very appreciative of the staff who managed to accommodate our request for an early check-in which allowed us to beat the rush hour traffic and drive to Universal Studios.  The comfortable bed, complimentary wi-fi, and convenient access to the 405 freeway, and many shopping and restaurant options in the area help make this hotel very popular.  The only negative comment was that the refrigerator lacked a freezer section.

Clean and comfy beds. Friendly staff. Clean, quiet rooms. Good shower water pressure w/ big, clean tub. Clean building. Free breakfast. Free parking. Easy access right off the freeway. Four parking spots for electric vehicle charging. Nice clean towels. Clean (though small) pool and hot tub. No "resort" or other hidden fees. HVAC unit is clean and does not smell funky.

We stayed here while our house was being tented. The rooms were very clean and the free breakfast was very convenient. I would say the staff got a 5 star. The hotel manager greeted us daily and ask how the house was coming along each day. Would definitely recommend to friends and family.

This was my 1st time staying at the Ayers Fountain Valley.  The front desk ladies gave me my 1st impression that we would have a pleasant stay.  They put us on the quieter side of the hotel as well.  The room was nice and clean, comfortable beds that we sank into after a day at the beach.  I believe most rooms have the Microwave and  larger mini-fridge that is great when needed.  Surprised with the size of bath tub / shower, nice large oval for soaking or enjoying a hot shower.  The work out room was a great size for treadmill and another area for free weights.  Hot tub outside was perfect. Arrived late for breakfast one morning, and was still able to get coffee, bagel w/cream cheese, and Orange Juice.  Again, staff seemed to try their best to make the stay pleasant.  I would

The continental breakfast was great. Many choices from waffles, eggs, oatmeal, fruit, yogurt, and more! The area for eating though was a bit tight.  The hotel is cozy and quiet enough for me. Sometimes walking in the hallway I felt as if my steps were very loud though. The room was spacious and clean.There was a fridge and microwave. I have never stayed anywhere with a microwave. The downside was the television did not have a sleep option. My only reason for deducting a star. The A/C unit is a bit load when it cuts on but does a great job in cooling the room. Love the card slot that turn on the electricity and shuts it off when you leave!!  I did not try out the pool or the hot tub. Looked nice for kids or splashing around. Too small in my opinion to do laps.  The only thing I

We absolutely loved this hotel! The room was so pretty and very roomy!  The manager John Matthews and his staff were very welcoming. We appreciated their friendliness. The breakfast was delicious and fresh! The location was so convenient to Huntington Beach and the expressway. What more can you ask for!? Thanks again! Jill
Manager Response: Dear Jillybean81,  I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your time at our hotel! Your compliments regarding our spacious accommodations, premium amenities, and our attentive team members are greatly appreciated. Thank so much for your insight and I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I stayed for a few days on a business trip. Breakfast was nice and the bar area in the evening was quiet but well staffed. Bed was very comfortable, room was quiet and the staff was very accommodating. I used the fitness facilities and found them to be rather larger for a smaller hotel. I would definitely recommend this to families and business travelers based on the location and amenities.
Manager Response: Dear FrankyP2,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide some feedback based on your recent visit. I am thrilled to see that you enjoyed your experience at our hotel. We strive to provide exceptional service and redefine hospitality and it is pleasing to see that we did just that during your stay. Your compliments are greatly appreciated and I look forward to serving you again in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at this property many times during my travels in the Fountain Valley area.  I always fine the hotel clean, people very pleasant and rooms very clean.  I like that the rooms have a refrigerator and microwave.  The restaurant is average but is ok if you don't want to drive.  Outside they have a nice sitting area and fire pit along with pool and hot tub.
Manager Response: Dear tamisp,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and the great review of our hotel! I am glad that you enjoyed your stay and truly appreciate the kind words you have shared regarding our attentive team members and the accommodations we offer. I hope to see you welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I stayed for a week. Beds comfortable, room quite and staff very helpful. Located close to shopping centers and beach. About 1/2 hour drive to Disneyland depending on traffic. Lots of close parking. Would have stayed longer but they were sold out.
Manager Response: Dear Sandy T,  Thank you so much for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley for your short staycation! I am thrilled to see you enjoyed your experience and truly appreciate the feedback you have provided. I hope to welcome you back soon as it would be an honor to serve you again.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for six nights during our trip touring Vegas and California. The location was pretty good for us, just off the freeway and near to quite a few restaurants. We used the hotel as a base for visiting Disney and the beaches of Huntington and Newport.It was an ideal location for this. We also had a day visiting the sights and sounds of LA though in traffic it took over an hour each way to drive there.   There were a couple of minor niggles with the hotel which stopped me rating it higher. Firstly the hotel didn't have safes in room, this facility was only available at reception. This was the only hotel we stayed at which didn't offer this facility.   At breakfast time everything was throw away, plastic knives, forks and spoons and cups. Maybe this was to make

We spent an unfortunate weekend at Ayres under constant evaluation and harassment by the mid management staff at Ayres.  Ironically we booked the room with the recommendation of a local sports league, which they probably pay for placement.  It became clear immediately they wanted kids to remain in their room.  They came with 16 printed policies of things kids couldn't do including many harmless activities and continued to asked children who were staying there with us to basically stay in their room or leave.  These harmless activities included being the the patio area and such.    Incredibly disappointed.  If they don't want kids and families there, I am so confused on why they advertise on local sports sites.  They did nothing to communicate their policies to us when we booked
Manager Response: Dear Jr_Flora,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you and for sharing your comments on TripAdvisor. When group leaders book group blocks, it is their responsibility to review a contract and sign that they understand our group policies and procedures. It is also the group leader's responsibility to disperse this information amongst the group members to ensure all parties are aware of our policies and procedures. Upon check-in, as you mentioned in your review, we do our part to further inform each party of our group policies and procedures by having a copy ready for all to review and sign prior to receiving your key cards. We warmly welcome all guests, including sports groups and families with children and are saddened to know that you were under the impression that we do not. We hope your future accommodations are both comfortable and satisfying and, again, thank you for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: we stayed at this hotel because my daughter had a softball tournament at HB softball complex the freeway access was so convenient, plenty of food places around the way off of talbert st. shower is nice and big, room was great we stayed in the king room with the sofa bed which worked out perfect for my two young kids. gym was awesome a little small but had all the essentials. the outside patio was great we sat around the fire pit and hung out. breakfast was great  in the morning
Manager Response: Dear Betty R,  Thank you kindly for your candid review. I am pleased that you and your family enjoyed the accommodations we provided. Thank you so much for your feedback and the compliments you have shared regarding our accommodations. I look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Another great experience within the Ayres locations (Fountain Valley).  Our company has used their meeting room facilities before as the location is good and accommodations meet our standards...where Ayres stands out is service and hospitality of the staff, EXCEPTIONAL EVERY TIME!
Manager Response: Dear stevenharg67,  Thank you for the great review and for frequenting our hotel! I am thrilled that you enjoyed your experience and the accommodations we offer. We strive to redefine hospitality and it is pleasing to see that we did just that during your stay. I look forward to serving you again.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: When I booked the Ayres Hotel I didn't expect much; it was close to a wedding and that was enough for me. However, when I arrived I was taken aback by the attention to detail, overall design and upkeep of the rooms. Not only were they large and spacious, they were up to date with amenities and had everything that could be asked for. Ayres is well worth the price and, if it were located more centrally, would definitely be charging more. Do not hesitate to stay here.

I stayed at the hotel for three days in May. It is a great hotel and serves  breakfast part of the room tariff.  Great Breakfast. Close to lot of restaurants and close to freeway. I would recommend  this hotel.

This is one of my favorite place to stay when I'm up here in Fountain Valley.  I'm from San Diego and come down quite a bit (approximately 2 times a week). It is so close to the heart of Vietnamese community (Fountain Valley, Anaheim, Costa Mesa and etc). An elegant hotel with great staffing, nice cozy gym, and the Spoon restaurant is far better than the old Asian Fusion restaurant.

This is the third Ayres property I have stayed at and I cannot recommend them enough.  Consistently clean and welcoming, and luxury at a value.  This property has the traditional breakfast room (and the food is very good and plentiful) as well as a bar/restaurant.   Every staff person was friendly and genuinely cared about my stay and comfort. Rooms are large, comfortable and beautifully decorated.  I would have been very happy to just sit in the room, but with easy access to area venues this was not an option this trip.  Next time!

This location was relatively new.  The premises were clean, b'fast was included; it has high ceilings in the rooms and the beds are very comfortable.  Service is attentive.  A very nice moderately priced hotel and it was only 40min from LAX and 10min from John Wayne airports, without rush hour traffic.

Clean, friendly and good food. Hot and cold options available. Close to the freeway but can't hear a thing in the rooms. I'm a light sleeper so it was a concern. highly recommend! Good value for the money.

Everything was great! . Breakfast we more than enough to start your day.  Rooms were quiet and clean.   Location was excellent.  Staff was friendly. More than enough parking for large vehicles. Nice pool area

We stayed here for a week in April. We loved the king room and bath, the bed was comfortable, very clean room, plenty of towels, staff was friendly and very helpful. For us it was a great location, easy access to highway if needed but also not far from Costa Mesa, Long Beach, Huntington Beach and LA.

Hotel location was easy to find after coming off the freeway.  Parking was handy [and free]. Registration persons were cheerful, friendly and helpful. Room was comfortable, clean, and inviting.  Location across from the elevators was a bit concerning, but there was no noticeable noise from them when in the room.  Controls for the room temperature and fan were not intuitive.  Buffet-style breakfast was included and the location was convenient.  The food offerings (scrambled eggs, sausage, cereal, fruit, bread/rolls) were basic, but all were tasty.  Some patrons bussed their own tables, some did not, which created clear space availability issues for latecomers.   An evening meal from a small menu could also be purchased there.  Additional restaurants were within a 5-minute walk.

Great first impression, from the beautiful lobby to the friendly staff greeting  each time you pass the desk.  Coffee was available in lobby all day.  Full hot breakfast included, buffet style.  Hours 6:00 to 9:00 a.m.  Food was good.  Need to improve clearing of tables during busy times.  Restaurant was open in the evenings.     We stayed in 413, right across from elevator and there was no noise at all.  Beds are comfortable, rooms nicely decorated and spacious, immaculately clean!  Small refrig,, microwave, coffee maker, hair dryer provided.  Free business center.   Free WiFi.  Hotel has a beautiful patio area; pool and spa.     Free parking.   Located just off the 405 freeway, about 10 minutes inland from Huntington Beach.   Definitely recommend.  Would stay again.  Need to

I really liked this hotel. The rooms were nice, modern and more importantly really clean. Unfortunately I didn't wake up early enough for breakfast but they do have a restaurant which is nice. I had a pool view, it was nice.

The property was very attractive.  the rooms were spacious, clean and modern.  I was disappointed that there was not a bar or restaurant open other than breakfast.  Breakfast was decent but closed at 9:30am...way too early for my family.

The room was very clean! Beds were very comfortable. The bathroom was very spacious, real tile and a large tub! There was also a nice vanity area with a small fridge and microwave. The staff was friendly and helpful. The complimentary breakfast was great!

I felt like I was at home !! Service was exceptional and the breakfast was great! Pillows were very comfy and I know I will Be coming back every week just to stay here for work! No more commuting from San Diego for me!

Excellent room accommodations, dining atmosphere, friendly and efficient lobby service. Full spectrum TV choices - all the ESPN you would want - but much more that large chains do not offer. Best overall for the price.

Staff was very polite and Leslie (if my memory serves me correctly) got us our early check in as requested and called as soon as the room was ready. We were on the first floor which was nice to avoid the elevator and easier access to fun and outside. There was a bit of hallway footsteps as expected on the first level but we were hardly in our room, out and about or making use of the outdoor patio which was sunny and relaxing.

I was on a vacation and was staying at this hotel, and all i have to say is that this hotel was reslly worth the money, good service, friendly, and clean, i really loved it, so i am definetaly gonna return back when i visit us again,

I have traveled for a living and stayed in many national hotels. AYRES HOTEL- FOUNTAIN VALLEY was a treat by far. It's grand reception area the minute you walk in makes you feel your not out on business but, rather on a luxury vacation. The hotel is just so inviting. They have a restaurant on site. Their rooms are very clean and the beds are very comfortable. The breakfast is not what you expect from a hotel breakfast but, what you would expect from a local restaurant. You actually are given a hotel cooked breakfast.  It's included in your rate! NO EXTRA CHARGE! The staff isjust the icing on the cake. Very helpful and professional. Thank you Ayres for doing such an amazing job! Your hotel will always be on the top of my list.

Summary Heading: Our stay at The Ayres in Fountain Valley
Summary: The hotel was very nice and clean.  We had a lovely breakfast there each morning we were there.  The staff was very nice, they greeted us each time we passed.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to stay in the area.
Manager Response: Dear jminney9,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent stay. I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay as well as the accommodation we offer and the cleanliness of our facility. Thank you for your compliments regarding our attentive team and our complimentary full American breakfast. Your recommendations of our hotel are greatly appreciated and we look forward to your future visits.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Needed a hotel close to Santa Ana for a business meeting...Rooms very big and comfortable beds and excellent bathroom area. Enjoyed having a drink in the bar and had a meal one night.  Breakfast was too stressful - by the time we got there at 8.30am there was hardly any food left and there seemed to be a lot of young children running around and you had to use plastic utensils.  Would be best just to skip BF I think.  .  Staff were all very friendly and helpful and we would stay again if we happened to be back in the area.
Manager Response: Dear justAuckland,  Thank you so much for the feedback you have provided. I am pleased that you enjoyed the optimal location of our hotel as well as the spacious accommodations we offer. Thank you for your kind compliments regarding our attentive team members. Though I regret to see that you were dissatisfied with our complimentary full American breakfast, I truly appreciate the insight you have provided us with. I look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Beautiful,spacious rooms with high ceilings. Bathroom somewhat separate from the beds allowing for some privacy.  Clean, comfortable beds. Breakfast was excellent. Hot or cold. Anything and everything that you would want to eat. Ends a little earlier than most hotels but not a problem, just gets you up and on your way earlier. By far the friendliest staff of any hotel i have stayed. The two gentleman at the desk seemed to genuinely care about our every need. Could not ask for a better stay. Highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear clritchie65,  Thank you for your candid review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your experience and greatly appreciate the feedback you have provided us with. Thank you for your compliments regarding our accommodations, premium amenities, and our attentive team members. Thank you for your recommendation and I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This is my first time staying at the Ayres Fountain Valley location but I have previously stayed at Ayres hotels in the past. Different location and the same quality as my stays in the past. Simple and easy to check in and the rooms are always clean and nicely decorated. Breakfast is always great, with plenty of choices and options. Pool area with Ayres Hotels is always nice and comfortable. Lobby is neat, clean, and relaxing. Overall another great stay and I highly recommend the Ayres.

This is my first online hotel review.  My husband and I spent 9 nights here in March before and after he had outpatient back surgery. Our experience was so exceptional that I recommend this hotel to anyone planning a trip to this area.  It began with them letting us check in at 10:30 in the morning after a very early flight arrival.  Our room and all of the areas of the hotel were very clean and comfortable.  The free breakfast offered my choices.  The staff members were always friendly and helpful.  Their exceptional service began when I brought my husband back after his surgery.  He was still groggy and I knew I would not be able to get him out of the car and up to our room.  I went to reception and asked for help.  Armando came right out with me, helped lift him out of the

Summary Heading: NEW PROPERTY/3YRS OLD/GREAT STAFF/short drive to the beach
Summary: I spent the day lounging around this hotel for a couple of days, loving every minute I had to myself to rest and enjoy southern California at it's best. The check in was easy, even though very busy with check in and check outs going on. The hotel is bright and refreshing with all the beautiful additions of vegetation placed around the hotel grounds and lobby. The rooms are clean and comfortable with familiar decor of a well appointed room. Refrigerator, microwave and vanity of the Ayes hotel. Beds and linens are the best. I am using the business center to add this review, all to myself during the day while everyone is out doing something wonderful. The wifi is free in the rooms but I like using the using the connection here on their computer.  I spent the day at the pool and the

Nice building, good size bedroom but no pleased with restaurant crew. Felt not welcome, no greetings no smiles on crew, you can only have 3 pieces of bacon per serving(good luck explaining that to your kids), front desk provided expired password for free Wi-Fi(that really was free wasn't it?), I think interior insulation was very bad we could hear every single step of guests above us.
Manager Response: Dear Erkan K,  Thank you for the insight you have provided. Though I regret that your stay was anything less than exceptional, we truly value the feedback you have shared. Rest assured that we will look into your concerns and make improvements wherever necessary. I hope you consider staying with us again in the future as our team would love to demonstrate to you how comfortable and welcoming a stay with us truly can be.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We love our scrapbook weekends and your hotel is so perfect a location for the group. The rooms are clean, well kept and comfy...the staff are all so nice, helpful, polite....and we get to scrapbook to our hearts content in the conference room at all hours. What more could someone want out of a scrapbooking weekend?

In our opinion this is a typical four star hotel with polite staff and rooms with comfortable beds. The rooms are practically equipped and have a nice size. The breakfast was very good compared to other American hotels we stayed in. Easy to find, free parking and the kitchenette are highly preciated.

I Stayed here while vacationing in the area, It was a great choice.  It is just a short drive to the beach area and beach front Huntington Beach.  It is also in close proximity to several great restaurants, bars, fast food places, coffee shops, banks and a Target.     We had made reservations online and check in was quick and simple and we were to our rooms within minutes.  We were on the highest floor, but with two fast elevators it wasn't an issue.      Rooms are spacious, well decorated with high ceilings.  Bedding and bed was some of the best I have stayed on while traveling.  Bathroom was also spacious, plenty of hot water.  Rooms also come with in room coffee, microwave, mini-fridge and a large tv. The hotel staff did a great job keeping rooms clean and sanitary.

Good central location to Anaheim, beaches, near the freeway.  Rooms are nicely appointed, staff is friendly and helpful.  Restaurant is Asian fusion for lunch and dinner.  Karaoke on Fridays - very loud; was rather disruptive to our event in the meeting room next door.  Surprised to see they were closed on Sat night.  Had a couple of nice encounters with a housekeeper named Lucia.  She went above and beyond the call of duty - deserves management recognition!

We stayed for one night in the area.  For being a three star hotel, we found the facilities clean and attractive, and the bed was comfortable.  The staff was friendly on every encounter.  We didn't take advantage of the breakfast buffet included in the room rate, but it was nice to have it available.  It was only 20 mins to the beach and located near stores and businesses.  For the rate paid on a third party website, I definitely feel we got a good value.

I think this is a great hotel. I stayed 3 nights on a business trip. The hotel is clean and modern. The room was very large, comfortable and quiet. The staff are very friendly. The complimentary breakfast was better than most. Large variety of food and great quality.  I will definitely be back to this hotel on future trips.
Manager Response: Dear candacesommer,  Thank you kindly for your candid feedback. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your experience and the spacious accommodations we offer. Thank you for your compliments regarding our attentive team and our premium amenities. I look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Wonderful facility. Large rooms and very friendly staff. We didn't use any of the other facilities but I'm sure they are of the same quality.  We were in town for a wedding and needed early check in. They were very accommodating to let us check in early so we could dress.
Manager Response: Dear jwebb8573,  Thank you kindly for your candid review and the compliments you have shared regarding our attentive team. I am delighted to read that you enjoyed your experience and the service as well as the accommodations provided. I hope to welcome you back again in the near future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Night's Sleep At This Top-Notch Hotel
Summary: The husband and I were in the area for a family reunion, and wanted a nice place close by to spend the night. We had heard radio advertising for the Ayres Hotels, and thought we'd give them a try. Excellent choice on our part! We had a very spacious room on the fourth floor with a king size bed, a small couch, desk and comfortable chair. Being fairly new, the hotel has lovely modern decor and soothing color choices. The walls are papered with a tasteful grass-cloth covering, the ceilings are trimmed with crown moldings, and there are one or two lovely prints on the walls. Everything is in tip-top shape. The dressing/bath area is spacious, and has a mini fridge as well as a microwave. The shower has popular white subway tiles and the bath itself is very roomy. Granite counter

Got on to Hotel.com and took a chance on this hotel since I had never heard of it and I was coming to SoCAL for a business trip. I was pleasantly surprised at how immaculate the hotel was. The property and the rooms were wonderful and the staff were amazing. I will definitely stay at this hotel again when I visit SoCAL again!!!
Manager Response: Dear Gerasimosratazos,  I am pleased that we were able to exceed your expectations and provide an exceptional experience. The feedback you have provided is greatly appreciated as well as the compliments you have shared regarding our team. I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Employees were so available to help, so friendly, hotel is clean and I will come again for pleasure next time. The breakfast buffet was different each morning, each time I looked forward to another good meal. Wish I had time to enjoy the clean pool. Cozy bed and couch, loved the water pressure in a hot shower. Again I have to say an amazingly pleasant crew
Manager Response: Dear Craig A,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent stay. I am pleased that you enjoyed the attentive service our team offers. Thank you for your compliments regarding the cleanliness of our accommodations and the premium amenities we offer. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. I look forward to serving you again.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Really loved the decor! The staff was very courteous and accommodating. Breakfast was delicious and we loved the outside patio, despite the cooler weather. We're from NJ, so the cold didn't bother us, especially with the great hot tub!
Manager Response: Dear alysch50,  Thank you so much for the feedback you have provided. I am thrilled that you enjoyed the decor of the hotel as well as the distinctive service the team continually offers. Thank you for sharing your insight regarding our accommodations and premium amenities. I hope to welcome you back next time you are in the area.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Nice hotel in a nice and clean city. It's recently built.  Staff were wonderful. They were very friendly, helpful, polite, and respectful.  Breakfast was good (egg, bacon, muffin, coffee, etc.) I like the waffle machine.  You can make your own freshly made waffles! Good WiFi signal; lots of charging outlets at the breakfast bar.  Easy access to and from the freeway; close to freeway but you don't hear the freeway noise.  Very safe (right next to city hall and police station.)  Just don't get the room on the ground floor.  Even though they have high ceiling, the floor does not absorb the sound.  Someone one the upper floor had a habit of pounding their heels as they walk. It's alright during the day, which we were in and out anyway. But kept walking from around mid-night until 3

Summary Heading: Great staff. A solid place to stay for business.
Summary: All of the staff are very helpful, however I do have to mention Sunny specifically.  Her sparkling personality when I arrive after a long day helps boost my spirits and energy for the evenings challenges.  I have had issues with a thermostat on one occasion and a TV remote control on another.  However both times, the staff was at my door within 5 minutes, and remedied the situation.    I would be happy to recommend this hotel to anyone in the area for business that doesn't want hotel issues distracting them from the objectives of their visit.
Manager Response: Dear mverla2017,  Thank you so much for your kind review. I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay and the attentive service that our team provided. Thank you for the wonderful feedback you have provided and the recommendation of our hotel. I look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Very helpfull staff and also big nice great and confertable rooms. Breakfast was enough to start in the day. Good location to get to the Huntigton Beach and also the the Shopping mall's around in this area.

Just a fantastic property . . . a few observations: (1) Easy access to/ from I-405 (2) Friendly front desk staff (3) The complimentary breakfast was really a cut above what you might expect from the run-of-the-mill suburban small low-rise hotel. (4) Extensive exercise room with plenty of equipment (5) Picturesque pool (unfortunately I visited on an unseasonably cold and rainy weekend so did not use) (6) Splendid exterior (7) Two very nice Arco stations, one with an AM/PM C-store, immediately adjacent thereby enabling a convenient means of getting a snack or drink. (8) The area is typical Orange County - modern, nice, clean, feels safe (9) Room was very spacious with a comfortable and clean couch (10) The room had a refrigerator and microwave (11) Nice oversize "garden" bathtub

We were greeted by friendly staff in a truly elegant lobby setting obviously designed to help you to relax as you wind down from your day of traveling. Our room was ready as requested and the attention to detail in the room design and amenities was a wonderful surprise as compared to some other "nice" hotels we have recently stayed in. Having a restaurant onsite is a convenient plus, with the included breakfast a nice feature. Wifi was decent and easy to attach to. Decent sized refrigerator next to the microwave. Everything looks new and/or well maintained. The manager was immediately available and very friendly to speak with (we just wanted to compliment him). We even had the opportunity to meet one of the owners having breakfast one morning in the restaurant. We will be back

Nice setting and beautiful surrounding.It is not way too busy like other hotels.They have clean and net room which is so inviting to relax inside.And most of all the staffs are welcoming and polite.I think I found the internet connection abit slow and the break fast service does not have alot of choices.And bytheway,the hotel is far from the airport and down town.

Summary Heading: Good but a couple of things that could change
Summary: Best part was the service. Super friendly staff. My card kept getting demagnetized because of my cell phone cover has a magnet and had to visit them at least twice a day for a week. Breakfast was awesome, parking was good as well. Gym really small but pretty much empty. No one bugged me for staying 5 minutes after closing at the hot tub which was the best part and also not busy during the week. Not so good: The shower, no water pressure whatsoever. Had to make up with the hot tub. The bed it was 'ok', I have an airloom mattress so I might be a bit picky. Construction of the suite felt a bit old.

Summary Heading: The sweet spot for a romantic getaway weekend
Summary: My wife and I have really come to appreciate the independent Ayers Hotel chain and this particular location really hits the sweet spot. These hotels are uniformly newly- built, very clean, wonderfully decorated (French Villa style with paintings in the hallways and marble floor in the lobby). The rooms are spacious, nicely appointed but not overdecorated with very comfortable beds. This company has paid great attention to customer surveys so what you will find is an early check-in (around 2:00 PM), optional late check-out (1:00 PM), pool and jaccuzzi outdoors, workout area and an excellent REAL breakfast included with the room (e.g. as in eggs, bacon, sausage, french toast plus the usual continental staples). Ayers seems to understand what people want and doesn't try to include

Head and shoulders above the competitors in this price range. Impeccably clean, great beds, spacious rooms, and the complimentary breakfast buffet was way better than I expected. The pool/jacuzzi area was also nice.

Summary Heading: More Than A Year Later And Still Doing It Right
Summary: I wrote a review on this hotel more than a year ago when the hotel was still relatively new.  I would expect a new hotel to be clean and fresh, and it was in May 2015 when I made my first visit there.  I returned to this hotel in February 2017 and was pleased to find the hotel was still well maintained.  Very clean with extras such as small refrigerator and micro.  There is ample free parking and breakfast is included with the price.  The hotel is conveniently located just off the 405 with easy on/off access.  I understand the concept of supply and demand, but if I have any complaint it is the wide variance in the day-to-day price of the rooms.  From the low to the high the rooms could double in price.

Family was attending a memorial service.  Ayres was very accommodating our wishes complete.  Food was excellent and staff quickly remembered our names. Met or exceeded oour  expectations in all aareas of measurement.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara H,  Thank you for your candid review. I am pleased to see that we were able to meet and exceed your expectations. We strive to provide attentive service and I am contented to see that we did just that. Thank you again for your review.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Great mid-range hotel w/ plus features
Summary: Through TA we found a very reasonable rate at this hotel for a couple of days in southern California. Right off the 405 it was convenient to just about everywhere we wanted to go. Ayres Hotels offers good competitive accommodations equal to the best midrange national chains at a substantial savings.  Rooms were more spacious than typical with higher ceilings and several feet wider than what I'm used to. Rooms and bath furnishings were typical but were very clean.  We had continental breakfast included and while the fare was typical there was a better selection than most of their competition. A nice feature was the grill and chef ready to cook your eggs to order.   We will definitely look first to Ayres Hotel for our next trip to California!
Manager Response: Dear fred117,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review letting others know about your recent stay. I am thrilled that you had a pleasant experience and enjoyed the value that our hotel has to offer. Your compliments regarding our premium amenities, comfortable accommodations, and cleanliness are greatly appreciated. I look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley is a polished roadside hotel located off Interstate 405 and a few miles from Huntington Beach.   The hotel is really beautiful—from its shabby chic and cozy fireside lobby, to its elegant rooms and suites. Rooms are equipped with minifridges, microwaves, flat-screen TVs, comfy beds, nice desks and sitting area couches, and ample bedside outlets.    Free amenities include: a delicious hot breakfast buffet, WiFi, self-parking, a gym, a heated outdoor pool and a hot tub. There is room service available and there is also an on-site restaurant serves Asian fusion cuisine.   Staff is friendly and the service is great. Recommended!

We spent the night following a long day of packing in preparation for moving.  The staff at Ayres was very accommodating.  We slept well and enjoyed a very good breakfast.  Very comfortable room and modern lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Mike D,  Thank you for reviewing our hotel! I am glad that you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate the feedback you have shared. I hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Very fast and polite at the front desk.  Room was clean and very comfortable and up to date.  The room was very large and enjoyable to stay in.   The staff was quick to assist and help when needed.  I will definitely be staying here again.

Ayres Fountain Valley is a vry clean and well maintained hotel. The staff are customer an service oriented and it is very confortable to stay in. Will stay again if within the area.  Equivalent to a 4 star hotel.

This is my second stay at this lovely hotel in Fountain Valley.  Paula provided excellent service in the restaurant and the stay was very friendly and accomodating.  The rooms were very clean and the beds and pillows extremely comfy.  The maid service was also professional and accomodating.  I hightly recommend this hotel and would give it 10 stars it the rating was available.

Summary Heading: The Ayres was a great surprise
Summary: Couples trip to the Ayres for 4 nights last week.   Found this hotel online and took a chance on it as I had never heard of this small chain before. And we were blown away. This hotel was a great value.   The hotel grounds (pool, hot tub, patio area) are great. It's a nice relaxing place to sit and have a drink. The included breakfasts were very good and included a big variety of hot and cold items.   The rooms are super clean and the beds and linens are excellent.   The location actually wasn't bad either for the touristy stuff. 25mins to Disney and 45mins to downtown LA which was manageable for us.   I would stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone.

Another great time, just to hide out and relax.   Summer at the front desk was a big help getting a room with a view and a few other things we requested.   Breakfast was an added treat.   This hotel is clean and located close to south coast plaza, great restaurants and other fun places to visit.

Nice clean and comfy space, high quality linens and good buffet breakfast. We stayed two nights with kids and fully enjoyed our stay.  Ideally located close to airport and other attractions within few miles ranges. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Rakesh R,  Thank you so much for the review. It contented us to know that you enjoyed your experience at our hotel as well as the accommodations we offered. Thank you once again for your feedback and for the recommendations of our hotel. I look forward to serving you again soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed here while visiting my mom for the holidays. The Aryes hotel is in excellent condition. I took advantage of the gym which was very clean and spacious. Only one weight machine but I lucked out since I was the only one there. The breakfast had a variety of options for everyone and different than your average chain hotel. The room did not have any funny odors and the air conditioner worked great. By the time we can back for breakfast our room was serviced and the housekeeping even cleaned up the mess I made on the table. We will definitely make this our hotel of choice when we visit again!
Manager Response: Dear Raedenika,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel. Your compliments regarding our accommodations and premium amenities are warmly welcomed. We strive to redefine hospitality and I am happy to see that we were able to do just that during your visit. I look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Again another wonderful stay.  Love that the FV location is there, we used to live in the area and it is a perfect location for us.  The service is always wonderful, breakfasts---love that there are many choices.
Manager Response: Dear Carol B,  Thank you so much for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. I am happy that your return to our hotel was just as pleasant as your previous experience. Thank you kindly for your compliments and the feedback you have provided. I look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at Ayres Fountain Valley. This was the closest Ayres Hotel to my family's home in Huntington Beach. This hotel is outstanding, super clean, fresh and nice, with wonderful staff. The General Manager was so courteous, very friendly and accomodating. Breakfast was great. I will definitely recommend this hotel.

I was in town for a fews on business and had a horrible experience at the first hotel I was assigned to The Residence Inn. Fortunately I was able to call Ayres and book a room for the duration of my stay. Staff is extremely helpful and attentive. The rooms were comfortable and I am absolutely thankful to the hotel and staff!!
Manager Response: Dear amandagG1710UV,  I am pleased to see that we were able to salvage your trip! Thank you so much for choosing our hotel and for the feedback you have provided. We strive to go above and beyond to provided distinctive service, I am pleased to see we did just that during your stay. I hope to serve you again in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I stayed here on a business trip.  The atmosphere and the rooms are great - and especially for the price!  Definitely my first choice when staying in the LA area.  This hotel seemed to be either new or newly renovated, so it was very inviting.  Spacious and welcoming.
Manager Response: Dear Lauren I,  Thank you kindly for your candid review. I am pleased that you enjoyed the ambiance and the accommodations we had to offer. I look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: The Ayres staff were very pleasant during our stay.  The hotel itself was updated/modern, very clean and the beds were comfortable.  The hotel is located near a major freeway, but you do not hear any road noise.  The free parking, Wi-Fi, and breakfast was an added bonus.  Would definitely stay there again.

The lobby is lovely and very welcoming. The rooms are so nicely furnished and quite large.  The beds are very comfortable.  Bathrooms are large also.  Everything is clean and neat and the staff is friendly and accommodating.  Love the free breakfast!

Booked this hotel through Hotwire and was expecting to be assigned to "that room" next to the ice machines and other sources of noise.  Instead, I got a quiet, top-floor room at the end of the hall.  Very nicely appointed and updated in a "classic" style (dark woods, pleather sofa, Queen-Anne-style desk/tables).  Very quiet.  Friendly and helpful front-desk staff.  Breakfast was above average (eggs, sausage, hash-browns, waffles, oatmeal, yogurts, bagels, pastries...)  Couldn't really ask for anything more.  Great value.

Stay at this hotel every month. Has the and most accommodating and friendliest staff, cleanest rooms, great location, and complimentary breakfast.   I want to thank John Matthew's for taking some extra time during my last visit. He was able to get my reward points all squared away and get me set up in they correct booing site. I am also Military and they have a rate that I was unaware of. So thank you John !!!   Have already book for my next stay in December. See you all soon !!  Ann

We couldn't have picked a better place to stay at.   We stayed for four nights. The room was incredibly clean and quite relaxing. They offer free breakfast, parking and wi-fi. You really can't beat this deal!   The staff here is excellent. They were there any time we needed something. These guys are not only professional, but courteous, respectful, and accommodating. Everyone here from the front desk to housekeeping, made our stay worry free and relaxing.   This place is great for families. We had our one year old with us. They had a fridge and microwave in the room, which was great for us. The bathroom was a shower tub combination, which was great for our one year old who enjoyed his nightly bubble bath in the huge tub. They also had a laundry room for guests to use, which was

Summary Heading: Spacious rooms and helpful staff in an eco-friendly hotel
Summary: My sister and I stayed here while in Fountain Valley for a family function.  We had separate adjoining rooms. The front desk staff was very friendly upon check-in and issued each of us 2 key cards - one to unlock the door to the room and one that is inserted into a box inside the room which controls the electricity.  There were 2 Queen beds in each room, and the beds were very comfortable.  Nice big shower/rub and bathroom with separate vanity area.  One evening we were headed out on foot to a restaurant which was closeby but a little tricky to find, especially in the dark.  We asked directions from the front desk clerk (I think her name was Summer?) who actually walked out into the parking lot with us and pointed the way to make sure we didn't get lost.  Complimentary breakfast

First time staying at this location. Very quick check in process, very friendly staff, very nice lobby and great location right off the 405. There is plenty of restaurants to choice just up and over the freeway. The rooms were nice and spacious. Large bathroom with a large tub. Very pleased with the stay and I'd recommend this location to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear Aaron G,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley and for taking the time to write a review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your first visit to our hotel. Thank you kindly for your feedback and the recommendation of our hotel. I look forward yo welcoming you back.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel and staff is awesome
Summary: Booked this last minute and waa pleasantly surprised. Beautiful hotel, nice staff, room was spacious, breakfast was adequately stocked and parking is free. Lovely stay and definitely book again. Very comviently located off 405.
Manager Response: Dear robinbatman,  I am contented to see that we exceeded your expectations! Thank you kindly for your feedback and the compliments you have shared regarding our accommodations, premium amenities, and attentive team members. I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I was in town for a business conference and was able to stay here.  The hotel was clean and the lobby was very inviting.  My room was spacious and clean with a huge bathroom- and I only stayed in a standard suite!  I also had very tender beef skewers and drinks in the hotel lounge and enjoyed them both as well - great service and very attentive staff.
Manager Response: Dear Leslie K,  Thank for reviewing our hotel and sharing your experience with others. Your compliments regarding the cleanliness of our hotel, our attentive team members, and the accommodations we offer after greatly appreciated. I look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel. Everything is clean and new, the rooms are big and comfortable, the breakfast is great, and the staff is very friendly and accommodating. We had dinner at the Vietnamese/American fusion restaurant and absolutely loved it! They had very creative interpretations of the dishes. After 2 days at Disneyland, my family was happy to just relax at this hotel and pool.
Manager Response: Dear ZoeCY,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I am glad that you enjoyed your stay and the clean accommodations we offer. The feedback and kind words you have shared regarding our service are greatly appreciated. I look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This property boasts a great location (Fountain Valley), comfortable lobby, rooms, common area - pool, gym.  I spent 4 nights here and had absolutely zero issues.  the rooms were quiet, spacious, and daily room cleaning was perfect.  The staff was courteous, well trained, and friendly at all times of the day and night.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear USA62GO,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent stay. I am glad to see that our optimal location met your needs and that you were pleased with our accommodations. Thank you again for the feedback provided, I look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Wonderful location and very nice and clean, excellent breakfast!  I would stay here again.  The staff was very friendly, we traveled with a large group and they were very accommodating!  5 stars all the way!
Manager Response: Dear skuewa09,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review. I am happy to see that you enjoyed the optimal location of our hotel and the premium amenities we have to offer. Thank you so much for your feedback and the compliments you have shared. I look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Very clean comfortable & friendly. They let us check in at 1230pm (normally 4pm) decorated beautifully. I liked the energy saving feature in the room but it took me a few tries to get used to it. Staff was great
Manager Response: Dear torrinichole07,  Thank you so much for sharing your feedback. I am contented to see that you enjoyed the accommodations we have to offer. Thank you again for the insight you have provided. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice calming place to prepare for a meeting
Summary: I needed a reasonably priced room for a night prior to a recent early morning business meeting. I found the hotel to be very clean, staff at front desk very helpful and kind, and my room was exactly what I expected! Pillows soft, bed comfortable, and amenities all top notch.  I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Gloria W,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. The feedback you have provided is greatly appreciated and the compliments you have shared regarding our accommodations and attentive team are warmly welcomed. Additionally, thank you so much for the recommendations of our hotel, we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Super clean, quiet, friendly staff, accommodating
Summary: Comfy beds no chemical of fragrance in the rooms, my wife has strong allergy's to fragrance and "Downy" they don't use it and it works well.  Convenient right off the fwy and close to whatever you might need.

2nd time I've stayed here. Lovely hotel in a great location to where we needed to be. Spotless rooms, friendliest staff from reception to house keeping. The restaurant is a bit out there for my tastes but hey! Would definitely recommend and return for another stay myself.

New, very very clean, friendly... safety, free parking, breakfast. The Manager always there to answer or help ... I saw the team really check up on site, top notch! Always refer friends here,,, this is the hotel where you can trust and have a good time staying. Between $159-200 a night you will get risk of worries or any extra fee from other hotels I have friend that tried $90-145 but having a lot of troubles and or complaints. If you are staying too often, you can apply for member reward points

This hotel met all of our expectations for high quality, cleanliness and fresh decor. The staff was friendly and helpful.  The complementary breakfast had variety and was satisfactory.  We would recommend this place to fellow travelers.

The Ayers Hotel was very beautiful from the lobby, to the front desk to the big and comfy rooms with good amenities. The grounds outside were well kept, the pool refreshing and overall the staff was helpful and very friendly.

I can highly recommend this property after our recent stay. It is immaculately clean, comfortable and convenient. The front desk employees were extremely friendly and helpful and breakfast was great. We even ate at the restaurant one night which was excellent. Free wifi and parking. Nothing but good.

the hotel is very near to the beaches (newport, huntington, long beach) and the area is very secure. The staff is more than helpful and kind. The room was spaceous and very clean (especially the bathroom). I can definitely recommend and will stay when I come back.  The only downside is the hotel is a bit far from downtown and hollywood.

I choose this hotel for its cleanliness and friendly staff. The rooms are spacious and the bathtubs are huge.   The complimentary breakfast is always good and serves hot and cold items.   This is my second visit and plan to stay at this location again soon.
Manager Response: Dear annaB6195TC,  Thank you so much for reviewing our hotel. I am ecstatic to see that you enjoyed your stay as well and the cleanliness of our accommodations and the service our team provided. Thank you again for your review, I look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We were traveling for baseball, I needed a room last minute. John was very helpful in getting us a room. This hotel was fabulous!!! Clean, beautiful, great location, and the staff amazing. I would definitely come again and hopefully when I have more time to enjoy the amenities here.
Manager Response: Dear Tami F,  Thank you for taking the time to share your insight. I am happy to see that we were able to accommodate you on such short notice. We strive to go above and beyond for our valued guests. Thank you again for your review, I look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: High-quality hotel throughout superior to much more expensive hotels in the area
Summary: We selected the hotel for our stay in Orange county based on prior reviews as well as a relatively reasonable price.  We were not disappointed - to the point that we extended our stay by a day and drove the extra distance to northern LA area rather than check in to a more conveniently-located hotel in that area. The hotel building, lobby and rooms are beautifully maintained, and the staff is excellent and very accommodating.  The rooms are very spacious, as are the hallways, dining area, lobby,...  It was also a pleasant surprise to discover that the hotel provides electric-vehicle chargers (including for Teslas).  I have the following minor suggestions: 1. The breakfast, while good, could be improved a bit.  Although we discovered we could custom-order eggs, this was not

Summary Heading: Great Vacation w/ a Great Hotel!!
Summary: Came back to the OC for some vacation and chose to stay here again.  This is a great hotel.  It's very clean and the location is perfect for an OC vacation.  I would recommend to anyone and hope to make it back myself.
Manager Response: Dear Singon S,  Thank you kindly for your loyalty to our hotel! Your feedback is greatly appreciated, it is always a pleasure to provided attentive service to our valued guests. Thank you so much for your recommendations of our hotel, we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I had never stayed at an Ayres hotel before, and I was very surprised by the outstanding service by everyone from check in to check out.   Great value in the price I paid for a Wednesday night stay.  The front desk staff was super friendly and efficient. The rooms were spacious and very comfortable and clean. Breakfast was free, fresh and had good options...although ending at 9 is a little early. Wifi worked very well. The pool area was comfortable, clean and inviting.  15 minutes to Huntington beach.   I would definitely stay here again next time I'm in the area.
Manager Response: Dear JohhnyOnTheRoad,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent stay. I am thrilled to see that you had a good first impression. We make it our mission to provide attentive service to all of our valued guests. Thank you kindly for your insight, we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We had a wonderful stay. We always enjoy staying at Ayres Hotels because they are so clean and comfortabe.  The breakfast which is I clued is goo too! The guest service is also wonderful! We will definitely stay here again!!

Excellent hotel with hot breakfast, comfort bed. The room is very clean, and with refrigerator and microwave. Staff at front desk are very helpful. WIFI speed has improvement space though. Definitely will recommend this hotel to friends.

My wife and I stayed at the hotel on out wedding night. We checked in late, but had a very comfortable night. Breakfast the next morning with our family was very good. Great experience overall and would recommend the hotel to anyone

Solid business hotel with an obvious, and laudable, green streak. The rooms are comfortable and surprisingly spacious (especially given their cost), and the staff is very friendly. One drawback, this hotel is near just about nothing except, you know, work.

Great location (next to the fountain valley police department). Very nice hotel, great rate, great staff and wonderful room.  Would not change anything.  Never visited this hotel chain, but would recommend this group of hotels to everyone going to southern California. Room was fit for a king and the bed was fantastic! Best night of sleep ever.

I love this hotel, t's a brand new hotel, very clean, great beds, good breakfast and amazing location. Very polite staff too. Good internet connection, and very close to the freeway, so you have easy access anywhere.
Manager Response: Dear Glaucia A,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent stay at our hotel. I am pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay and truly grateful for the kind compliments you have shared regarding our exceptional team. Thank you again for your review and the valuable insight you have provided. We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Hidden Gem best value in So Cal
Summary: As a weekly business traveler typically staying at high end hotels this was an amazing find!  Large modern clean room, friendly service, free breakfast great location and reasonable priced.  I almost hate to share this hidden gem,
Manager Response: Dear Debbie W,  Thank you so much for the great review you have shared. I am humbled that you hold our hotel in such high regard. We strive to redefine hospitality and I am thrilled to know that we did just that during your stay. Thank you kindly for your compliments regarding our attentive team and welcoming accommodations. We look forward to serving again!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: I've stayed her numerous of times and every time the staff is friendly and always greets you with a smile. The hotel is beautiful and the rooms are amazing. Comes with free breakfast, Wifi & has a frig in each room. The frig is a plus for me!! :) The room is big and even has a sofa area which gives you that added space. There's also a great trendy restaurant downstairs and depending on the nights, offers live entertainment.
Manager Response: Dear katvu4,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent stay at our hotel. I am pleased to that you enjoyed your stay and truly grateful for the kind compliments you have shared regarding our amazing team. Thank you again for your review and the valuable insight you have provided. We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel--But Small Rooms and Pool
Summary: We recently stayed here for a soccer tournament of Labor Day Weekend.  We arrived on Friday and checked out on Monday. The highlights of the hotel include: -It is only three years old and is very clean -The staff is friendly and professional  -It is in a great part of town just off the 405 -There was plenty of parking near the entrances (both front and back)  The things that I thought were below my expectations were: -The swimming pool is very very small. Like it was almost at afterthought.  It is he smallest swimming pool that I have seen at a hotel.  The hot tub was also very small and only able to accommodate 4-6 people comfortably  -The fitness center is very small and not well lit. It was hard to work out because it was so cramped and poorly lit.  -I ran out of hot water
Manager Response: Dear SDJ77,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor letting others know about your recent experience at our hotel. Your compliments regarding the cleanliness of our accommodations and our attentive team are greatly appreciated. Nevertheless, I regret that certain aspects of our accommodations left much to be desired for you. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to serving you in the future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This hotel is what you would expect from any in this category. Rooms were spacious and clean, it was quiet at night, breakfast was fine (more than just muffins and juice), and parking was free. A couple of things: We weren't " wowed" by the staff - upon check in we stood at the front desk waiting to be acknowledged by a girl who was preoccupied and wouldn't even look at us. There were 5 of us, wanting to check in to two different rooms, and she walked back and forth to the back room and finished her work at the front desk without even so much as a "hello". Not a fantastic first impression. Also, the parking is free but not exactly ample. If you are coming back late at night you might have a short walk. This isn't exactly a walkable area (most of Fountain Valley isn't) so don't
Manager Response: Dear Elvis Z,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent stay at our hotel.
