We had drinks and delicious appetizers at Fusion BItes. It was just terrific!

We stayed at the Ayres Hotel in Fountain Valley for 2 nights, as our daughter was having her baby nearby. It's close to the hospital and lots of places to eat, but you need a car.  The staff is Great!! The hotel is about 4 years old and a very nice surprise considering the one we stayed at in Yorba Linda  in July was so dissapointing.  The bed was comfortable and I usually don't find that in hotel beds. The pillows were even good.  I usually bring my own down one but forgot and these ones weren't hard and stiff like a lot are. Everything was nice and seemed new and was affordable especially with the AAA rate. Great place to stay in Fountain Valley. All of the Ayres hotels should look like this one and follow their professional example in customer service!!

I stayed here last weekend and was blown away.  Beautiful well appointed open lobby.  Rooms are spacious with tall ceilings and stylishly decorated in neutral and calm colors.  Beds are comfy. Enjoyed a cocktail in the evening by the pool. The hotel was so quiet and practically empty, very surprising.  No problem parking, plus it's right next to the police sation ( safety perk).  Amanda / Manager was helpful with my room request.  Highly recommend this wonderful hotel!

Summary Heading: Very quick stay as we drove in from Phoenix for the night to hit beach and take in a ball game.
Summary: Hotel very modern and clean. Breakfast included in the morning was great as we needed to hit the road by 8AM. Room was large enough for our family of three. Nice to have fridge and Microwave in our room. Perhaps what it could use is an in room safe? Close to Huntington Beach and the Angels Stadium is why we chose.

We enjoyed our stay at the Ayres Hotel.  The staff is pleasant, the lobby chic and the  breakfast very complete with hot foods.   We happened to stay in a room that the carpet needed cleaning which was a surprise because everything else is very clean.   The pool is small and does not have any umbrellas but the outside eating area is nice.    Did not try thr restaurant but have heard it is good.

we enjoyed our brief stay. The room was beautifully appointed, clean, and very comfortable. This hotel fit our needs for a quick stay near our family for a night perfectly. Everyone was very helpful and courteous.
Manager Response: Dear lvcarr,  Thank you so very much for the feedback you have provided us with. We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate the kind compliments you shared regarding our accommodations and amazing team members. Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Susan O'Brien-Moore General Manager

Summary: Outstanding rooms and great service. My first visit but will look forward to be next trip!  Breakfast was excellent and the rooms are very spacious and comfortable beds! Service was outstanding and front desk was very helpful and friendly. I highly recommend this hotel. It is a keeper!

Came down for a nice family get away. Great location anything and eveything no more than 10min drive from eveything. Hotel staff was very friendly make you feel like your at home. All in all will be staying there again and agian.

Family of four stayed comfortably in a double queen suite.Not really what I think of when I think suite-2 beds ,desk and chair, and larger chair. Room was big and beds comfortable enough for my 11 and 17 year old boys to share. Vanity separate from large bathroom.WiFi excellent and free. Breakfast ok. Not cooked to order like other Ayres properties.Front desk very helpful.Nice room and great rate for an otherwise expensive area.Would definitely stay again.

Summary Heading: Nice and value hotel for vacations and business
Summary: Clean,safe and would strongly advise business, tourists and trainees to select this hotel.  It's the best value for what you pay.  Employees are friendly ,cooperative and very helpful.  Location is great away from the traffic easy access and reasonably close to all attraction of Newport and the beaches.

Summary Heading: You just can't go wrong at the Ayres Fountain Valley
Summary: We come down to HB for my daughter's softball tournaments 3 or 4 times a year. The team always stays here. From complimentary breakfast to spacious rooms, fire pit and pool to an amazing staff. From the time you check in to the time you check out, this staff ensures happiness with all of their guests. One morning at breakfast they had taken the coffee to refill, the manager saw me looking, I never said a word, and went to the kitchen and brought me a fresh cup. And to top it off, it is ALWAYS clean. We love this hotel and wish there was one in every city we travelled to!

It's all good, clean, new, friendly staff, good beds, well insulated and quiet. Breakfast was so so but we didn't go for the breakfast.  Super close to freeway access, South Coast Plaza, Huntington Beach etc

Courteous staff and an excellent location.  Easy access to highway and close to John Wayne airport.  The room and facilities were clean and well maintained.  This was our first visit to the Ayres and we would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share a review about your experience at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! Your feedback is truly important to us. It overjoys us to be your first of hopefully many stays at Ayres Hotels. Thank you again for your review and we hope to welcome you back again soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Very attentive and friendly staff around. One of the days I was there had was a problem with the internet but the desk kept their cool and all of us patient. Also the breakfast was diverse and well received by the guests around me.
Manager Response: Dear Todd J,  Thank you for sharing some feedback about your experience at our hotel. It is great to hear that our team was able to resolve the issues in a timely manner so as to not spoil anyone's visit. Thank you again for your review and look forward to seeing you soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Spent 5 nights at Ayers while in town for a Pastor's Conference.
Summary: My wife and I were very pleased with this hotel. We enjoyed the larger room, quiet floor, and everything was super clean. Also loved the exercise room and the nice pool / deck area. The staff was always very pleasant to deal with. We highly recommend this hotel.

We were very satisfied with our stay at the Ayres Fountain Valley. The room were excellent, the beds were very comfortable an the hot breakfast each morning was delicious. We will definitely stay here again and recommend to others.

I picked the Ayres Fountain Valley to celebrate my birthday and to determine the quality vs. cost for a future family reunion event. The aspect that sealed the deal was the restaurant, Fusion Bites, and Rosa, a consummate profession who made my birthday dinner so very perfect. The hotel staff was excellent, kindly allowing for an early check in (the manger tracked us down with the news while we enjoyed a drink in the bar). We enjoyed the spa (pool was so cool, it was not enjoyable) and the outside seating and music. We will return and probably select it as our family reunion hotel destination (will check pricing next summer). Thank you for a most wonderful experience!

Great place to stay with the family. Very clean the staff was wonderful with helping out with things that you need. Location was close to our soccer tournament. Also the rate was pretty good. Would highly recommend.

This is the second time we have stayed here, so clean, beautiful décor, friendly staff.  Breakfast is great, although can get a bit frantic  Would be better if the restaurant area was a bit larger. Pool and spa are wonderful. LOVE IT.

Summary Heading: After 4 visits it just keeps getting better
Summary: Like a neighborhood bar where everyone knows your name...  We have stayed here 4 times now for multiple nights each stay. Why do we keep coming back?  Rooms are large and comfortable, always clean and quiet. We come to Southern California often and while our tastes have moved to beaches and boating from Disney we can stay here and do it all- 20 min to Disney and 10 minutes to beach. And I can sleep in as I never hear anyone in the hallways at all, ever. No families of 10 people running down the hall all chasing six sugar rush fueled kids at 7 am to go to Disney in the morning. They might be here but we never hear them. The Resturant is quite good in its own right- we ate there for the first time this trip for dinner and food and service very good as well as reasonably priced.

Very nice and clean.  The beds were so comfortable and the sleep we got was awsome.   Breakfast was great with plenty of food choices and restaurant was good, especially outside dining area.  The staff was extremely friendly.

Clean, friendly staff, good full complimentary breakfast with something for everyone and close to anything we needed or wanted to do. Plenty of restaurants to choose from and the beach was 10-15 minutes away. Hotel restaurant was great and perfect if you didn't feel like going out.

Over joyed with the quality of this hotel for the price.  The moment you walk in the door, the friendly and professional staff is eager to welcome you.  We usually stay in 3+ to 4 star hotels and would rate the Ayres a 10 in cleanliness and room comfort. The free breakfast buffet was fresh and offered a wide selection healthy foods. The location is close to Huntington Beach and within minutes to every shopping need.  We will definitely  make this our #1 choice when visiting the area again.

The hotel and the room are spotlessly clean, the staff is helpful and friendly and all the little touches that contribute to a comfortable stay are there.  I was very impressed with the overall quality and comfort of this hotel.

Summary Heading: Clean and safe with great food!
Summary: The room was clean and new. The hotel is beautiful and completely safe as a small branch of the local police department shares the same parking lot. Our favorite part was the restaurant....Fusion Bites. Excellent complimentary hot and cold breakfast selections, and the restaurant's Asian inspired menu was fantastic.

Our team played a tournament  1 mile away. The hotel was clean and services  was perfect.  I will love to stay here again. Whenever  I travel I will look for an Ayres  hotel wherever  I go.   Best regards! Andy

Customer service was amazing, room was clean and comfortable, the heated pool and jacuzzi was nice and the complimentary breakfast was delicious. Overall a great experience. Can't wait to return. Ty!!

Summary Heading: It's the little extras that make the biggest impression
Summary: From the minute we checked in, to the moment we left, we were so impressed by the little details that helped set Ayres apart!  The lobby is just gorgeous and welcoming.  The chandelier is spectacular. The person who checked me in was so warm and friendly, even notice that my birthday had been just about a week ago and wished me a Happy Birthday. The room was set up for every convenience and for as much privacy as one can have in a hotel room.  I loved the microwave and decent size mini fridge - and personally love that there is no food in it to have to cram my dinner leftovers around to keep them fresh or worry that it'll wiggle whatever it's stocked with and I'll get charged by the automatic sensors.    The room had quality, elegant dresser, desk and beds, but what I loved most

We were very pleased with our stay. Big room with fridge and microwave, good breakfast with hot and cold offerings and plenty of seating, very friendly staff, convenient location. Wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Teri B,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. We are glad to hear that you were pleased with your stay. Thank you for the compliments regarding our complimentary breakfast and our amazing team members. Thank you again for the wonderful review and we hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: The hotel was wonderful. Our only nit was with the variety of offerings at the breakfast bar. We ate the breakfast four times. The only fresh fruit offered was apples and bananas, which you can get anywhere. California is the produce state! Slice up some cantalope, honeydew, watermelon and grapes so we don't have to fill up on eggs and fatty meat every day. Embassy Suites, Hampton, Holiday Inn Express offer sliced fruit. Also, add some non-sugary fiber cold cereal. Thanks for asking for feedback.
Manager Response: Dear Stephen F,  The vital feedback you have provided is greatly appreciated. Thank you for the kind compliments regarding our wonderful hotel. We graciously welcome the input you have provided in regards to expanding the food made available during breakfast. Nevertheless, it pleases us to hear that you had a pleasant stay despite our breakfast being sub-par in your opinion. Thank you again for the review and we hope this does not keep you from returning to our hotel.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: My family and I just stayed here and will definitely be back.  The rooms are clean, the pool is beautiful and the included breakfast was amazing. The staff, including the General Manager, is very friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Carlos G,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to share a review on TripAdvisor regarding your most recent stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and indulged in our complimentary full American breakfast. The compliments you have shared regarding out hotel are greatly appreciated. Thank you and we hope to see you again very soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We came here for business and really enjoyed this hotel.  Wifi was adequate, room was big and comfortable, pool area was beautiful, breakfast included was tasty and filling.  Beds were wonderful; quiet hotel.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear PK6,  Thank you kindly for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor letting fellow travelers know about your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! We are truly pleased to see that we were able to meet your needs and provide the exceptional customer service you deserve. We truly appreciate the feedback you have provided and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: So impressed! My friend and I just stayed at this hotel this week and we were over the moon about it. Here are some highlights to point out:  1. Affordable. They even had a AAA discount. 2. Clean. Everything was new, updated, well designed and clean. 3. The restaurant downstairs had great food so we didn't even have to leave the hotel. 4. The hot tub was nice. Although the way to get to the pool entrance was very odd. 5. The beds and pillows were amazing. (And I am a snob in regards to this). 6. The hotel was easily found right off the 405 and was directly next to a police station and fire station which gave me the feeling of added security and safety.  7. The staff was very kind and helpful.  I would go back for sure! Loved it.

Excellent perfectly clean , great breakfast included with stay.15 min from beach..Fabulous, would definitely come back & recommend this hotel stayed in two queen suites. Very roomy. Staff was very sweet.

This is my first time staying at the Ayers hotel. I usually stay at the courtyard across the street and for the same price Ayers was much better . The breakfast that is included is great!  The hotel is very clean and nicely decorated . The room was clean and comfortable .
Manager Response: Dear Angelica A,  We greatly appreciate the time you took to write a review informing fellow TripAdvisor travelers about your most recent stay at Ayres Hotels Fountain Valley! We deeply appreciate the opportunity you have given us by allowing us to host you and are glad we were able to make a positive impact during your stay. Thank you kindly for your compliments in regards to the value of our hotel and our signature complimentary breakfast we offer. Thank you again for your review and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This is one of the nicest Ayers properties we have been too. The check in process was swift, our room was spacious and quiet, the breakfast was delicious and the pool was the perfect temperature! Restaurant was awesome and the fire pit was a nice touch~ Great stay!

The Ayres Hotel was a great place for a baseball tournament weekend.  The staff could not have been more friendly and the hotel is practically new!!  The pool and hot tub were clean as was our room.  Breakfast was great!!

The hotel is very clean, spacious and comfortable. The front desk staff are very friendly and welcoming. It is my favorite place to stay every time I'm in town. I highly recommend this hotel for business and/or pleasure.

We had a great stay with our son's baseball team!  Everyone was very friendly and tolerant of boys who wanted to have fun with their friends.  Just wished there was more than one washing machine and dryer, and that breakfast was available longer...

Summary Heading: I Don't Recommend this hotel for families or Groups
Summary: Walked in the lobby of the hotel several times and found spots on the floor and it was not cleaned up for quite some time. Restaurant staff are very rude! Menu in restaurant does not offer much variety or accommodate children's food needs. Had to order pizza 2 nights in a row to feed my children and their friends. We came with 4 large baseball teams/families. No outside area to mingle and have adult time while kids played in pool. The kitchen staff was rude and kicked us off of the patio. We then had to keep spending $ if we wanted to be by the fire pit or sit in a lounge chair outside. Ridiculous! Where are hotel guests supposed to socialize other than the small pool area? The plus side was the complementary buffet breakfast. There they offered a variety of hot and cold

After near a month of road tripping around the west coast of America we decided to stay at Ayers Hotel, Fountain Valley. The hotel was close to friends.  Our room was very comfortable ,quiet and relaxing. This hotel is very,very clean. Staff were pleasant and very helpful. Thanks to all staff for making our stay a pleasure.

Excellent Hotel, staff are very nice and helpful specially the General Manager of the Hotel is so kind and very profestional.Service is very good and so breakfast, location is very convinience to wherevere you need to go.Strongly recomend to other.

We only stayed one night and got a great rate but would have paid a lot more. Honestly the most comfortable hotel bed ever. We had a room with 2 queens which were separated by a partial wall which would be handy if you needed privacy. Huge bath, great TV. Staff were soooo nice. Delicious free breakfast!

Ayres Hotel was an awesome experience for myself and my girls.  I would stay there again.  They had a great deal for the AYSO tournament we were playing in. The bathtub was so huge that 5 of my U16 players sat in there together.  The pool was a little small.  The room was a little stuffy but nothing opening the window couldn't solve.

Loved it great location not far from the beach at all..weather wasn't great while my wife and I stayed there but no problem we kept pretty busy. Great places to eat nearby and my wife really enjoyed the manager he's awesome
Manager Response: Dear Makk L,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write review to regarding your most recent experience at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! It is truly a delight to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us as well as our optimal location. Thank you so much for your kind compliments and it would be an honor to welcome you back to our hotel in the near future!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Nice hotel with a "boutique hotel" feel. Large rooms and the large refrigerator and microwave are a bonus. Convenient to 405 and the beach. Loved the outdoor porch area outside the restaurant. Well done! Friendly staff.

We are always cordially welcomed by name!  Simply amazing to see such wonderful customer service.  Our room is always very clean, nothing's out of order.    We appreciate the consistency of cleanliness, and customer service.  We stay frequently as we have children we visit here.

My husband and I originally wanted to stay at one of the Huntington Beach hotels on Pacific Coast Highway for two nights but when looking at prices, this one was about $300 less than those hotels and still very close driving distance (5 mins or so) to the beach areas.  Our stay was very pleasant and quiet.  The hotel is being renovated a little downstairs which made it kind of awkward to get into the elevators.  I would have rated this 5 out of 5 but the only reason I did was because of its location. I would definitely stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear MCF_86,  Thank you kindly for the valuable feedback you have provided us with. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Please accept our most sincere apologies for any inconveniences caused by the renovations and for our location not being up to par. Thank you once again for your review and we genuinely hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: this is a nice hotel for doing business in and around the south LAX area.  the rates are for business people not your regular traveler.  the grounds are simple with food places across the street and in the lobby.  the rooms are BIG and have the frig and micro so it is nice to bring something back and have a place for left overs
Manager Response: Dear Frank M,  Thank kindly for the insightful review you have written about our hotel. We greatly appreciate the compliments you have shared regarding our hotel and the exceptional value we offer for those who are traveling for business. It is wonderful to read that you enjoyed your stay as well as the in-room amenities that we offer. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Beautiful and clean hotel. First room we were assigned smelled like cigarettes, but they immediately gave us a new room when we went back down to the lobby.   Weekday breakfast ends at 9am which was a bummer because we were out all morning and got back at 9:15. Not a big deal, our fault for not asking, 9am just seems early.
Manager Response: Dear samanthawa27,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor informing fellow travelers about your most recent experience at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! Providing exceptional customer service is our top priority, so it is truly satisfying to hear that we were able to salvage your visit by moving you into a more suitable room. Thank you for your feedback and we would be delighted to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: clean, sizable sleep & work area, nice bathroom. Convenient off the freeway and other areas, including Fountain Bowl where I was for a tournament. Very quiet considering close proximity to the freeway.

This was our first stay at an Ayers property.  We were very pleased with our overall experience.  We felt they did a great job in nearly every category such as: cleanliness, location, staff, maintenance of grounds, etc.  No real complaints and mostly all positives.  There were two minor areas that could use a little improvement.  The included breakfast was okay, but nothing great.  The blower to the air/heater in the room was a little loud.  Overall a job well done.  We plan to return we come back to the area.
Manager Response: Dear Nick M,  We are utterly thankful for you taking the time to write a review about our hotel based on your most recent stay. It is delightful to hear that you enjoyed your first stay with us and we thank you sincerely for giving us the opportunity to serve you! We greatly appreciate the input and the valuable feedback you have provided us with. Once again, thank you for your review and we hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: very clean. right off fwy. wish they had an actual bar to lounge and have drinks. bed was comfortable. back patio was nice. maid service was very nice.  I didn't need service because we checked in very late, but she insisted on giving me new towels and taking out the trash at a minimum

Wonderful vacation! We enjoyed the super clean and new hotel. We have stayed at Ayres before, but this was our first time at Fountain Valley. It was centrally located for our destinations (beach, Knott's Berry Farm, etc.). Nice sized room and the bed was amazingly comfortable. We enjoyed the hot breakfast including waffles! Mmm... The pool was a little too cool for us, but we soaked in the hot tub. Excellent stay and affordable rates. We will definitely return!
Manager Response: Dear Catherine E,  Thank so very much sharing your review on TripAdvisor to let fellow travelers know about your experience at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your vacation and are honored that you chose us as your destination. Thank kindly for the compliments regarding our ideal location, the accommodations we have to offer, and our delectable breakfast. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Booked two rooms online, I never heard of the hotel chain, pictures looked good and price was reasonable. Showed up early morning knowing checkin was in the afternoon but our family was headed to a funeral and we needed to change and freshen up from the flight over. The hotel staff was allowed us to check into our rooms and even offered us breakfast.  Overall, the hotel was very clean, comfortable, quiet and the decor was nice. The hotel staff was very accommodating and friendly. Considering the price we paid for the one night we stayed ($155) I would say the hotel experience was worth 3 times that and we would definitely stay at an Ayers hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear lastkid,  Thank you kindly for the outstanding review you have written regarding our hotel and for the amazing opportunity you have given us! We are honored to have been able to provide exceptional service in your time of need. It pleased us to read that you enjoyed the value of our accommodations and we greatly appreciate the kind words you have shared. Thank you again for your review and we genuinely hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Pretty community.  Safe area and easy to get to from HWY 405.  Police station is right next door and we did not hear the sirens at all during our 4 day stay.  Lobby is gorgeous, as well as the patio and pool/hot tub area.  Lime trees on property. Beautiful succulents and orchids. Library is right down the block and has pretty garden walk!
Manager Response: Dear 623cynthia01,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review to inform others about your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! We are absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our prime location. Your kind compliments regarding our comfortable lobby and relaxing pool area are greatly appreciated. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel in a Great Location
Summary: This is a great place to stay.  Beautiful hotel with great amenities, and it is centrally located to take advantage of many activities in the area.  The eating area and patio make you feel like you've gone out to a nice restaurant. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Sally G,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review written in regards to your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay as well as the signature amenities we have to offer. Our optimal location was carefully planned out and we are so glad to read that it worked out for your needs! Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This was a beautiful hotel, I would of loved to have been able to stay there the entire time we were in LA, The price was great, the rooms were spacious and clean they didn't charge for parking like the hotels in LA do, the breakfast was wonderful. I will be staying there on my next trip and next time I will make sure I can stay there the whole trip.

This place was wonderful, friendly staff, rooms nice & clean, banquet room had plently of chairs for our event. Jacazzi /pool area setting area with fire pit is awesome. Breakfast was very good & fresh.

I was very happy with my stay. Even happier with the rate. I worked for a hand full of hotels in the past and this place exceeded my expectations x10. My son is a travel baseball player and I've paid more for rooms not even half as nice.

This hotel was easy to get to and pretty close to all the attractions I was looking to visit. I was greeted by friendly staff as I entered the building and quickly checked in. I was pleasantly surprised to find my room was very clean and in excellent working condition. The bed was extremely comfortable. I had a microwave, refrigerator and a large soaking tub. I was however unable to find a blow dryer (which I never have to pack usually) and the doors of the hotel shut quite loudly so you are able to hear people coming and going. Overall, I was very impressed and will most definitely be booking here again.

I am a very picky person when it comes to cleanliness, i could not of asked for a cleaner room! i would highly recommend this hotel. Beautiful hotel with very friendly and helpful staff. Not to mention the continental breakfast was the best we have ever had!!

Summary Heading: Comfy king bed and pull-out couch
Summary: The place was kept very clean. The facilities may be new or at least newly renovated. There is a good amount of parking around. Need not worry as the police station is right next door. The Ayres sign is well-placed and you can see the building from the freeway. The decor gives a nice ambiance as soon as you walk in. The complimentary breakfast is decent and has a nice variety.  The staff was courteous. The room itself was clean and we provided the basic toiletries. Our room included a microwave and mini fridge -- so awesome. The tvs connect to USB drives and hdmi. It was my first time staying there for a wedding. I would definitely stay there again.   My only question ... Where are the stairs?!

Summary Heading: Try this Hotel, You'll be very happy!
Summary: Like the other reviews, I read about this hotel and thought I would give it a try.  It's not a "chain" hotel so I was a little worried. To my surprise, It was probably better than some of the "chain" Hotels.  The place was spotless from the very beginning as we walked into this building, Parking on site was FREE, the Full breakfast was included in the price,  The whole place smelled brand new, the (queen, not full) beds were super comfortable. the room was a bit larger than normal sized rooms are in other hotels. The towels were soft also, (very important to me.) There was no hallway noise, very quiet to sleep. Great pool, hot tub and work out center. The staff was friendly.  I would definitely recommend booking this hotel directly with them or on their web site.  It is a

I just returned from part two of a college touring trip with my daughter.  I found this place based on the many great reviews here and I will say, I was even more impressed in person.  First of all, this is a fairly new hotel so I loved that.  Everything was so clean, new and modern.  The room was very quiet.  I could hear people walking above me a bit but since I had the AC on, it was pretty muffled.  Never heard any noise from the hallway.  We stayed on the second floor.  Wifi was great, no problems.  I took part in the free breakfast one of the days I stayed there and they had a very nice selection of hot food.  I asked them to make me a couple of fried eggs and it was no problem at all. The bed was very comfortable and the TV worked great, nice selection of channels.  I

We stayed 5 nights during spring break 2015. Decided to stay here after reading the reviews on TripAdvisor... couldn't have asked for anything more. The hotel is in a great area with easy access to Disneyland and Huntington beach. There is complimentary wifi, parking and breakfast. You can easily compare this hotel with a top brand hotel. Would definitely stay here again and consider other Ayres properties in CA.
Manager Response: Dear Muhammad K,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review of our hotel based in your recent stay! It pleases us to hear the you enjoyed your stay during spring break. We are so glad we were able to meet your expectations and provide the exceptional customer service you deserve. It is also very flattering to be compared to a top brand hotel! Thank you once again for your review and we hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: We came to Fountain Valley to spend time with friends.  After reading the reviews on TripAdvisor we decided to check out The Ayres. When we arrived we were greeted warmly by the front desk staff.  They were eager to help with directions and restaurant recommendations. The room is spacious and clean. It is furnished with a microwave and fridge.  The bed is very comfortable.  There is a restaurant in the hotel that we had room service from.  The food was average.  We enjoyed drinks in the lounge on the patio by a wonderful fire.  The service was excellent. There are also reasonable priced snacks at the  front desk for late night munchies. My only complaint is that there are not a lot of dining options within walking distance. All in all I highly recommend this hotel.

Very nice hotel. Although freeway close, it was very quiet in the room.  Staff was very pleasant and helpful.  Nice comfortable beds, bathroom was great with a big tub/shower. Staff is also conscientious about placing families with kids and sports teams etc. in rooms on the first floor so as to not bother other guests.  The breakfast was first rate.
Manager Response: Dear neoformans,  Thank you kindly for your candid review regarding your most recent stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay and truly appreciate all of your kind compliments. Thank you again for the review you shared on TripAdvisor and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: 시설이 훌륭하고 서비스도 좋았습니다. 룸도 괜찮았고 장소도 조용하고 좋았어요. 약간 아쉬웠던 점은 아침식사가 제가 생각하는 것보다는 약간 모자랐다는 점입니다. 이쪽 다른 호텔들을 보지는 못했지만 일단 종류가 별로 안되었어요.  It's nice place to stay. price is also good for me. but I think the meal, breakfast need to be better than now.

Everything here is beautiful!!!    New property in Huntington Beach.....it is excellent in all respects!!!  Very comfortable, right off the 405...and it was reasonable too!!!  Check this place out, you will be glad you did!

Highly recommend this hotel for their service and quality. Good breakfast and the rooms felt luxurious. The bed and pillows were one of the most comfortable i've ever slept in, in any hotel. When going to California, will definitely come here again.

We travel to O.C. often for racquetball competitions and this was our first time in the FV Property. We arrived on Saturday evening and the front desk was empty. Maybe someone called in sick. Checked in after a bit of a wait, and settled in for a great night's sleep before the tournament the next day. LOVED the ADA compliant bath & shower.  Thank you for making our stay a restful one.

Summary Heading: The hotel is very new, the staff is curteous and responsive
Summary: The beds are comfortable and the rooms are large. We found the staff very helpful and responsive. I asked the staff to oil the bathroom door because it was a little noisy when it was moved, and within five minutes maintenance fixed the problem. The people at the front desk went above and beyond to make our stay enjoyable. We walked in one evening with a pint of ice cream and before we could even ask for anything the young woman at the desk offered us spoons and napkins for our ice cream.

Great hotel, near family and very good restaurants.  Staff was wonderful.  Room was very nice and shower was great.  My husband had trouble sleeping due to the noise of the air conditioner.  I imagine we would stay there again due to the proximity of family.

My stay at Fountain Valley's Ayres hotel was overall a great experience. My girlfreind and I only stayed one night but the rooms were very clean and a pretty decent size. The only complaint was the clicking sounds of things turning on and off all night.

Summary Heading: Staff was great; facility not so much
Summary: I was impressed with the friendly attention and prompt service of the staff. However, I had a real problem with our room on the second night of our stay. To prevent the air conditioning from coming on at night, I set the thermostat at 75 degrees (which in my opinion, is way too warm for sleeping!). However, that didn't work; the air conditioner would frequently turn on, run and then turn off again - the noise from it was quite loud and distracting.   But, even worse in terms of trying to get a good night's sleep (which I didn't), were the strange gurgling, dripping, popping noises made by water somewhere in/near our room! I've never experienced anything like it anywhere else. More than once, I got up in the night to search out the source of the intermittent noises coming from

Very nice hotel. Great accommodations. We were very pleased and would stay again and recommend it to others. Silky Sullivan's is a very short walk away. A good Irish restaurant  with good food and great friendly service with reasonable prices. Hotel bar employees were also very friendly. NO complaints!!.

Summary Heading: Quiet, Friendly and Close to the Beach!
Summary: My husband and I truly enjoyed the 11 days we lived at the Ayres Hotel. It is brand new, super quiet and close to a beautiful, big park where you can jog and do an exercise circuit, ten minutes drive down Brookhurst to the beach, or a 10 second drive to get onto the freeway in both directions.  Parking and wifi are free and parking was always available.  Breakfast was just o.k. but really, you cannot say much here for the value!  The breakfast bar transforms into a restaurant called Fusion Bites. I have to say, it is truly wonderful. The tuna tataki with the spring pea salad and wasabi dressing was amazing.  We ate there twice; it was that good.   John, the general manager, started to feel like a good friend. He was always all smiles and truly cared. He also impressed us because

This beautiful hotel is a wonderful place to stay. I travel and stay in lots of hotels and this one is top notch! The room is spacious with a large desk, sitting area, and bed. The bathroom is more than sizeable with a large tub/shower. The microwave, refrigerator, and coffee maker bring all of the conveniences of home to the hotel. There is a trendy restaurant/bar downstairs with very good food and private TVs in certain booths so you don't have to watch sports if you don't want to. The gym was quite impressive with separate rooms for cardio and weight training. Unfortunately, I forgot my running shoes at home so was unable to run on the treadmill with the large TV mounted in front of it. I look forward to my next stay at this classy, comfortable hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Blessedrn,  Thank you kindly for sharing feedback regarding your most recent stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! We are pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and could not thank you enough for the kind compliments you have shared regarding our top notch hotel. We strive to provide a comfortable atmosphere for all of our valued guests. It is wonderful to know we did just that during your stay. Thank you again for your review and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Matthews General Manager

Summary: Spent 3 nights at the Ayres while on a business trip and was very pleased.  The unassuming exterior doesn't impress - but the lobby is warm and welcoming, the rooms are large and clean.   I loved the pillows and would love to have some like them at home - so comfy!  The bathroom has a huge garden tub - normally I would NEVER use a bathtub in a hotel, but it was so clean and inviting that this time I made an exception - glorious.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer J,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review to let fellow TripAdvisor travellers know about your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. It is a pleasure to hear that our services far exceed the exterior appearance of our hotel. Thank you for the kind compliments regarding our hotel, the ambiance of our hotel, as well as the overall cleanliness of our accommodations. Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Best stay we have had in a long time!
Summary: Cant wait to go back and have another wonderful time, from the food to the gym. Rooms are so nice, but the best part of all "the staff" wow they made the stay GREAT! What about breakfast? Very good! You will enjoy your stay here.
Manager Response: Dear jack p,  Thank you kindly for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. It is an honor to have hosted one of the best stays that you have had in a long time! We truly appreciate the feedback and the kind words you have provided us with. We would love to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Judging by the exterior of this hotel you wouldn't think much of it. Nice enough, but nothing outstanding. Walking into the front lobby you'll first notice the rich dark woodwork, fireplace and friendly staff that greets you, every time. The rooms are nice, beds are super comfy. Our tv remote didn't work very well, but we weren't there to watch tv except before bed. The breakfast was nice. The only complaint would be the difficulty getting on to the property off of Brookhurst. The entrance is right in the middle of the freeway exit ramp.
Manager Response: Dear Cheston W,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! It is a delight to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We are truly flattered by your kind compliments in regards to the signature style of our hotel, our helpful team members, and the accommodation we have to offer. Thank you kindly for the feedback you have provided us with and please accept our most sincere apologies concerning the issues you encountered with the TV remote. We truly appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel and we certainly hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Quiet room on the fourth floor.  At the end of the hall away from the elevators.  Stayed 2 nights while home being fumigated.  Lights where turned on by the lamps.  Switches turned on lights over desk and bed.  Expected room to be cleaned by the lady that was working the hall and cleaned the rooms right next to mine.  I went out and said my room was clear to be cleaned.  She said "it is not on my list" and went right past it.  Hours later I asked the front desk when it would be cleaned.  They did not know but would have it cleaned then.    Not know why with a couple people cleaning rooms takes all day to do a floor.

Summary Heading: Awesome little "secret" of a hotel hidden in Fountain Valley!
Summary: (From a seasoned, male business traveler)  Fellow Travelers:  This is definitely my "go to" hotel for business in the Greater L.A./Orange County area!  A fantastic, exceptionally well-kept and spotless hotel -- especially the quiet, luxurious and spacious rooms.  But what truly makes the hotel is the staff:  More like hosts and hostesses!  My last business trip visit was the week leading up to Valentine's Day this year, and the stay was made even more exceptional by dining every night (for 3 straight nights!) at FUSION BITES, which is the secret little gem-of-a-restaurant!  Not your standard-fare hotel restaurant:  This restaurant ROCKS, both from the food and because the great staff!    FUSION BITES may may not be as absurdly extensive in their offerings as, say, a Cheesecake

Summary Heading: very clean and convenient to area.
Summary: Would I stay there again? Absolutely! The staff was very helpful and they have a nice breakfast area which is included in the room cost. The ocean, Disneyland, and lots of fine dining are all very close.
Manager Response: Dear Victor W,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review about your recent experience at our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that your stay was enjoyable and we would love to have you return in the near future! We strive to provide exceptional customer service to all of our valued guests and it is always a pleasure to read that we are doing just that for you. Thank you kindly for your feedback!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: A Safe Haven for the everyday storms of life.!
Summary: We've stayed at this Ayres multiple times in the last 6 months. The Supervisor, Amanda, is a key returning point! She is kind,warm & professional at the same time! The Rooms are satisfactory for our needs, but a truly gracious smile-leaves no doubt of where we'll stay!
Manager Response: Dear FwyFlyer,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to share some feedback regarding your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. We genuinely strive to create a welcoming atmosphere for all of our guests and it is truly a delight to read that we were able to do just that for you! Feedback like yours is the greatest gift we can ask for. Thank you again for your review and we cannot wait to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Made my vacation much more enjoyable.
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by the cleanliness of the rooms and the friendliness of the staff. Location was perfect for visits to Little Saigon and Huntington Beach. I have stayed in numerous hotels and am quite picky, and I have to say that this hotel far exceeded my expectations.  I would absolutely stay here again and recommend it to my friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear Maia2121,  Thank you kindly for writing a review on TripAdvisor to let other knows about your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley! It is truly a delight to hear that we have surpassed your expectations in regards to the cleanliness of our property. It is quite an honor to have far exceeded your expectations and, on that note, we would love to welcome you back soon! Once again, thank you so much for your feedback.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing Rooms, Clean, Nice Customer Service
Summary: I was surprised how nice this hotel was. The rooms are spacious, clean, and the bed/pillows were very comfortable. About 10 mins away from the beach, depending on traffic and 30 mins away from Disneyland. I enjoyed the gym and jacuzzi here. There's a gas station right next door.  The only advice I would give is that they need some improvement on the breakfast being hot. We stayed 4 nights and every morning the eggs and sausage were cold or barely warm. We will definitely be coming back in the future though.

Ayers Hotels are a cut above, designed with a focus on the traveler and attention to detail. You will find a clean graciously proportioned room that is furnished well. You will also find a room that is quiet, well lighted, a decent iron a convenient power-point to plug it in, an oversized fridge and well trained staff. Ayers has become my first choice amongst its competitors.

Excellent property - Very CLEAN  and well maintained.  Close to restaurants and shopping. Enjoyed the breakfast and everyone was kind and curteous. Highly recommend this hotel and will begin to stay at the other Ayers properties in the future.
Manager Response: Dear NeilColica,  The team at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley genuinely appreciates the feedback you have shared in regards to your most recent stay. Thank you so much for the kind compliments regarding the cleanliness of our hotel and our kind team members. Your recommendation of our hotel and your interest in other Ayres properties are both humbly appreciated. Thank you again for the review and we truly hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This hotel was modern but the room needs to be install some sort of night light.  It is location by the 405 freeway, very easy to access.  The fire pit lobby was modern, cute, and very cozy.  Staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Mai N,  Thank you kindly for leaving feedback regarding your recent visit to our hotel. We are pleased to read that your stay was nice overall. We truly appreciated the suggestion you mentioned regarding the lights in our rooms and, rest assured, that it will be taken under consideration. Thank you again for your review and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: The Ayres Fountain Valley Hotel is in a great location!  We brought our bikes and rode at the ecological reserve in irvine which is just 10 minutes away!  We did yoga in Huntington Beach, also just 9 mins away with easy access to the 405 everything is doable.  The free parking and breakfast is a bonus.  We really appreciate that.  The beds are comfy and the staff very nice.   This is a wonderful hotel, we'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear magicque,  Thank you so kindly for taking the time to write a review to inform others of your recent stay with us. We are thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay. We truly appreciate the kind words you have shared regarding our staff as well as our optimal location. Thank you kindly for your feedback and we certainly hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Best secret of Ayres Hotel Huntington  Beach
Summary: An excellent location by the 405 freeway, easy access. Close to everything but when you step-in the hotel, you are miles away from the busy every day life. Relax by the fire pit and/or in the Jacuzzi. Excellent complimentary breakfast and wish I had a chance to dine at the restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear 12098650AARHGNF,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. We certainly appreciate the feedback you provided and it is an absolute delight to read that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you again for the review and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice, brand new, easy access, cant say enough!
Summary: This is a great new property in the Ayers family collection. Very modern yet the ambiance is very personal and comfortable. Great breakfast in the morning, and it is a bright and open space. It is right off the 405 and very quick to get to and out of. Staff was very friendly

This hotel (and chain) is wonderful! We love staying in this chain as the rooms are comfortable and huge, the breakfast is wonderful and the stay is always great!  Close to the 405 for on and off exits easily.

The chic interior design was a real draw for me. Better still was the willingess of staff to help out. They were very accommodating when, after 20+ hours of flying, my card was giving me some trouble, but they found a good workaround and ensured i was all checked in to give me time to get settled in and sort things out with my bank.   The rooms are well appointed. I would recommend it.

Ayres Fountain Valley/Huntington Beach is a nice hotel.  It's located close to a 405 exit.  It looks like a newer hotel with a nicely decorated lobby and convenient restaurant on the premises.  The hotel room is clean and comfortable, with enough space not to feel cramped.  The soaker tub in the bathroom is big.  Unfortunately, the sink is not enclosed along with the toilet and shower/tub.  I think the room is laid out in such a way to accommodate the area with the mini-fridge and microwave where you can lay out food and eat standing up.  I did notice an odor in the room whenever we first enter, not offensive enough that I complained but not exactly pleasant either.  We stayed in room 230.  The room faced the parking lot and other housing buildings.  If you book directly with

Highly recommend this hotel! The hotel looks just like the pictures, it is clean and well kept. The staff was friendly and accommodating. There is complimentary coffee in the lobby. The rooms were very nice and spacious! The only thing that I did not like is that the power saving feature also turns the refrigerator off. We drove in from out of town and had some perishables that we were not able to keep regenerated. Aside from that this is an excellent place to stay, it is right off of the 405 and there are a variety of restaurants in very close proximity to the hotel.

Love this hotel.  Room are quiet, especially the ones on opposite side of expressway.  Beds are very comfortable, rooms are clean and the breakfast has a wide selection.  The staff is friendly too.  I highly recommend this location.

I heartily recommend this hotel -- spacious room; spa-like tub; refridgerator and microwave; and breakfast every morning. Convenient to highways and major thoroughfares.  A friendly and welcoming staff.  A great deal for the price!!
Manager Response: Dear TTownsTraveler,  Our team is humbled that you took the time to write a review to let other TripAdvisor travelers know about your recent stay with us! Thank you kindly for the recommendation of our hotel. It is always a delight to read that our guests enjoy our luxurious accommodations and that our friendly team helps in making a positive impact on your. Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Ayres Fountain Valley the perfect stay
Summary: Everything was perfect the location, the Hotel at all, beautifull clean spacious room and very confortable! And the Staff very helpfull and always smiling and available  My familly and I were very pleased for our stay for sure we will come back!! Thank you for all, Linda.
Manager Response: Dear Linda H,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review about your stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. We are beyond pleased to read that everything exceeded your expectations during your visit. Thank you kindly for your warm compliments concerning our optimal location, friendly and helpful team, as well as our luxurious accommodations! We truly appreciate the feedback you have provided to us and fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Clean and new, with comfortable beds, nice 42" TV and an exceptionally friendly front desk staff and service. Super convenient location right off the 405 and Brookhurst. The only oddities for such a nice property were a quite forgettable breakfast with limited choices; and a lack of soundproofing so that as heavy footed people plod by your door, you can hear it clearly, and if you are a light sleeper like I am, you will be awakened by it. Maybe I was unlucky and I still rate this property as four stars because the location, nice bed, amenities and very friendly staff make it a nice place to stay.

Very nice hotel and great location.  Comfortable beds and pillows made sleeping easy.  Staff was friendly.  Breakfast comes with the stay and was delicious.  Dinner menu not extensive, but interesting and very tasty.

Had a two night business stay at the Fountain Valley/Huntington Beach Ayres Suite.  The room was wonderful.  Nicely decorated, spacious, clean and fresh.  The bath includes a soaking tub, which is a nice plus.  I had the occasion to use the training facilities which were nicely outfitted.  The staff was pleasant and helpful throughout.  Only negative was the scrambled eggs for breakfast were overcooked, but that's commonplace at breakfast buffets at hotels.

We had a great week-end stay at the Ayres Hotel.  The room was spacious and the bed comfortable with nice linens.  The place was spotless. The front desk staff was friendly and courteous.  We also had a nice lunch at their hotel restaurant, Fusion Bites.  The only drawback was the complimentary breakfast which turned out disappointing.   We will stay there again and hope that they improve on their breakfast.

The staff from front desk are friendly and helpful. The room is quiet, new and clean. There are enough space for parking. The location is OK. It's in a good neighbourhood and next to a police station. The south coast plaza is 10 min drive and disneyland is 30 min drive. The only downside of its location is not that close to the city, but it reli depends on where you gonna visit in L.A.  However, I am not satisfied with room services. I stayed there for a couple of days and left tips on the desk everyday. Also, I tried to keep my room as tidy as possible. But, apparently tipping 2 ~ 5 dollars everyday may be too little to our cleaning lady. One day, she left the garbage bin on my bedside cabinet. My dear cleaning lady, if you have a problem with the amount of money I tipped, plz

The hotel was beautiful with clean and comfortable rooms.  Staff was friendly and professional.  The breakfast has room for improvement.  I also wish the fitness center opened earlier than 6 so I could get a work out in before my day starts.

I stayed at the Fountain Valley Ayres Hotel. Staff were friendly & professional; the room was quiet, large, & clean. There's ample parking with easy access near the San Diego freeway.  The complimentary breakfast was good; loved the TV features. Highly recommend this hotel!

The staff, facility, and location combine to ensure an excellent experience! I have lived and worked on the road throughout California for many years. Ayers Fountain Valley has been a complete surprise. Beautiful place in all the right ways.

I stayed here for a month (room 221 then 225) and I must say I was pleasantly surprised to find the hotel was exactly as portrayed in their website! The lobby is very pretty and made a good first impression. The staff are very friendly and helpful and the location of this hotel so close to the freeway is a real plus! Ample free parking is available. Most importantly the room was just wonderful. So spacious and the beds are soooo comfy! Flat screen TV, little mini kitchenette with firdge and microwave over and coffee maker were added-value indeed. And the bathroom and very large bathtub in the 2-double-beds room was another surprise! The King-bed room has a shower stall instead of a bathtub and the bathroom is just as spacious. The decor is easy-elegance and everything seemed

I had a very good and pleasant experience at this hotel. Being my first time in California the staff was very friendly and very approachable. The room was spacious and very nice, I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is planning on staying here. Its close to the 405 for easy access and also if your looking for Vietnamese food or Korean is close by to Bolsa Ave and to Garden Grove just need to follow Brookhurst all the way north can't miss it.  I will stay here again once I go back in May 2015 and July 2015 . I want to give a big thanks to John Mathews. and all of the staff who made my stay very comfortable and pleasant.   Brian Valero  Stayed from Dec 2014/Jan 2015

The hotel is new (a year old), in a great location, as easy to access from the freeway.  As this was our first stay at an Ayres hotel, we were very impressed with the well appointed room/hotel features.  We have stayed in all brands of hotels and would highly recommend this chain.

We enjoyed our stay at the new Ayres hotel.  The room was spacious and comfortable, however the heating cooling system was very loud.  Since the hotel is next to the freeway, you need to muffle the sound and it was hard to sleep.  The towels are a bit skimpy and the toiletries were almost useless.  The staff however was very friendly and greeted us as we came and went.  We also enjoyed the jacuzzi after a long day.

Visited between Christmas and New Years. Great stay. Clean well appointed hotel. Nice big guest room. Very good service throughout the hotel.  Nice breakfast. Will stay on next visit to Fountain Valley.

Our experience was great. Front desk was very polite, the rooms were clean.  The only complaint I would have is that the pillows are very very soft but if we would have remembered our own pillows, that wouldn't have been a problem!!!  I did not try the breakfast although it is a free breakfast.  I would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Gklbdplj,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay and for your compliments regarding our optimal location and friendly team members. We hope to serve you again soon!  Sincerely,   John Matthews General Manager

Summary: Great place to stay - staff very attentive to my needs.  My home away from home. Very quiet rooms, no noise through the walls, very well insulated. No parking fee, nice outside sitting area. Well appointed room details.
Manager Response: Dear Kathy H,   Thank you for reviewing your recent stay and for your compliments regarding our optimal location and friendly team members. We hope to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely,   John Matthews General Manager

Summary: The hotel is new, clean and the design is fresh and welcoming.  Staff was helpful, and I love the flowing water in the lobby along with the seasonal decorations.  The bathroom is spacious too and the room has a microwave and refrigerator.  There is some noise from the street, but so far I am very happy with this hotel.

This is a unique hotel in the middle of Orange County's materialistic frenzy. Although it is large, it has the feeling of a boutique hotel. Breakfast buffet was excellent. Lovely lobby. Restaurant choices galore within a short drive. Very friendly and helpful staff.
Manager Response: Dear Grady760,   Thank you for reviewing your recent stay and for your compliments regarding our optimal location. We hope to serve you again soon!   Sincerely,   John Matthews General Manager

Summary: This is a new facility, and it has all the conveniences, plus a breakfast buffet, free parking, and NO resort fee ! The staff is friendly, and the website is informative and easy to use to make reservations
Manager Response: Dear ASK1946,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. It is always a pleasure to offer our valued guests warm and friendly service. I agree that our location is convenient and well thought out for our guests. We hope you will return soon!  Sincerely,   John Matthews General Manager

Summary: A great play to stay. Rooms very modern and clean. Excellent temperature control. Good breakfast with healthy choices. Distance to all sorts of activities is very short. My family and I will stay here again - no hesitations.
Manager Response: Dear Scott A,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! Your kind compliments are warmly welcome as our team works diligently to leave a lasting impression for each of our guests. We hope to serve you again soon!   Sincerely,   John Matthews  General Manager

Summary: My kids and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Ayres Hotel.  This hotel is beautiful and in a great location!  The rooms are spacious and the beds are very comfortable.  Their complementary breakfast was the best I've ever had in a hotel, with so many items to choose from.  This was my first time staying at this hotel and I'm happy I did...I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Tereese O,  Thank you for your kind compliments regarding our attentive team and complimentary amenities! We hope to welcome you and your family back again very soon.  Sincerely,  John Matthews  General Manager

Summary: I recently traveled to South LA on a part business / part vacation trip as my daughter is taking an internship there. The hotel was perfect for our needs with free parking, wifi and breakfast. The location is excellent for restaurants, access to Huntington and Newport beaches and also just 30 minutes from Disney and 45 minutes from LAX. Great access to the interstate roads right next to the hotel and lots of shopping mall options close by. Friendly and helpful staff and front desk. Next time I am in the area I will be staying again.
Manager Response: Dear Alan L,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay in detail! Our hard working team certainly appreciates your kind words regarding their top notch service and friendly demeanor. We keep many factors in mind while carefully selecting locations for our Ayres properties. It is of the utmost importance to provide a convenient and safe surrounding for each guest to enjoy their temporary home away from home! Our complimentary amenities are certainly a plus and it is a pleasure to provide those to enhance your stay. Thank you again for reviewing your recent stay. We look forward to serving you again in the near future  Sincerely,   John Matthews General Manager

Summary Heading: Sumptuous Comfort In Abundance At Ayres Hotel
Summary: Staying at this Ayres hotel property was a new experience for us. We have family in the Huntington Beach area and this was a great location that was close enough to visit, and then zip back to the hotel within minutes.   This hotel is a newly opened (2014) property, but by the time we arrived for our vacation they had been open and greeting guests for a good many months. Time enough to get any glitches ironed out.   We flew into Long Beach Airport (LGB), picked up our rental car there, and it was around 30 minutes on a Wednesday night to get from the airport to the hotel.  Driving up to the hotel we found immediate parking near the front door. The grounds outside were very well groomed and the front doors automatically slid open as we approached.   Con: (I would note that at
Manager Response: Dear webduckie,  Thank you for choosing Ayres and for taking the time to leave feedback regarding your recent stay with us! I am delighted to see that our optimal location, wonderful amenities, and enthusiastic staff stood out to you. We thank you kindly for your feedback that will certainly use to improve upon our services. Thank you for your recommendation and hope to serve you again in the near future!  Sincerely,   John Matthews General Manager

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights while visiting family.  New,clean,modern, well-appointed rooms.  very comfortable bed.  Well designed bath and vanity area.  Refrigerator and microwave are welcome additions.  Ask for room on backside.  We were at the end of the building directly over street, next to busy freeway.  Rooms have decent soundproofing, but cars could still be heard.  Breakfast had typical choices, but quality could be improved.  Overall, very comfortable stay.  Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear fourdiamondseeker,  Thank you for your time in reviewing your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Fountain Valley. We appreciate your positive feedback regarding our complimentary amenities and tidy accommodations. I am thrilled that our location was of optimum comfort and we look forward to serving you again in the near future!  Sincerely,   John Matthews General Manager

Summary: Beautiful hotel, clean rooms, comfortable beds, reasonable rates, and a great location. We'll always stay at this Ayers Inn whenever we're in town to visit our family! Staff is polite and saw to our needs. Special thank you to "John Matthews" for his wonderful service in getting us a room as we requested (upstairs floor, nearest elevators), even though we had arrived a bit early. His professionalism, mannerism, and knowledge of the area, reflected highly on the quality of this fine establishment.
Manager Response: Dear Debbie H.,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review regarding your recent stay at our hotel. We truly appreciate your kind kind compliments about our decor, the cleanliness of our hotel, and the unbeatable value! We're appreciate your loyalty to Ayres and cannot wait to welcome you back!   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: This is the first time I ever stayed at an Ayres Property and it wont be my last. Top marks go out to the staff who went out of there way to make the stay memorable and comfortable, First off I arrive early AM I believe check in is at 3PM  the front desk made every effort to check me in early, and they succeeded. The restaurant they have on premises has a limited menu but what they do have is good food and drink. they also provide a free breaky 2 types of eggs waffles sausage fruit cereals toasts and muffins you wont go hungry. Free Parking big these days as well complimentary internet. The rooms are super nice and very comfortable pillows to die for. The hotel is exceptional clean I was very impressed. The last thing I can say is the location is Central to most places you would
