Summary: This is a very clean, new hotel with very polite staff.   I liked this Ayers hotel better than Seal Beach and Manhattan Beach because it's so clean and new. It's a good place to stay for a reasonable rate. Very convenient to the 405.
Manager Response: Dear Gio2020,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! I am delighted to see that you had an enjoyable and comfortable stay. Our optimal location is something we pride ourselves in as it helps our guests relax during their stay. We look forward to your return!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: Whenever I have to be in Costa Mesa, Ontario, Manhattan Beach I stay at Ayres Hotels.  They have the most comfortable beds on the planet!  And, they are quiet no matter which hotel you are at.  The staff know their hotels well, and give good directions to restaurants in the area.
Manager Response: Dear PattiCulea,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to write such a wonderful review about your recent stay with us as well as for your patronage!  As a team, we strive our very best to deliver exceptional customer service and I'm glad we were able to do just that during you time with us. Please come visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: Terrific location for our traveling baseball team - breakfast included, pool and gym, good location.  Restaurant was surprisingly good for dinner.  Nothing fancy, but all the essentials.   Room was clean and quiet, except for one set of noisy neighbors.  All in all, recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Californian55_8,   Thank you so much for sharing about your recent experience at our hotel. We're pleased to hear how impressed you were with our full American breakfast, convenient location as well as your dining experience at Fusion Bites.  Thank you once again for your kind review and we hope to serve you again in the future!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary Heading: New and Nice Place to Stay
Summary: we enjoyed our stay at Ayres. Up to Date decoration and materials with reasonable price.Large bath tub which is a big plus, nice lay out, all staff are very friendly. Ask for AAA rate you may get better deal.
Manager Response: Dear flyAAAaway.   Thank you so much for you wonderful review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, we are also thankful for the kind compliments you have shared in regards to our location. We sure hope to see you again soon and provide the same exceptional service that all our valued guests deserve.   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: Beautifully decorated! Love the room lay outs, check in and out easy. Restaurant an added bonus! Great place to relax after a busy work day. Pleasant atmosphere & great place to meet others.  Great staff! Highly recomend!!!
Manager Response: Dear KJArionza,   Thank you so much for your generous recommendation of our hotel! We are pleased to hear your recent stay with us was delightful and that you received nothing less than exceptional service from our team members. Thank you again for your kind words and we cannot wait to welcome you back again!   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: Mot of services like room cleaning, response for asking lan wire and answer for some questions were also good. This hotel is quiet except some blaring sound out of hotel some times. For the food, I used it as breakfast and it's also good

Trip to attend a family wedding.  We traveled with two grade school age children.  Very nice hotel, good breakfast and nice pool.  Really enjoyed our stay.  Front desk staff were very helpful!  We would definitely stay here again.

We really liked this hotel! It is modern, the rooms are very spacious and super clean, the decor is very tasteful. The staff is very friendly.We felt very comfortable. The location is great, close to the beach, close to the interstate. It has a nice pool area, and you can also sit outside for breakfast. Only thing that would make it even better in our opinion is if the breakfast would be served a little bit longer, i.e. 9:30 or 10:00am.

I flew down for a wedding and had a special price. However, everyone that worked there was nice and helpful.  Also, I slept in a King room, and there was a hug tub to take a bath. I would stay at the hotel again, if I am back in Fountain Valley.
Manager Response: Dear meileeli,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to share about your recent experience at our hotel. We're delighted to hear that your overall stay was a success and that you received only the best quality service from our team members.Thank you again for your generous recommendation and we hope to serve you again in the future!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: I have heard about the Ayres chain but my first experience exceeded my expectations.  Modern, spacious, clean and convenient.  We ordered a handicapped accessible room and it was wonderful.  The only suggestion I would make is to lower the bed to wheelchair height for a better transfer experience.    We will definitely be staying in an Ayres property again.  Nice job.
Manager Response: Dear steve m,   Thank you very much for your generous recommendation and it is delighting to hear that your first experience with us exceeded your expectations. We thank you kindly for your suggestion regarding lowering the bed and we will certainly take your feedback into consideration.  We hope to welcome you back again soon and thank you again for your review!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manger

Summary Heading: The friendliest, cleanest most beautiful hotel for the value!
Summary: This hotel was amazing. I have never been in a cleaner hotel in my life and I have traveled the world. The staff was friendly, kind, helpful and always available. The location was convenient and has easy access to all freeways. The rooms were impecibly clean and quite lovely. I would highly recommend this hotel! And we will most definitely come back!
Manager Response: Dear MichelleCiociolaCA,   Thank you for choosing our hotel as your recent destination and we are delighted to hear that your overall stay with us was a success. Providing a clean and comfortable atmosphere and delivering top quality service is a priority and it's an honor to hear that we did just that. Thank you once again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary Heading: Very clean bed, what else can you ask for?
Summary: We had a 3 nights stay in this hotel. Cleanliness is my number one priority in any hotel and this one did not disappoint. There’s nothing like sleeping in a clean bed, the bed was also a comfortable king-size. I requested hypoallergenic pillows at the time of booking, and they were at the room when we arrived. The bathroom was also clean. Too bad I didn’t take any pictures, but I highly recommend this hotel to anyone. I will use it again gladly.
Manager Response: Dear latin3d,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We appreciate your kind compliments in regards to our luxurious boutique-style accommodations and our clean and comfortable guest rooms.  Thank you again for your recommendation and we look forward to serving you when you return to the Southern California area!   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: The breakfast was the huge let down with this place. The first day there were workmen installing doors and they and their families were what can only be described as "pigging out". It wasn't a good sight and really disturbed my wife. Plastic cutlery on two days, frozen fruit, cold coffee. Really not good enough. They weren't even clearing up properly as the receptionist came in to do this at one point.  The rest is ok ish. The rooms are big but the air conditioning sounds like it is about to take off. Pool area nice too. Clean and the decor is nice. It's handy for the freeway and we found Silky Sullivans across the road really good for a drink and food. The Resturant here was pretty empty most night and was not tempting. The management really need to get a grip on this place and
Manager Response: Dear Amex Traveler,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to share about your recent experience at our hotel. We are extremely grateful for the insightful feedback you have provided as it helps us to improve our service.  In regards to your recent stay, please accept my most sincere apology for your stay being anything less that exceptional. I can certainly empathize regarding the points you have mentioned in your review and am sincerely apologetic for not exceeding your expectations, not our own. Please know that these isolated incidents are not typical of our service and that I have done my best to ensure that they do not reoccur. Nevertheless, we thank you for your feedback and kind understanding.  Thank you once again for your review we would like to kindly encourage you to stay with us again in the future so that we can demonstrate the service we are known for.   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary Heading: Four days on outskirts of LA
Summary: Lovely first impressions as we walked into the hotel.  Good welcome at reception desk.  Easy parking and plenty of spaces.  Lovely bedroom and bathroom.  Easy to get onto the freeways.  Good breakfast but had to clear a table and clean it before we could eat.  Downside for us was the on-site restaurant with loud music which put us off even trying the menu.  Music also blared over the pool area but to be fair, they did turn it down when we asked.  Volume increased at 'Happy Hour' which meant we had to enjoy some beer and wine in our own room before going out for dinner.  Requests two days running to put the clock right in our room not met.  We were unable to do this for ourselves.  Noisy AC. Promise to make us 'feel like royalty' made by email prior to arrival not fulfilled!

This hotel is beautiful and the service was amazingly friendly. The lobby was beautiful. The rooms were clean and well decorated. No issues with Wi-Fi and a pretty decent breakfast provided in the morning
Manager Response: Dear Vivian T,   We thank you kindly for the review you have shared regarding your recent stay at our hotel! Providing the best quality customer service is one of our top priorities and it is wonderful to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations. Thank you once again for your kind compliments in regards to our facilities and we hope to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: This hotel is new and has a restaurant, if you like fusion. There are a couple of very good Japanese restaurants around, Hakata Ramen and Kappo Honda, and that's about it for dining. Rooms are spacious, service is impeccable. In OC it is quite difficult to find a good room at a decent price. This is the one.
Manager Response: Dear Denis F,   We are truly grateful that you took the time to write a review about your recent stay with us and  truly appreciate the feedback you have provided! It is pleasing to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: Very nice and very clean hotel. No issues with Wi-Fi and a pretty decent breakfast provided in the morning. If you are a fan of sushi and Asian fusion be sure to check out Kappo Honda nearby. For excellent shopping be sure to visit what I call one of the best shopping malls in America - The Fashion Island Mall in Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Dear 88worldtraveler88,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to review our hotel on TripAdvisor and we are overjoyed to hear that your overall stay with us was a success! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed our location and surrounding recreation and look forward to serving you again in the future. Thank you again for your review.   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary Heading: Extremely gorgeous and we'll worth the price!
Summary: This hotel is beautiful and the service was amazingly friendly. We were there for a jazz festival, so there were a lot of people there, but they were very accommodating and provided service with a smile.
Manager Response: Dear Truetraveler1,   We are extremely grateful for the feedback you have provided! Thank you so much for your kind compliments in regards to our hotel and the services we had to offer. We truly appreciate you taking the time to write a review and look forward to serving you again in the future!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: Staff was friendly and helpful.  Fountain Valley is a beautiful place to visit.  There is easy access to shopping, restaurants and the highway from the hotel.  The lobby was beautiful.  The rooms were clean and well decorated.
Manager Response: Dear Colleen E,   Thank you kindly for your candid review and for choosing our hotel as your recent destination! We thank you so much for your kind compliments in regards to our friendly staff, clean and comfortable guest rooms as well as our convenient location. We're so delighted that we were able to exceed your expectations and hope to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary Heading: Comfy Rooms and Great Hot Breakfast
Summary: I spent two nights here and was very impressed with the room which included a refrigerator and microwave. The beds were very comfortable. In the morning I enjoyed the delicious breakfast that comes with the reservation. The outdoor lounge area was also very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Nancy T,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to share a review about you recent stay at our hotel and we are so flattered to hear how impressed you were with our clean, comfortable room and overall accommodations.  We thank you again for your review and we hope to serve you again soon!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: Made a same date reservation.  When I made the reservation no one bothered telling me that there were planned electricity outages that night!  When I checked in I was notified, they told me at 10:45 p.m., so I planned around it.  Outage occurred at 9:45 p.m., and I was told that the hotel was notified by the city of the change in time.    So I can live with this, but then I sent a complaint to the Ayres' via the internet.  I misstated the hotel I was staying in, I stated Westminister not Fountain Valley; the cities are connected/adjacent!!!  I received a response stating by the person that their is no site their and that he apologies for any inconvenience.  He couldn't direct me or forward he complaint . . . NOT GOOD SERVICE!!!
Manager Response: Dear Elias S,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to share about your experience at our hotel.  We are truly devastated to hear that you found your stay to be anything less than remarkable. We pride ourselves on providing only the best customer service and I truly apologize for the miscommunication that occurred in regards to the electricity outage. I can certainly empathize regarding your frustration, however appreciate your kind understanding. We’re also very sorry for the trouble you experienced in contacting our hotel to express your concern about these issues. Please know that your feedback will be taken very seriously and we will use it to improve our service in the future. Thank you again for your feedback.  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: Lonely isn't the exact word, but it was disappointing. Other than the the original interaction I received when I checked in, we did not have one staff member greet us until we left the hotel the following morning - and we walked in and out of the foyer on multiple occasions. When my wife first entered the desk staff (several individuals) just stared at her. It was awkward. We are regular customers of a different hotel chain (business focused) and are always greeted warmly when entering. It also did not appear that the staff made regular "rounds" the evening we stayed. Luggage cart sat in hallway for entire evening. Additionally there was a tripping hazard on the stairs that remained for some time.  The hotel seemed "brand new". The amenities were clean and smelled fresh. The
Manager Response: Dear Paul N,   Thank you so much for your candid review on TripAdvisor. Your feedback is very important to us as it will help better our services. In regards to your recent stay, we are truly devastated to hear that your stay with us was anything less than remarkable. We pride ourselves on providing only the best customer service and I truly apologize for the lack of friendly service and any unprofessionalism that you received from our staff during your stay. Please know that your remarks will not go unnoticed and that I have looked into and addressed these issues with our Front Desk Team in order to prevent them from reoccurring. We hope that this unfortunate experience does not keep you from returning to our hotel, and only hope that one day we’re able to demonstrate to you the service we are known for.   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: I booked this hotel for a mother/daughter weekend - we wanted to be close to the beaches but also within driving distance to Disneyland. Loved the location! The police station behind the hotel was also a welcome sight. The room was beautiful; my only complaint is that we requested a pool view but didn't get it. I confirmed with the front desk associate that our room, in fact, had a pool view but when I got to the room it was a bland parking lot outside the window. Oh well.
Manager Response: Dear Lacey V,   Thank you kindly for your TripAdvisor review! We are pleased to hear that we were the chosen hotel for your special mother/daughter weekend and truly appreciate your patronage. Please accept my apology for the miscommunication that occurred with the room type you requested. We strive our very best to accommodate our guests special requests and are sincerely sorry that in this case we fell short. Nevertheless, we’re delighted that your overall stay was nothing short of remarkable and look forward to welcoming you back again in the future. Thank you once again for your generous recommendation.  Sincerely,   John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This is the Third one I've stayed at an Ayres and they've gotten me hooked.  This hotel is nice, clean and fresh.  I'm pretty sure it's new.  The other Ayres are pretty modest and traditional and this one has some Asian flair which is nice and modern.    They were very accommodating by letting us check in early and giving us a late check out.  The only downside was, and it's my fault, (I've come to expect it) was that they always have an awesome free breakfast but on labor day I guess they were repairing the floor and had cold breakfast and no signs to get to it.  Aw well. It could of been worse...
Manager Response: Dear Josh E,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review about you recent stay at our hotel and for your loyalty to our brand. We truly appreciate your kind compliments about our classic, yet modern decor and are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the ambiance as much as we do. We thank you once again for your generous recommendation and look forward to serving you again in the future.   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary Heading: All work and still some fun, -:)
Summary: A weeks of work so very near the Huntington Beach and did not even see the sea shore. Still the hotel did not disappoint at all. Clean, new and not as smelly as the usual hotel in the US. The small restaurant was a very good addition to the standard, nice tasty, small dishes and very good and friendly people. Open air place to sit in the evening when the place cools down. Had a run in the gym. Skipped the breakfast on my why to work so I can not provide you with a opinion on that, but if it reflects the evening I have some confidence.
Manager Response: Dear Bart K,   Thank you for your kind review about your recent experience at our hotel.  From our team members to our European-style accommodations, creating the perfect relaxing experience is what matters most to us and we're pleased that we were able to exceed your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future so that you are able to indulge in our complimentary full American breakfast! Thank you again for your feedback.  Warm Regards,   John Matthews General Manager

Summary: The sir conditioning controls were broken in our room, so we had to move at 10 pm after they tried to figure out what was wrong,  we were promised a 10% discount.   On checkout the next morning, there was no record of the discount or forced move.   Worse yet, the room price was increased $50 over the price we signed for as a result of our tennis tournament deal.   The desk clerk refused to call a manager, and instead argued when I showed her our paperwork receipts and email confirmation on my phone.   Even though the drawer had a copy of our sign in with the original price, she didn't want to look for it until I insisted!  After another 15 minutes of talking, she finally refunded the extra $50.   I asked for the third time to see the manager, and she pointed to the next desk.
Manager Response: Dear JudySB_11,   Thank you so much for taking the time to share a review about your recent experience at our hotel. Please accept our most sincere apology in regards to your overall experience being anything less than exceptional. We truly apologize for the lack of service you experienced from our staff while addressing your concern about the air conditioner and I certainly empathize with your frustration. We always strive our best to accommodate our valued guests, and I am truly saddened to hear that we did not exceed your expectations, nor our own. Please know that I have addressed these issues with the necessary departments and, we will indeed use this experience as a learning tool for the future. Thank you again for your feedback and understanding and we truly hope you reconsider staying with us again.   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manger

Summary: We stayed 3 nights and enjoyed our stay. Brand new modern hotel. Much nicer than other Ayres. The rooms were nice and the free breskfast was a plus. The only complaint I have was there were never any clean towels at the pool...we always had to go to the front desk to ask for more. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear rayboys,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to share a review on TripAdvisor about your recent stay at our hotel and for your loyalty as well.  Please accept our apologies in regards to the shortage of towels during your stay. Nevertheless, we are so delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back again. Thank you again for your recommendation!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: The place was nice, staff was very friendly and helpful.  Rooms were very clean and nice. Breakfast was the worst part of the stay here.  Breakfast ended very early, I don't know about you but when I'n on vacation I not going to get up early.  I breakfast would be extended to 10:30 that would be great.  They have a lot of people to feed in a short amount of time so even if you get there to have breakfast, finding a place to sit and eat is difficult.  But, I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear paul k,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to share about your recent experience at our hotel. I appreciate your enthusiastic review regarding the friendliness of our staff, spacious rooming, and optimal location! Our staff works diligently to assure that every guest enjoys their stay and that we leave a lasting impression from the time you check-in to the time you check-out.  We apologize that you did not find our breakfast hours to be ideal, however  we appreciate your suggestion in regards to extending these hours. Thank you once again for your candid review and we hope to see you again soon!  Warm Regards,   John Matthews General Manager

Summary Heading: Hotel and beds comfy:) don't even get me started on the amazing breakfast
Summary: This hotel was so incredibly nice my husband I stayed here for 4 days and Armando helped us out tons thank you:) your breakfast is seriously so tasty. Couldn't believe it a full on breakfast and not just bagels,cereal and toast. But full in breakfast:)
Manager Response: Dear KarenClar,   Thank you so much for taking the time to share a review on TripAdvisor about your recent stay at our hotel! We are delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy our complimentary full American breakfast and that you were provided excellent service by Armando. We strive our very best to go above and beyond to meet our guests needs and it is great to hear that we were able to able to exceed your expectations. Thank you again for your review and we look forward to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: New hotel with beautiful furnishings, excellent rooms and baths, but we could not get a good nights sleep (stayed a week) because of the many teams of softball tournament kids staying there and they ran up and down the hallways and stomped (played ball) in their rooms which we complained about but it seems the silence only lasted for one night. Also, they have a new device for you to use the "power" in your room and you need to keep your room key in this device in order to keep any kind of power on, but the maids kept taking our key and when we returned back to the room each day, it was hot and stuffy and we had to go get another key in order to have power. NOT A GOOD IDEA in my book ! I'm paying a lot of money each day for the room and I want POWER to be left on for our comfort.
Manager Response: Dear Sharon N,   Thank for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor and we truly appreciate your feedback.In regards to your recent stay, we would like to offer our most sincere apology that your stay was anything less than remarkable. We strive our very best to ensure that all our valued guests have a relaxing, enjoyable stay at all times and we’re very sorry that we weren’t able to resolve these noise disturbances you experienced. Nevertheless, we appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention and will certainly try our best to be more proactive about noise in the future.  In regards to the electricity saver, we utilize this innovation in order to avoid unnecessary usage of electricity, however apologize that you had unfortunately returned to an uncomfortable room temperature.  We thank you again for your candid review and understanding and only hope that we are one day able to demonstrate the service we are known for.   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manger

Summary: I usually stay at the Residence Inn across from this hotel and noticed it when we were here at Christmas visiting Mom. The Ayres had a special rate $40 less so I decided to try it out. I was very satisfied with my choice. The rooms are large and new. It was very clean and I liked the tv. The rooms are very quiet as far as hotel noise, but I was on the side facing the 405 and traffic was very loud but then again it was the 4th of July. The breakfast was not as varied as the Residence Inn, but it did the trick. Scrambled eggs, potatoes, sausage, cereals and pastries. Coffee was good. They have a lounge/ restaurant called Fusion Bites. Asian/Fusion. I stopped in for a drink and Paula (the chef) actually hand squeezed orange juice for my screwdriver when they ran out! Jamie, the

This place is great and just as expected if not better for the price.   Delicious hot breakfast is included with your stay also.   The property appears to be fairly new and is in good shape.   You will need a car to stay here nd the parking is free. The rooms are large with mini fridge and  microwave.  It is right of the 405.   We went to the beach and to Disneyland with our having to get on a freeway. This hotel is equivalent to a Hilton place/ embassy or newer Courtyard marriott.

This is a beautiful new hotel near Huntington Beach. I loved the location. Near the freeway, but not too close and only 30 minutes to the beach and about that to Anaheim. The front desk staff was very helpful and nice. The only problem we had with the hotel was the maid service and the breakfast. We stayed for a week and had to continually ask for more shampoo because they didn't give it to us unless we asked. One morning I asked that the sheets be replaced, but they didn't do it. They did it the next day when I called the front desk to ask them to get it done.   The breakfast was ok. The food was the exact same eggs and sausage and waffle everyday! There was no change in variety whatsoever. We also had to be down to eat early because they close at 9:00am on weekdays. If you get

Summary Heading: Very quiet and comfortable, good service.
Summary: I felt very secure and cozy in my room.  The room was extraordinarily quiet, which I appreciated because a wedding was going on.  The bedding was nice, and the area where coffee, fridge, and microwave were was handy.  I will definitely come back.  Only one annoyance:  they charge for local calls (same area code) if not in Fountain Valley.  I called my son, less then 2 miles away, and they charged $7 for 10 minutes..
Manager Response: Dear shammyd,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at our hotel. It is extremely satisfying to hear that you felt secure and comfortable at our hotel and we truly appreciate your kind compliments in regards to our in room amenities . Please accept our most sincere apologies for any miscommunication you experienced in regards to the phone calls you made. We thank you again for your review and hope that we're able to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manger

Summary: We stayed in a king bedded room for five nights from 6/25 thru 6/30. The bathroom had a large shower area but no tub. I believe some of the rooms also include a bathtub but I would check before booking. Since the hotel opened in Decenber 2013 it still had that new smell and is very clean. There seems to be plenty of onsite free parking and has easy access to the San Diego Freeway (I-405). We asked for a quiet room so we would not hear any of the freeway traffic noise from our room. Our room (426) was very quiet during our entire stay. As an added bonus the hotel is directly next to the Fountain Valley Police Station.   There is a breakfast room which serves the standard fare that most hotels serve when the breakfast  is included in the room price. In the evening, the location of

Great hotel, free breakfast was very good. Big clean rooms, perfect size pool area, and great patio area at the restaurant. Will definitely recommend this to any teams traveling to that area. Close to all fields in the HB and surrounding areas. Great 405 fwy access, plenty of places to eat, and there's a police station next to it so you don't have to worry about any problems with your car being parked there all night or any riff raft around.
Manager Response: Dear Bluedawg42,   Thank you so much for your generous review about our hotel.  We appreciate your kind remarks about our rooms and our services and look forward to welcoming you back for your next soccer tournament. Thank you again for your generous recommendation!   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: I stayed here for two nights on business and had no complaints. Positives: Beautiful rooms, clean, big bathtub, HBO available, wireless worked well. Coffee maker in the room was broken but it didn't matter because they offer coffee and a wonderful free breakfast downstairs. The fitness room was great, as was the pool and jacuzzi. The restaurant in the hotel was good, a little pricey..but it is Orange County. It was also clear that they cared about the environment. Would DEFINITELY stay again.

We have traveled often and have stayed at many different locations, and this property is a class A experience. From a value perspective, our stay at this property was the very best to date. The furnishing are rich and the atmosphere was calm and relaxing. We met the entire staff, from the General Manager to our room attendant, and every employee we interacted with made us feel like we were an important guest. The property was clean, the tubs and showers were spacious, and the pool area included an outdoor sitting area that was comfortable. The property offers a restaurant facility operated independently and offers a unique menu with unusual but very tasty treats. For the little one the chef, yes there is actually a chef on scene, created a grilled cheese sandwich that made the
Manager Response: Dear Daniel S.,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to share about your recent experience at our hotel. There are not enough words to express how grateful we are about your generous compliments about our elegant furnishings, friendly staff, and your overall enjoyment of our hotel. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests and I am delighted to hear that our service exceeded your expectations. Thank you again for your kind words and we would love to invite you to stay with us again!  Sincerely,   John Matthews General Manager

Summary: We had a great time! The staff was terrific! We came for a visit from Northern California and was given the name of the hotel by family who lived 5 min away! We went to a college graduation, and the beach! Freeway is close by and easy to access. The pool area was perfect for the kids! The rooms are modern and the king with a pull out sofa bed was a perfect combination for us. My sisters family joined us for the weekend and we all had a great experience. Thanks to the spring special we saved money on the room too! My grandson and I used the workout room.The breakfast was very good! With the late check-out we were able to enjoy the beach for a couple of hours before traveled on! Thanks again!!

This hotel is really nice...  Clean, comfortable and quiet .. The restaurant is more bar foods . We had small children so it was hard..  There are lot's of restaurants close...  The service was great and everyone is so friendly and helpful..
Manager Response: Dear Tinycharly,   Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor about your experience at our hotel.  We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your kind compliments about our clean and comfortable rooms as well as the friendly service from our staff. We thank you again for your review and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Sincerely,  John Mathews  General Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful new upscale hotel in the heart of Orange County
Summary: Ayres is a  brand new upscale hotel, conveniently located close to the freeway, not far from the beach and Disneyland. Cool ocean breezes without the beach community congestion. Nice restaurant on site and loads of restaurants within a few miles offering everything you could want. Terrific sports park near by on Brookhurst.
Manager Response: Dear CBfromCA,  Thank you so much for your review and for all the lovely compliments you shared about our hotel! We’re pleased to hear that you found our hotel to be conveniently located by the beach and Disneyland as well as enjoyed dining at Fusion Bites! Thank you again for taking the time to share about your experience and we would love to invite you to stay with us in the future!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: I like this hotel ALOT!  It still has that brand new smell.  We had a single king bed room and it was soooo spacious, clean, and modern!  It has a coffee maker, fridge, microwave, separate bathroom.  Free parking (and lots of it), free wifi, easy access to Little Saigon and 405.  The bed was really comfortable, free breakfast was good with actual hot food (eggs/sausage/waffle maker).  The only thing I dislike was the very uncomfortable/noisy couch.  I tried sitting in it once and that was it.    P.S.  I am a light sleeper and often times I get waken up by neighbors, but not at Ayres!  I couldn't hear a thing!
Manager Response: Dear Pearl N,   Thank you so very much for taking the time to write a review about your experience at our hotel.   I apologize to hear that you found our couch to be uncomfortable, however am pleased to know that your enjoyed your overall stay at our property. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our spacious modern rooms, complimentary Full American Breakfast, and our brand new property as a whole.  Thank you again for taking the time to write such a delightful review of our location. We look forward to being of service in the future!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: The beds were really comfortable.  The décor was modern.  The breakfast was delicious!  Upon arrival there was nobody at the front desk, but someone came to check us in after a few minutes.  We requested adjoining rooms and the staff was very accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Don W,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share a review about your experience with us! We really appreciate your feedback.  In regards to your recent stay, we are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our modern European décor, full buffet breakfast and the friendliness of our staff. Our designers put detailed thought into our recently opened property and it is wonderful to hear such positive feedback from guests like you!  Thank you again for your review and we look forward to being of service in the future!  Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent. Would come back to stay again. Highly recommended.
Summary: I recently stay here for 2 weeks. Brand new facility, room service and front desk are excellent. Specialy front desk person is very nice and helpful. Heily is extremely warm welcome and helpful to guess. Manager John is so kind.They treat guess like their own families. I love them. I would recommend to everyone to stay here. It was such a nice experience stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy P,   Thank you kindly for your review on TripAdvisor! We appreciate your feedback.  In regards to your recent stay, we are truly grateful to hear that you enjoyed your stay our beautiful, brand new property. We pride ourselves in delivering only the best service to our hotel guests and I am delighted to hear that our service as well as staff were able to exceed your expectations.  Once again thank you so much for for your review and for your recommendations. We hope to see you again in the near future!   Warm regards,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: Loud noises from above, we were on the first floor and you could hear people walking upstairs all night long! The restaurant and bar were not open due to memorial weekend and the hotel was the tournament hotel for baseball.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa B.,  Thank you kindly for taking the time write a review on TripAdvisor. Your feedback is vitally important to us as it helps better serve our guests.   In regards to your recent stay, I would like to offer my most sincere apology for the issue that you experienced with the noise level in your room. I can understand how a noisy room can negatively impact any guest’s stay and I am so sorry that this was the case with you room.    In the future, we would like to encourage you to please request a room on one of our higher floors, in advance to ensure a quiet stay.  Although requests cannot be guaranteed, we do our very best to accommodate our valued guests.   That being said, we only hope you consider staying with us again. Thank you once more for your review.   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: The hotel had many positives. The establishment is new with a fresh feel and environment. The staff is extremely hospitable. The rooms are large and well equipped. The toiletries and towels are all top quality. An abundance of free parking is available. The business center is very functional. The location right off I-405 is ideal. Proximity to the Fountain Valley Sports Complex and Mile Square Park is just a few blocks away. Huntington Beach is also nearby.  The complimentary breakfast was superior to most hotels in this class. This is now my hotel of choice in this section of Orange County. There is nothing to disappoint you here.

Summary Heading: New and clean but not for extended stays
Summary: I stay in Fountain Valley regularly for business so I've tried every hotel in the area. I was pumped for a change of pace with Ayres being a nearly-brand-new hotel. To this end, it was cleaner and a little classier than the rest but, I found, wasn't as cozy or well-suited for long stays.  The room was fairly small and only had one window, which unfortunately looked out over the bland parking lot and didn't let a lot of light in. My other issue was the shower water pressure, which was pretty dribbly. The breakfast buffet was pretty standard and could have used some variation day-to-day... by day 5 I was pretty burnt out on their offerings. I will say that the bed was probably the most comfortable I've ever had in a sub-$200 hotel.  All-in-all, for my week-long business stays,

Summary Heading: Great place to stay - away from Anaheim and with all the perks
Summary: Stayed here for only two nights BUT the experience was amazeballs!  Beautifully designed hotel.  Lovely and clean.  Room was lovely and the pillows and bed.....fan tab.  This came with buffet brekkie, free wi-fi and free parking.  Always a bonus for stays.  Highly recommend this hotel.  Prices are great and so easy to find!  You'll be crazy to stay anywhere else while visiting Anaheim.

Nice new choice in Fountain Valley. The breakfast was hot and delicious and the breakfast room pleasant. I like being able to see the chef working as it reassures me that the eggs are the real thing. Thanks, Ayres!

Everything was nice and new. Beds were super comfortable! Breakfast was standard buffet. Not the best place for a family of 5 or more because they don't allow rollaway beds and don't offer a discount for 2 rooms that would be required.
Manager Response: Dear Justgovacation,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share about your recent experience. Your comments are very much valued!  In regards to your recent stay, we are pleased to hear your wonderful remarks about our comfortable beds, full buffet breakfast and that you enjoyed our modern décor as much as we do!  We do apologize for any inconveniences you experienced with the size of our rooms. Although our rooms are not designed or cleared for rollaway beds, we do have connecting rooms available that are ideal for families of your size. Feel free to inquire about these rooms at any time, and I would be more than happy to assist you.   As for our rates, although our multiple room bookings begin at 10 rooms or more, we do offer several discounts such as AAA, AARP, and at times seasonal promotions. Feel free to ask one of our guests representatives about these discounts for any future bookings.    Once again, thank you again for your review and we cannot wait to welcome you back in the future!  Sincerely,  John Mathews  General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great location, great price & friendly staff
Summary: I was attending a workshop in the OC area, this hotel was only 15 minutes from everything I needed to get to, it was quick and easy access, rarely a traffic backup near the hotel. The staff was SUPER friendly, the rooms were impeccably clean! The wifi was free and fast which was great as it was a business trip and I had multiple devices to hook up! The breakfast was decent, and no matter how late I would arrive I could always find a parking spot.
Manager Response: Dear JustineM9,   Thank you so much for your honest review! We our glad you enjoyed your stay at one of our newest locations. The location truly is convenient and close to major highways. Our guest service truly is a priority, so it is wonderful to hear that you were provide with superb service. We do provide complimentary breakfast, Wi-Fi, and parking and are also pleased you were able to take advantage of that. Thank you again for taking the time to share your experience and we kindly ask that you consider staying with us again.   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for one night.  Usually stay in Costa Mesa, but wanted to try another Ayres.  It is pretty, if you like an Asian influence, far different than the European look of the other Ayres.  The staff was great other the check in person.  Although very pleasant, she gave us a room at checkin overlooking the parking lot.  The hotel was empty, and we would have preferred the view of the pool.  The breakfast was the same as the other Ayres hotels.. no upgrade here.  Also on the website it stated there was a hospitality time but the check in clerk was not sure what we were talking about, and neglected to check it our for herself.   The restaurant is Asian Fusion, and it was not anything to write home about.  However the bar staff was very nice.  1 pool, allows 20+ people in at a
Manager Response: Dear Painter2013 -  Your thorough review is greatly appreciated. Thank you very much for choosing us for your stay.  Our newer locations do have a more modern ambiance but our vision remains the same; we aim to please. It is good to hear such compliments about our team being hospitable as we strive for excellent guest service. However, please accept our apologies for not anticipating your room view needs. We like to encourage guests to make their particular requests upon booking, but we understand that we should have better addressed the desires of our guests. Though these requests cannot always be guaranteed, we try our best to accommodate all requests.  Once again, thank you kindly for your honest review and we hope you consider returning.   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres in Fountain Valley as we were going to Disneyland.  This is our first time staying with the Ayres Chain.  It was totally worth it.   Its about a 20 min drive to Disneyland.  The hotel is beautiful. everything is new.  Decorated very nicely and has a good breakfast in the morning.  Its located close to chipotle, applebees, grocery stores.  We had a mini fridge and microwave in the room. Good location.  Friendly staff.  I will totally stay at a Ayres chain in the future.   Thanks!!

Summary Heading: First time for us in an Ayres Hotel. Scale of 1 -10 We give it a 15!!
Summary: This is a new Ayres Hotel in Fountain Valley, Calif as of Dec 2013. ....So happy we joined our son and Grandsons in Fountain Valley. Staying in a first rate hotel was frosting on the cake. Great Hotel. No interstate noise. Friendly Staff. Excellent prices. Easy parking. Nice restaurant for complimentary breakfast. Also the restaurant is open for lunch and dinner and has a full bar.  We loved the comfort of the beds and pillows. Still a few growing pains but nothing to spoil your time at the Hotel.  We thought we were getting adjoining rooms but...............they may not have adjoining rooms. At least the staff couldn't find them. Great price for this location. Close to Huntington Beach. Beautiful,Laguna Beach a must see!!

I'm a first timer and I have to say that I was pleasantly surprised.  I'm pretty discriminatory about my accommodation choices.  I will definitely stay here again.  Hotel Staff Team, keep up the outstanding work and pride in your service!  It shows!  Happy First Timer

New hotel, beautiful lobby, well designed spacious rooms with high ceilings.  Comfortable bed and pillows.  In-room refrigerator did not close well and was full of ice on the walls----it was the one only thing they did not do well.
Manager Response: Dear Azpoet -   Thank you so much for choosing us for your stay and taking the time to write an enthusiastic review of our hotel. This is our newest location and we are happy to hear we made such an impression! I apologize about the refrigerator not working appropriately. Being a new hotel there are always little issues to work, out and I thank you for bring this to our attention. We are already looking into the matter. We greatly appreciate you staying with us and hope you will have the chance to visit again very soon!   Sincerely,  John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: The hotel was located very conveniently for me.  I had business at the local hospital.  There were several places to eat within walking distance including a nice little pub that the staff gave me coupons for.  I only had a couple minor complaints.  The room was very clean except for two hairs that wouldn't have been that noticeable except that everywhere seemed so clean that the contrast of the very dark hair made them really draw the eye.  Not a big deal to me so I just ignored it but I did notice.  The other was the coffee wasn't very good and they didn't have real mugs in the room, just paper cups.  I really like to have a ceramic mug in the room for my morning cup of coffee.  The free breakfast was a real treat.  So few hotels actually give you a warm meal anymore, and the
Manager Response: Dear Preregrin,   Thank you very much for your review of our hotel. We are so happy that we were located in a convenient location during your business trip!  The cleanliness of our hotel and rooms is most important to us, and I apologize greatly for the imperfection of the room. I agree with you that having a warm cup of coffee in a ceramic mug is a great feeling in the morning. That is a great recommendation that I will be sure to suggest to our Quality Assurance team. We greatly appreciate your review and hope you can come visit us again very soon, be it for work or pleasure.   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary Heading: Great, new hotel with exceptional staff
Summary: Our room included two queen beds, a mini fridge, microwave and garden tub/shower. It was clean, comfortable and meet our tough expectations. We loved the partial divider between beds to give some privacy. John and his staff were exceptional; friendly and prompt. Our room was cleaned thoroughly every day with clean, fresh towels and the beds made. Our hotel included breakfast, which was available at appropriate times, always warm, and tasty. The hotel is conveniently located near the I405, but we never heard traffic noise. If there was one thing to identify as an area of improvement, it would be the pool temperature. It was a little on the cold side. But this would be nitpicking. Overall, we were very happy with our stay and will recommend the Fountain Valley Ayres hotel to
Manager Response: Dear Xcitbl,   We are so glad you enjoyed your stay! Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review and choosing us for your stay. We love providing a clean, happy, and stress free stay for all of our guests. We greatly appreciate your recommendation and hope that you will have the chance to visit us again very soon!   Sincerely,   John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: We only stayed there for one night on the second floor. Very quiet at night and didn't hear much noise. Everything looks brand new, so can't complain much about it.  Two queen beds were very spacious and love the fact that it has ventilation  fan inside the bathroom.   The hotel itself provides free wifi, depending on where you located in the room, it can get spotty.   Some how I still can't justify the rate for this hotel , a little bit too costly for me.  But I do have to say their breakfast was awesome, plenty of variety to make you full. Like the others mentioned if you head down there around 9:20ish, there aren't much selection since they stop serving at 10am. So get down early if you like more choices .

Summary Heading: Great, clean, new hotel in great location
Summary: New hotel close to Disney, Knotts Berry Farm and other must see locations around LA.  Great breakfast included along with free parking and WiFi and nice pool.  Would definitely stay again, especially with kids.

Summary Heading: Very clean! Everything is new and works.
Summary: Stayed one night with my family for a softball tournament.  Loved everything about our stay there.  Really enjoyed the oversized bathroom and shower.  Very good hot breakfast too.  Bigger than average mini fridge and microwave was a nice surprise. That comes in handy when traveling with kids.
Manager Response: Dear allstarssoftballmom,  We are so pleased to see that you loved everything about your stay at our hotel. It is nice to see that you enjoyed the over-sized bathroom and shower, that is exactly what we were striving for. Thank you for the compliments on our complimentary full American breakfast buffet, we are thrilled to see that you enjoyed it. It is also a delight to know that you were able to use the extra amenities like the mini fridge and microwave. We hope you and your family will visit again soon and thank you once more.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: It was my first time and I found the Ayres to be such a wonderful hotel.  The staff was accommodating and attentive.  The hotel is clean and well-kept.  The kids on the Dance Team loved the complimentary breakfast.  It was fantastic!  The location was perfect for our purpose. It was so wonderful, we checked back in the next night!  We look forward to our next stay at the Ayres!
Manager Response: Dear Laura B,  We were so very honored to have you and your Dance Team here for the weekend. It is nice to know you all thoroughly enjoyed the complimentary full American breakfast buffet. We cannot thank you enough for your kind words and await your next arrival. Thank you once more, and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: New hotel, Good location 4 miles from Huntingon Beach and 5 miles from Newport beach and Balboa Island
Summary: Hot tub was nice (but make sure you have towels before you get in) and the pool is warm and cozy.  Was not very crowded in mid March.  Nice lighting in the hallways, rooms are spacious and clean.  Breakfast is very good, but closes at 9 AM during the week.
Manager Response: Dear DrivingToHaveFun,  It was such an honor to have you as our guest recently, we appreciate the time you took to write about your experience at our hotel. We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed the heated swimming pool and hot tub. Thank you for your compliments on the nice hallway lighting and spacious rooms. We hope you will be able to visit again soon and thank you once more for your kind feedback.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: The staff were very attentive and kind. The room was clean and very comfortable. Breakfast was wonderful with many choices. The pool was great and well maintained. The pool shower was especially nice. We were sad to leave. We would highly recommend this hotel for families and couples!!

Very clean, well lit , and a very friendly atmosphere :) Our room was 2 queen beds, very roomy with a microwave and a refrigerator. The hotel is very new, and in a great location. Very close to Disneyland (about 15-20 min), free parking, free breakfast, and just a great place to stay!!

Summary Heading: Wonderful brand new hotel. Great stay
Summary: This is the third Ayres Hotel we've stayed at in Southern California. We've previously stayed at the Seal Beach location (WONDERFUL), as well as the Costa Mesa location(Beautiful, but customer service and breakfast need improvement). And now the Fountain Valley location too. The hotel is beautiful and in pristine condition. Just as a matter of aesthetics and personal preference, We preferred the lavish European style of the Seal Beach and Costa Mesa hotels. Those lobbies are absolutely fabulous!! Fountain Valley has a distinctively Asian inspired décor, that although lovely, wasn't as appealing to us. And we did find the room to have an off odor, upon entering. I thought earthy bamboo smell, my husband thought maybe it's because it's new... either way, it wasn't necessarily
Manager Response: Dear 6boys4me,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a thorough review of our new hotel on TripAdvisor. We are pleased to see that you enjoyed your overall experience. Thank you for the compliments on the quality service, it is nice to know that our team was very welcoming and kind. Apologies if your room felt a little smaller with the partition, the next time you stay with us we will be sure to do our best to honor your request of a room without the partition wall. We hope to see you another time in the near future and thank you again for recommending our hotel on TripAdvisor.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: Employees were wonderful, room was clean and comfortable, did not have breakfast but heard it was worthy.  Enjoyed the employees in the bar- very accommodating to our requests.  We're part of a large group.  Rm 404 has broken curtain rings- couldn't use the blackout curtains

I am currently still here and I cannot believe how great this place is! I  have never stayed in an ayres property before. This is a brand new location and it is very very nice. The staff are all very kind and give excellent customer service. We are in a room with a King bed and a pull out leather sofa bed. The rooms are spacious and very very clean. The pool/spa and outdoor seating area are very nice. They serve a full buffet hot breakfast every morning! And it's yummy! There is also a light lunch and dinner for purchase in a dining area.  Lobby is decorated beautifully. The only thing I wish it had was room service but other than that I am loving this hotel! I would definitely recommend staying here..it is near 405 fwy so you can get anywhere you need to quickly and easily.
Manager Response: Dear Erika J,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a flattering review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your recent experience at our hotel, it is nice to see that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. We are so very pleased to see that you found our service to be kind and excellent, it is truly what we strive for. Thank you for the compliments on the room accommodations, we are delighted to see that you found them to be spacious and clean. It is also nice to know that you enjoyed the complimentary full American breakfast buffet and our on-site restaurant. We hope you will visit another time in the near future and thank you again for recommending our hotel to others via TripAdvisor.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This will be my only Hotel in Little Saigon area, beautiful set up great breakfast, didn't have a chance to use pool and fitness room, would like to try restaurant next time I'm back in town! I am glad Fountain Valley have a nice hotel to accommodate my friend and family!!!
Manager Response: Dear nancy h,  We are so very pleased to see we will be your hotel of choice when visiting the area. Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about how  lovely your experience with us was. We cannot wait to welcome you another time in the near future and we are excited that you will be trying the on-site restaurant next time. Thank you again.  Sincerely,  John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: We wanted the best of both worlds and we got it here! Excellent location right off the I-405 and 15-20 mins from Disneyland or Huntington Beach!! We liked the location because we weren't planning on staying every day at Disney and we appreciated the low-key atmosphere after a day at the park. Since we have been to Disneyland several times before, we figured out that taking a break between days at the park helps everyone get their batteries re-charged and you also experience more of what So-Cal has to offer. The staff was amazing, the 'free' breakfast had an omelet bar, Belgian waffles and plenty of fruit, yogurt and cereal as well!  Since the property is so new, it is not crowded and everything is sparkling! I HIGHLY recommend this property and we will be staying here again, no
Manager Response: Dear evelynjean03,  We are so pleased you decided to stay at our hotel during your So-Cal vacation. We sincerely appreciate the kind feedback and cannot thank you enough for taking the time to leave a review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your experience and recommend our hotel. It is nice to know you enjoyed the quaint atmosphere, convenient location, and the complimentary full American breakfast buffet. We cannot wait to welcome you another time in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This is the best place you have ever stayed at & did not break your wallet.Clean ,energy efficent. The staff so friendly you thought you went to school with them.Dinning room & chef( not cook)  is spot on ,right there when when you need him,Hell you do not even have to ask. He is on it. If you stay here ,you never stay anywhere else. REALLY.
Manager Response: Dear fordzone,  Thank you very much for your kindly worded review, we are so pleased to see that you liked our hotel enough to post a 5 star review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your experience. Thank you for the compliments on our friendly service, it is truly what we strive for. It is also nice to see that you enjoyed the complimentary full American breakfast buffet. We cannot wait to welcome you another time in the near future and thank you again for the fantastic review.  Sincerely,  John Mathews  General Manager

Summary: Everything was awesome. Easy to find. Beautiful property. The staff was very professional. Hotel is bran new. Great hot breakfast in the morning. Rooms were quite and big. Pool area was clean and the staff war responsive. Thanks again to Hailey at the front desk.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin H,  We cannot thank you enough for your kindly worded review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your great experience at our hotel. We are so very pleased to see that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Thank you for the compliments on the professional staff, it is truly what we strive for. It is also nice to know you enjoyed the complimentary full American breakfast buffet, spacious accommodations, and pool area. We hope to welcome you another time in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary: This hotel just opened and offered a fantastic deal.  Room was comfortable, spacious and clean.  Front desk staff was pleasant and helpful.  Free breakfast was delicious with a variety of food.  Pool and spa were nice and furniture comfortable.  Very happy with Ayers chain.
Manager Response: Dear KimberlyD669,  Thank you very much for being one of our very first guests to review about your experience at our hotel on TripAdvisor! We are so pleased to see that you found the rooms to be comfortable, spacious, and clean. We truly strive to offer the highest quality of service and are delighted to know that we succeeded in that goal with your stay. It is also nice to know that you enjoyed the complimentary full American breakfast buffet. We hope to see you another time in the near future and thank you again.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager

Summary Heading: Brand New Hotel opened in Dec 2013- Lovely- Great Value
Summary: We got our hotel thru priceline and were worried because we didn't know the hotel and didn't see actual pictures on the computer but it turned out that the hotel just been open for only 2 weeks ago and they didn't have enough time to put actual pictures on the website.  Price is right Free wifi Small refrigerator - microwave - coffee machine inside room Big flat screen tvs Free breakfast Jacuzzi and outdoor pool Fitness Center Business Center Free parking lot - easy to park and next to a gas station, wells fargo, police You can use their carts to get your own luggage  You can open the windows to let fresh air in  The area where is located is very nice neighborhood  Employees are very friendly too.  Thank you.....................  New - Nice- Nice
Manager Response: Dear Vadors,  WOW! Our first TripAdvisor review! Thank you for being the first to leave a review about your experience at our brand new hotel, it is very much appreciated. We are pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay and extra amenities we have to offer. It is also nice to see that you found the service to be friendly, it is truly what we strive for. Thank you again and we hope to see you another time in the near future.  Sincerely,  John Mathews General Manager
